Jag uppskattar mycket att du, trots att du är besviken, är hygglig och berömmer receptionens servicenivå när du bokade rummet och checkade in.   Vi vill att alla våra gäster skall lämna Grand Hotel nöjda och med önskan att vilja återvända inom en snar framtid. Jag förstår att du knappast lämnade hotellet med den känslan - och därför är det extra viktigt för mig att du väljer att komma tillbaka.   Jag vill därför gärna tala direkt med dig. Har du tid och möjlighet att kontakta mig via nedanstående emailadress och uppge ditt telefonnummer så vore jag mycket tacksam.   Med vänlig hälsning,   Björn Gustavsson  Receptionschef  bjorn.gustavsson@grandilund.se

column7: När man stiger innanför dörrarna på hotellet får man en känsla av elegans och lyx. Allt verkar mycket genomtänkt. Maten, personalen, läget och rummen får högsta betyg. Gym och relaxavdelingen är liten men fräsch. Ett minus är att parkeringen ligger en bit ifrån hotellet.
column8: Response from Bjorn_Gustavsson, Front Office Manager at Grand Hotel LundResponded Oct 26, 2013
column10: Bäste Herrulf -  Det gör mig mycket glad att du trivdes på Grand Hotel. Mina kollegor och jag hoppas att du snart gästar oss igen.  Med vänlig hälsning,  Björn Gustavsson Receptionschef

column7: Anfängliche Befürchtungen wurden schnell zerstreut - dies ist kein Hotel, das auf Verschleiß arbeitet und von der Größe vergangener Tage lebt - das Hotel ist auch von innen sehr schön, klassisch und auf dennoch auf der Höhe der Zeit. Die Lage könnte nicht besser sein. Der…
column8: Response from Bjorn_Gustavsson, Front Office Manager at Grand Hotel LundResponded Oct 21, 2013
column10: Dear Lars-Fredrik -  Thank you for your kind words. I hope that you will return to Grand Hotel soon again.  Kind regards,  Björn Gustavsson Front Desk Manager

column7: L'albergo è situato in ottima posizione nella cittadina di Lund. Imponente immobile antico con arredamenti abbastanza barocchi e talvolta stantii. Abbiamo prenotato una camera matrimoniale deluxe sicuramente poco utilizzata visto il forte odore di muffa impresso all'interno. La…
column8: Response from Bjorn_Gustavsson, Front Office Manager at Grand Hotel LundResponded Oct 10, 2013
column10: Dear Like T -  Thank you for writing a review. I am sorry to learn that you did not enjoy your stay. Please send me an email - I would be grateful for more information.  Kind regards,  Björn Gustavsson  Front Desk Manager bjorn.gustavsson@grandilund.se

column7: The Grand is THE hotel in the centre of Lund, Sweden's famous university city.  Some of the circular turret rooms are amazing with windows on four sides and views over the city.  The food is traditional Swedish with little concession to the international business traveller, but…
column8: Response from Bjorn_Gustavsson, Front Office Manager at Grand Hotel LundResponded Oct 2, 2013
column10: Dear Ray -  Thank you for your kind words about Grand Hotel. I hope that you will return on many future occassions.  Kind regards,  Björn Gustavsson Front Desk Manager

column7: L'albergo è di gusto antico con grandi locali ed un ingresso da residenza di grandi nobili. Gli arredi sono eleganti e di stile tipo liberty. Molto bello l' ingresso e da qui le due scale ai piani superiori. Le camere sono spaziose, ben arredate e pulite. Il locale bar e…
column8: Response from Bjorn_Gustavsson, Front Office Manager at Grand Hotel LundResponded Sep 18, 2013
column10: Dear Mipiace1 -  Thank you for reviewing the Grand Hotel. I am happy to learn that you have a favourable opinion of our hotel and that you plan to return. Welcome Back!  Kind regards,  Björn Gustavsson Front Desk Manager

column7: We stayed here for two nights with our student son who is starting a year of study at Lund University. Location is excellent and very nice hotel but a little bit pricey. Be careful about parking just outside the hotel while dropping off luggage as we got a ticket. However the…
column8: Response from Bjorn_Gustavsson, Front Office Manager at Grand Hotel LundResponded Aug 31, 2013
column10: Dear ACM2013 -  Thank you for reviewing our hotel. I very much hope that your son will enjoy his studies in Lund and that we will have the pleasure of seeing his parents back at the Grand Hotel soon again.  Kind regards,  Björn Gustavsson Front Desk Manager

column7: Cet hôtel majestueux, imposant se situe à une centaine de mètre de la gare, à proximité du secteur piétonnier. A savoir qu'il est tout de même possible de s"y rendre en taxi si vous êtes chargé. Service impeccable, à la réception, au restaurant... Machine à café (dosette) sur le…
column8: Response from Bjorn_Gustavsson, Front Office Manager at Grand Hotel LundResponded Aug 31, 2013
column10: Dear Nicolas -  Thank you for reviewing our hotel. I am most grateful for your kind comments about the atmosphere, service and the fine dining for which the Grand Hotel is so well known.  Kind regards,  Björn Gustavsson Front Desk Manager

column7: The Grand's public rooms exude European charm.  Nevertheless, the guest rooms can be very small by North American standards.  Worse, some bathrooms (for single rooms) are so small that the shower stalls are barely functional.  The staff, however, are helpful and they moved me to…
column8: Response from Bjorn_Gustavsson, Front Office Manager at Grand Hotel LundResponded Aug 31, 2013
column10: Dear Frequenttraveller076 -  Thank you for reviewing our hotel. I am most grateful for your kind comments about the atmosphere and attitude of staff at the Grand Hotel.  Please send me a message before your next stay at the Grand and I would be delighted to offer you a complimentary upgrade to a larger room.  Kind regards,  Björn Gustavsson Front Desk Manager bjorn.gustavsson@grandilund.se

column6: A bit of a mixed bag
column7: We stayed here for three nights while attending a conference. Nice room on 4th floor, well laid out and, luckily, very quiet and accessible once we got used to very tiny elevators. Staff generally pleasant. Good location. Breakfast was disorganised chaos. On the first morning we…
column8: Response from Bjorn_Gustavsson, Front Office Manager at Grand Hotel LundResponded Aug 31, 2013
column10: Dear Bettoneyvere -  Thank you for reviewing our hotel. Please accept my apologies for the inconvenience you were caused during breakfast.  The hotel's kitchen was closed for construction work during the summer and part of the dining room area was therefore not in use. I am very sorry if we failed to provide our normal high standard of service during breakfast while you were staying with us.  I do hope that you will have the opportunity to return to Lund in the not too distant future and that you will then be able to re-experience Grand Hotel. Please send me a message before your next stay.  Kind regards,  Björn Gustavsson Front Desk Manager bjorn.gustavsson@grandilund.se

column6: once upon a Monastery... now hotel.
column7: once upon a Monastery... now hotel.  have been to the hotel multiple times.  wide range of room size and quality.  great breakfast.   walking distance from the train station, winter and summer alike.  a short walk to downtown Lund.    elevator doesn't go to the top floor - you…

column6: Lovely hotel, lovely part of Sweden
column7: We have stayed here a few times and it never fails to please. Whilst not the cheapest it is a lovely hotel fill of charm. We stay in a turret room which is excellent. Great place. Parking is only via municipal parking area but it works. Friendly staff.

Vi tillbringade en natt i ett classic dubbelrum i juli 2013. Har inget att klaga på vad gäller rummen. De var smakfullt inredda med mycket sköna sängar. Själva hotellet är charmigt med stora salar och en pampig entré från förra sekelskiftet. Frukostbuffén var mycket bra men…

In short: the hotel, itself, was great; but the service was repeatedly disappointing.  Our room was airy and pleasant.  While the rain shower ends up being more of an annoyance than a pleasure, the whole place felt clean and well-maintained, and that was enough for me.  The bed…

Stayed for two nights. The hotel is very nice, located inside a beautiful building - its a bit old - but this just adds the right atmosphere. The only setback was a strange scent in the main corridors (not in my room). The room was surprisingly lighted, comfortable, clean and…

column6: Classic hotel with good service, but showing its age
column7: I stayed at the Grand for 3 nights and it has a great location close to the railway station - and so is regularly used for conferences and the like. Personnel are helpful and they have a great breakfast. The hotel is one of the "classic" grand hotels built in many Swedish…

We had the meeting in the hotel and everybody stayed here. The atmosphere was great, my room spacious (I did get a single occupancy double), very elegantly furnished (No 159). The bathroom is, however, small, and so is the bathtub. Nespresso machine right in front on the…

Väldigt centralt och nära till stationen om man kommer med tåg. Hotellet är väldigt vacker och byggnaden är väldigt ståtlig. Utsikten från rummet var vacker den också, men jag förväntade mig mer standard med hänsyn till priset. Frukosten var super.

I stayed at the Grand Hotel on business on the recommendation that it is the best hotel in Lund. If it's the best I am certainly glad I didn't stay anywhere else! I was travelling solo but did not expect the single bed in my small room! The room was dark and poorly lit with too…

We stayed here at Easter and we got a suite as a family of four. The room was lovely, opulent and looked more expensive than the price we paid. Lund is a pretty university town but mostly everything was closed during easter. We were here for a specific event so it didn't make an…

Being a former university student some 20 years ago it is funny to come back and stay at Grand Hotel. I had booked and payed in advance, so check in was quick. It is located centrally in Lund with walking distance to everything. My room was very small, but every detail was…

Hotellet ligger centralt men är ändå lugnt och fridfullt. Snabb incheckning. Vänlig personal. Rummet litet men med fin utsikt över taken i Lund. Frukosten var superbra. Allt fräscht. Mycket att välja på med lokala produkter. Hissarna hyggligt snabba.

Tre besök - det första bäst, sen höll rummen inte samma extraordinära klass. Men det betyder faktiskt inget annat än att det var riktigt hög klass över lag!  Frukosten var en av de bästa hotellfrukostarna jag ätit. Den hade många lokala inslag, gott och färskt bröd, ostar och…

column6: 優雅な雰囲気で立地良し
column7: ルンド駅から徒歩数分程度の場所にあり、電車で移動する方には便利な立地です。 周辺も街の中心部ですので、徒歩数分圏内にコンビニ/スーパー、レストラン、ファーストフード、銀行、バーなどはひと通りあります。ルンドで宿を探すなら、一番便利な場所です。 建物は結構古いものらしく、設備も一部古いところがありますが優雅な雰囲気が好みの方には合うと思います。

Tjusigt hotell med en inredning som motsvarar hotellets gamla vackra yta. Hade dock förväntat mig högre standard på såväl rum, service som frukost med tanke på priset. Ganska lyhört från korridoren.  Har bott här två ggr och varje gång har det varit skräniniga gubbgäng…

Då har ni hamnat på rätt ställe ... personer som jobbar är lite för mycket självorienterade än service orienterade ... :( annars maten och vinet är mer än ok. När ni ska boka rum se till att ni för den har bokat .. olika standarder för samma rumsbeteckning .. kanske är alla inte…

column6: Hög svansföring och ambition - och de levde upp till det!
column7: Gediget, klassiskt, något högdraget med en ambition vad gäller mat och vin dom får utanpå det mesta. Jag tillbringade en natt i samband med arbete i Köpenhamn. Smidigare resa till Kastrup får man leta efter och hotellet ligger två minuter från stationen. Middagen var i…

Nyopp-pusset byhotell med historisk sus. Hyggelig betjening, veldig god start på dagen med nydelig og helt topp frokost. Men- veldig små rom og dårlig ventilasjon. Medførte at man må ha vindu åpent - og mye støy fra spesielt tog som går 24/7. Meget sentralt med mange hyggelige…

Trevlig personal och ok mat. Dock var rummet lite slitet. Hade behövt en uppfräschning. Badrummet var stort. Utsikten över takåsarna var sådär upphetsande. Mycket fina festlokaler. Utnyttjade aldrig bastuavdelningen.

Stayed 2 nights at the Grand Hotel in Lund. I got my room upgraded. Lovely room, very good breakfast. Small gym and sauna in the basement. Nice coffee facilities (Nespresso) in the hallway. Sink in the bathroom was too small (toilet size).

column6: Relocated and badly informed! Not good!
column7: I booked the Grandiosa package (Grandiosa paketet - coffee, 3 course dinner and breakfast) at Grand Hotel in Lund for a one-night weekend stay Saturday-Sunday.  I received a phone call two days before departure and a man told me that we would have to take our 3-course dinner at…

Stayed last weekend. Friendly arrival, lovely room, small for UK standards especially as booked luxury room. But excellent location, great bar/restaurant with very good atmosphere. Very good breakfast but a bit overwhelmed on Sunday when everyone arrived at the same time which…

column6: det sämsta servis på flera år
column7: Den 9-10 oktober 2012 hade jag tjänsteresa till Lund och i samband med detta skulle övernatta på ”Grand Hotel” i Lund, rum nr 473. På kvällen den 9 oktober har jag försökt göra mig i ordning inför middag. Men var problem med varmt vatten, i stället för varmt vatten det rann…

A big contrast to the majority of hotels in which I have stayed in Scandinavia, this hotel oozes its long history. Conveniently located near both the centre of town and the railway station it is a grat base from which to venture. Reception was welcoming and the wifi free and…

column6: Great hotel, nice area, helpful staff
column7: I was invited to stay a night at this beautiful and authentic hotel.  We also enjoyed lunch there and a conference.  The building and the room look great - perhaps not 100% refined or sophisticated, but comfortable; the service is good, and so is the hospitality, the food we…

Reste i tjänsten och kom fram 21:30. Möttes av besked att de haft datahaveri på hotellet "alldeles nyligen" och av den anledningen bokat bort mitt rum! Erbjöds taxi till ett obemannat hotell utan möjlighet till restaurang eller frukostbuffé i utkanten av stan. Jag sa att jag…

Bel hotel style 19ème siècle, chaleurexu en hiver (et les hivers sont longs en Suède). Près de la gare, à 10 minutes à peid, pratique. Petit déjeuner bien fourni et bon.  Service irréprochable, y compris le restuarant. Les chambres sont un peu kitches mais cela rajoute au…

The hotel certainly lives up to its name, but it's rather expensive for what you get, I'd also stayed in another Lund hotel that cost about a third the price of the Grand but provided better value (larger rooms, more facilities in the room, etc).  So while there's nothing…

Godt hotel med dejlig beliggenhed i Lund. God, økologisk morgenmadsbuffet. Værelset, vi boede i var pænt, rummeligt og rent. Personalet var venligt og hjælpsomt. Vi følte, at vi fik meget for pengene.

WE took two double rooms for one night while on a road trip around sweden and Denmark, The hotel looks very grand and the staff were very helpful. The rooms were spacious but did not have air conditioning so even though we had the windows open the rooms were very warm. There was…

Fikk et stort og romslig dobbeltrom på baksiden av hotellet. Flott bad som var nyrenovert. Deilige senger med gode madrasser. Masse plass på rommet. Pluss for B & O TV.  Frokosten var meget bra, med mye å velge i og god service. Hotellet ligger bra til, like ved jernbanen og med…

column6: Worth staying at for its ambiance and charm
column7: My husband and I were happy that we chose the Grand Hotel Lund as an alternative to staying in  nearby Malmo. This university town is lovely, filled with university students, lively restaurants and stores, and it is easy to get around. The Grand Hotel Lund, a turn of the century…

Ho passato quasi una settimana in questo albergo, nel centro di Lund e a due passi dalla stazione. Grande immobile ottocentesco, con vastissimi e eleganti spazi comuni, ha stanze standard non tanto grandi ma bene attrezzate e luminose, comode e con un servizio perfetto.  Al…

column6: Warm, friendly welcome, superb service, lovely building
column7: From my point of view, given that the room is clean, well-appointed (i.e., free WiFi), and reasonable in size, by far the most important characteristic of any hotel is the quality of the service received.  From this perspective, it would be difficult to beat the Grand Hotel…

Stayed there on one of my business trips to Sweden last May.Grand old building from the late 1800's with some renovations done to its interior.Top quality Swedish treatment uppon arrival!Courtious and proffesional. My single room was small but comfortable and the bed,a pleasure…

Vi spenderade 1 natt på hotellet, inklusive en 5 rätters nordisk meny.  Fördelar:  Atmosfären är underbar Lyxigt Rummen är fantastiska och är nyrenoverade (vi bodde i ett runt hörnrum) Maten är exemplarisk och vinerna passar perfekt  Nackdelar: Svårt med parkering

column6: Grand Hotel Lund... I prefer some other hotel
column7: The hotel is situated closed to the central station of Lund, so are you coming by train, you can easily reach the hotel by foot. But by car, it’s more difficult and you have to park the car at a parking place at least 10 minute’s walk from the hotel as there are no alternatives…

Spent 2 nights here in June on business. The location is good, very central and just a short walk to the train station. I came by car, but found the hotel didn't offer any car parking facilities, but I could buy a pass for the local car park in the center and charge it to my…

column6: Good location in Lund but avoid their 'single room'
column7: Booked a single room at an attractive low rate - and that is what I got, probably the smallest room I ever stayed in. Room very hot, even with open window. Sound isolation from late night traffic in the hallway almost non-existent. Avoid this room-type when possible - it's a…

He pasado tres días en Lund, y el Grand Hotel es una monada, es muy clásico y lleno de detalles que te transportan al pasado. Además es cómodo en cuanto a situación, está muy cerca de la estación de tren y del centro de la ciudad, de las tiendas y restaurantes... También tiene…

column6: Good breakfast, nice location and view
column7: I got room 115 and it was a Lady DeLux room. Not really what I expected since I am male. However, apart from some female things included in the room everything was normal. The air could have been better. But then again it was 28 C warm outside so I guess that is not that…

First of all the hotel was very easy to find and reach from the train station, we took the train from copenhagen airport to lund, got down at the station at Lund, came out of the station and had to walk about 4 mins from the station to the hotel which was very near, the room was…

No place is perfect. But I found no faults here. The staff is extremely helpful, how do they always kbow who I am?. Rooms are pretty. Good coffee everywhere, good breakfast included.  Travelling much, this has grown to be my favourite hotel.

column6: Very nice, but kind of small
column7: Business stay... Positives: Location - block and a half from train station, near lots of stuff downtown; Good restaurant (the place to be after work), Staff and service in general were very good except table service in the bar area can be slow in the afternoon.  Front Desk staff…

column6: A special ambiance, all rooms individual in character
column7: Once in a while we stay at the Grand Hotel in Lund. This is hotel known from famous regional persons, litterature and student life in University town Lund. It is quite expensive and full of oldfashioned furniture and carpets, as well as paintings and chandeliers. It went through…

Nachdem wir hier mal Essen waren habe ich dieses Mal ein Zimmer gebucht. Das Hotel hat einen besonderen Charme aus alten Zeiten ( ist positiv gemeint) Das Gebäude, das Ambiente im Eingangbereich, die Zimmer und auch der Ballsaal geben einem den Eindruck, man ist vor 100 Jahren…
A nice hotel in the very centre of Lund with nice rooms.

column6: Ok, but not as good as expected.
column7: Hotel on the more expensive side with pricing which should allow the visitor to expect top notch quality all the way through. This hotel does not offer a consistently good standard. We had to look at 4 rooms before we found one that suited us, all in the same class/price, double…

Stayed two nights for business, this a hotel that has a lot of ambiance but has lost the attention to detail that marks a good to very good hotel.  The level of maintenance is so so. Location is great and i suspect that they don´t have to make the extra effort to get customers.…

column6: Older Hotel, good location but can be noisey
column7: I was in Lund for a short business trip.  The hotel is conveniently located a few hundred meters from the central train station, so very easy to get to from Copenhagen Airport.  Direct train service from downstairs in the airport, short 30-minute train ride to Lund.  Hotel is…

column6: Ambiance, bar and dining facilities are very nice
column7: Great ambiance in this old style hotel. The standard rooms are quite small.

column6: Beautiful Hotel - outstanding hotel for the money.
column7: Our double room overlooking the garden /square in front was large and comfortable - and it was a standard room with 2 twins. The bed was comfortable and the room was quiet: Lund gets very quiet by about 10 pm. The breakfast buffet was  was outstanding with lots great Swedish…

The Grand Hotel is very pleasant hotel decorated in a "belle eopch" style in the centre of Lund. Although my single room was not large, it was extremely comfortable and tastefully furnished. The staff were very helpful and friendly. In fact the whole hotel felt friendly from the…

We got a really nice room at the third floor overlooking the rooftops of Lund. The room was spacious, very homely and well kept. Adding to that a very nice breakfast as well as nice and serviceminded staff makes this my top choice for Lund. As a former student of Lund it was a…

We stayed at the Grand Hotel for two nights while getting our daughter moved into a residence hall at the University for a semester as an exchange student. Our initial room was on the second floor and though nice sized, didn't have much of a view and was stuffy.  When I asked if…

column6: Decent, but wait for remodel to be done
column7: Nice, clean, older European style hotel. A bit in disarray while I stayed here as they are doing some renovations.  Rooms are dated but clean.  Close to train station, but feels a little off of the beaten path.  Have been told by locals that the resturaunt is excellent, but it…

Not for light sleepers! My partner was able to sleep through the frequent noise of trains, buses, and traffic outside the nearby Lund Central Station. However, it only got quiet enough for me to sleep between 3-5am... However, management offered us a transfer to the nearby but…

I stayed here for a wedding. Overall an excellent hotel, close to the main train station and Lund major sights, a two-minute walk from the main square. Beautifully decorated rooms and staircase. Breakfast with complimentary newspaper in a beautiful big hall room, wide selection…

We stayed here one night. You can park briefly outside the hotel while checking in and on departure, but the hotel has no parking of its own. However, the charming and very helpful woman on Reception directed me to a nearby car park and, overnight from 6pm to 9am, I was able to…

column6: Ottimo hotel nel centro di Lund
column7: Il Grand Hotel Lund è un edificio storico nel centro della cittadina del sud della Svezia. Si affaccia su una piazza, ed è circondato dal verde.  Sono stata in questo hotel per due notti lo scorso dicembre e devo dire che nonostante la proibitiva temperatura esterna, l'hotel è…
Easily the best hotel in Sweden! I can't find anything wrong with this hotel. Superb staff, great rooms and the best breakfast in Europe!! Stay here when in Lund!!

仕事で１／３１～２／３まで３泊しました。 ルンドの駅から歩けます。数分くらい。 全面禁煙です。玄関外に灰皿が置いてあります。この時期、寒いです。館内にも喫煙室があるようですが、場所よく判りません。深夜は玄関扉閉まっているようです。 朝食はホットビュッフェ。美味しいです。 冷蔵庫の中身、有料です。ポット置いてないです。バスタブ無しで、シャワーブースのみ。シャワーブースや洗面所やトイレのある場所は床暖の様です。部屋は輻射ヒーターが窓際にありました。電気か温水かは不明。ベッドは寝心地良いです。…

column6: A great stay in a 'Grand' hotel
column7: A beautiful hotel in the 'old Grand' style.  If possible, request a Tower room, they are spacious and nicely presented.  Excellent breakfast and reception staff were very efficient and helpful.  Nespresso coffee machines on all floors and warm, frothed milk available (by…

column6: Beautiful hotel - like some you may never see; no A/C but that's typical
column7: The Grand Hotel is an experience, I think.  My wife and I stayed here for four days.  The hotel is a beauty and the breakfasts that come with your stay - they rival the best hotel breakfasts I have ever had, if it is not the best.    The hotel is centrally located.  It's close…

column6: A hotel with an identity crisis
column7: The Grand Hotel is based in the heart of Lund in a location near a range of decent bars, restaurants and just on the fringe of the university campus. I have been staying here for 3-4 nights a week for the past 5 weeks for business and still find it hard to categorise as either a…
饭店位于古城的中心区，位置很好。古堡样式的建筑，很有气势。房间不是很大，很紧凑。设备都是典型的瑞典风格，简洁，实用。还可以免费享受擦鞋服务，挺好。早餐很丰盛，品种很多。

column6: Grand old hotel from another era
column7: Located about 2 blocks from the Lund train station, facing a park.  The hotel is over 100 years old, and looks a bit old from the outside.  Quite expensive, but all hotels in Lund are expensive.  Inside it is in good shape, with marble floors and modern rooms.  There were large…

The "grand" in the name Grand Hotel harks back to a time when men wore hats and smoked pipes. But although its glory days are behind it, the Grand Hotel is still a really lovely place to stay, and I come back to it every time that I am in Lund even though there are no doubt more…

column6: A very nice place to stay in
column7: A great hotel the room was clean so was the bathroom, the room was well equipped and the breakfast had variety and enough to keep you  for the day

Highly recommend the Grand Hotel Lund.  In 1899 it was the grandest hotel in Sweden and still has much of that charm.  A grand place with great attention to detail.  Very elegant but has also been modernized.  Great location with a cool English pub a half block away.  Close also…

We went to this hotel on the recommendation from a friend and stayed for 4 days with a 3 year old child. We just thought everything was great. We had a quaint room overlooking the park, and while the bathroom is small it was okay for the 3 of us. Our room also had a new flat…

The hotel dates back to 1899 and is Lund’s oldest hotel. We had a spacious room with a comfortable bed, but with no air-conditioning so it got quite hot during the night. The bathroom was big and quite recently renovated. The breakfast was excellent  with a lot to choose among.…

This hotel is located within a 5 minute walk from the main train station in Lund, but be warned that some of the walk is over rough cobblestones which can be a pain with luggage (I think the cabbies at the station would balk at driving you there as it's so close).  there are a…

Stayed there several times. It´s an old fashioned traditional European style hotel with a lot of character. Thus every room is a bit different, so ask at check-in what the best available is (the tower rooms are especially nice).The staff is typically Swedish - cool, calm,…

column6: Very Grand Hotel, very central but VERY noisy
column7: Very grand late 19th century hotel.  Good, if a little frosty service. Clean well decorated room. Excellent breakfast.  Only a few flaws:  The bed was small, which was not too bad. Our room faced onto the side street which had buses passing till very late (single glazed windows,…

A group of us stayed here for one night as part of a business trip.  The single rooms we were allotted were poky with more emphasis on the size of the TV than comfort.  The showers were small and dirty, the towels almost threadbare and you couldn't keep the window open because…

This hotel is a short walk from the Lund train station.  It is too close to use a taxi and a little far if you have 110lbs. of luggage, as I did on this trip.  Check-in was not good.  There was a line and the front desk phone was ringing constantly.  It took nearly 40 minutes to…

We stayed at the Grand Hotel for a week, during which we celebrated our marriage in Lund.  Our room was recently refurbished and had a lovely view over the small park in front of the hotel.  The standard of furnishings, bathroom and domestic servicing was excellent and the…

This historical, late 19th century hotel, used to be the regular meeting place of celebrated authors and artists. It remains a very fashionable place to stay and has been carefully modernised without losing it's fin-de-siecle atmosphere: fancy, yet not vulgar. Being the oldest…

column6: Particular modo de entender 4 estrellas. Particular 4 stars hotel
column7: Hotel que demuestra qué distintos son los estándares europeos que clasifican un hotel con 4 estrellas. Un hotel de esa categoría no debe cerrar a las 11 de la noche. La habitación era agradable, no tanto el cuarto de baño. La ducha era el típico agujero en el suelo y cortina de…
column8: Response from HConcordia, Owner at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Jul 6, 2018
column10: Estimado "vizcain0",  Muchas gracias por su larga y detallada reseña del Hotel Concordia de 4 estrellas.  Nos alegra saber que le gustó su habitación y el amplio desayuno bufé. Todos nuestros baños están completamente alicatados y cumplen con todos los estándares de 4 estrellas, de acuerdo con el estándar del hotel sueco alto general. La recepción cierra a las 23:00 y abre a las 5 a. M. Durante este tiempo, tenemos una compañía de seguridad que coopera y ellos son los huéspedes del hotel que se contactan durante estas horas. Esta es una solución que funciona bien para todas las partes.  Bienvenido de regreso en cualquier momento!  Atentamente  Christofer Eriksson  English version:  Dear "vizcain0",  Thank you very much for your long and detailed review of the 4-star Hotel Concordia.  We are pleased to hear that you liked your room and the broad breakfast buffet. All our bathrooms are fully tiled and meet every 4-star standard, according to the high general swedish hotel standard. The Front Desk is closed 23 pm and open at 5 am. During this time we have a cooperating security company and they are the hotel guests contact during these hours. This is a well functioning solution for all parties.        Welcome back anytime!  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson

column6: One of the worst experiences for a long time
column7: Most of us can survive old mats,  renovations and a disastorus design. What I have a hard time till accept as a hotel educated person, is the fact that the owners has no idea of what happened in the world since 1987. This hotel is a total disaster.
column8: Response from HConcordia, Ägare at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Mar 22, 2017
column10: Dear Michael J,  Thank you for your review.  We were very suprised by your comments and of course disapointed that you didn´t have a pleasant stay with us. Hotel Concordia has been renovated many times during the last couple of years. The latest major renovation has taken place THIS year. In Jan-March 2017 we have renovated 20 guest rooms, 6 completely new bathrooms and refurbishing the public areas in the hotel. Visit our website for pictures from this latest renovation: www.concordia.se  Since you are a hotel educated person you know how important it is to present the correct facts: We actually have no "mats"(carpets) like you claim, in any guest rooms. We have high quality parquet floors in all 60 guest rooms. You write that nothing happened since 1987 at the hotel?!: To mention a few improvements that we done:  -We built a top modern gym in 2012. -The "Tycho Brahe" roof terrace facing south, was built in 2012. -We built a relax area with a panorama view sauna on the 3rd floor in 2010.  -We invested in a own fiber(high-speed Internet) into the building in and then we built a Wi-Fi system with free access for our guests.  -In dec 2016 we invested in brand new LED HD TV 32" to all 60 guest rooms and a new digital TV system providing 19 tv-channels.  Every year some brand new service and/or renovation is presented to our dear guests at Hotel Concordia. We are always trying our best to improve our services towards our guests. The hotel is, by a large margin, fulfilling every demand for a 4-star hotel, we are controlled every year by the Swedish branch organisation, Visita.   Please contact us at info@concordia.se so we can hear some concrete facts about your stay so we can improve even more. Thank you in advance!  We really wish you welcome back the next time you are in Lund.  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson Owner/CEO, Hotel Concordia

column6: Charming hotel in the centre of Lund
column7: The Hotel Concordia is an older hotel, but that is what gives it its charm. It was a bit like visiting another era. I stayed there one night, staff were helpful, breakfast was very good and the place had a vibe which combined past and present.
column8: Response from HConcordia, Ägare at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Nov 15, 2016
column10: Dear "michaelramiller",  Thank you for your nice review of our hotel!  We try to combine the old with the new and we are really happy that you liked the mixture of this during your stay. Soon we will change all our TV´s in the guest rooms to 32" and 19 excellent tv-channels. This winter we will also renovate 6 bathrooms and renovate 10 guest rooms. We always renovate carefully so the "old" feeling never goes away.  We have a free Guest Loyalty program if you are visiting us again.  Welcome back anytime!  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson

column7: It's close to the rail station, but not too close. In a very quite road; not far from the city centre. It doesn't shine like a diamond and probably the interior would benefit from a moderate refreshing, but is a good solution.

We ended up staying in Lund on a business trip because there was a festival in Malmo and hotel accommodation was scarce.  Lund is a nice, quiet place and the Concordia is situated close enough to the centre of town that bars and restaurants are within easy walking distance.   It…

Vi beställde ett sk superior-rum. Litet, golvet är i mycket dåligt skick med djupa svarta märken efter skor. Slitet rum, badrum med mögelfläckar i taket. Handdukarna av tveksam kvalitet. Två av fyra glas var spruckna. Frukost OK.
column8: Response from HConcordia, Ägare at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Nov 15, 2016
column10: Hej "Alexander540909",  Stort tack för Din recension av vårt hotell!  Vi beklagar och förstår att Er vistelse inte var tillfredsställande. Det rummet som ni bodde i ska renoveras i jan/feb främst p g a mindre bra kvalitet på parkettgolvet. Vi kan dock garantera för Dig och andra gäster att det finns verkligen INGA mögelfläckar i badrummet. Detta kontrolleras mycket noga och om det mot förmodan skulle uppstå mögel, så totalrenoverar vi detta badrum direkt!  Våra handdukar är av den tjockaste och finaste frottén som finns på hotellmarknaden, så ert klagomål gällande det är förvånande.  Varmt välkommen tillbaka!  Bästa hälsningar  Christofer Eriksson

column7: Da fuori sembra molto carino, ma le camere sono molto semplici e vecchie. E non mi sembra particolarmente pulita. Per essere un quattro stelle è davvero deludente. La colazione è nella norma.  La posizione però ottima , a due passi dalla stazione e dalla piazza centrale .  Non…

column6: Lots of charm, no air conditioning
column7: This hotel is nicely located,  close to everything in beautiful Lund. The building is old, and the hotel is charming,  although a bit dated.   My room was spacious, we a good sitting area. The bed was a bit narrow, but comfortable.  The problem: no air conditioning and no window…
column8: Response from HConcordia, Ägare at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Oct 16, 2016
column10: Dear "Kari2010",  Thank for your nice review and we appreciate that you liked and mentioned our central location in Lund. We have AC in 20 rooms and this winter we are planning to renovate and install AC in 6 economy rooms.  Welcome back anytime!  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson

column7: Bra läge, lugnt nära till centrum. Ljusa fräscha rum. Bra service. Läcker och god frukost. Trevlig personal. Ett hotell man återkommer till. Rent och snyggt. Vattnet inget vidare, men det kan inte hotellet rå för, det är likadant i hela Lund.

Varmt välkommen tillbaka!  Bästa hälsningar  Christofer Eriksson

column7: Very nice hotel in Lund.  My room was cosy and warm.  There were complimentary robes and the bed was extremely comfortable.  The room had a fridge and tea and coffee making facilities - no biscuits though :( The reception staff were friendly and helpful.

column6: Don't get fooled by the stars
column7: Expected to visit a great hotel due to descriptions online, rating on TA, and amount of stars. The reality was quite different, we got an inside room where the window opened up to the hall, meaning no fresh air. Instead there was a huge stand alone airconditioned with a huge…
column8: Response from HotellLund, Owner at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Sep 25, 2016
column10: Dear Camilla L,  Thank you for your detailed review!  We are very pleased to hear that you liked our serviceminded staff.  We deeply apologies for our mistake, you had booked a Double Room Superior and we accommodated you in a Double Room Economy. Due to our mistake we have decided to refund the total amount of the 1 night stay to you.   You stayed in one of our few Economy room at the hotel and these few rooms are facing the lobby. The windows are extra soundproof in these rooms.  We are soon going to invest in a brand new and very quiet aircondition system in these economy rooms.  We are also going to renovate the bathrooms in our few economy rooms.  We have renovated and raised the quality level in our many standard rooms during the last 5-7 years and soon it is time to renovate our economy rooms. Every year we renovate and improve the room quality. This work is very important for us in all 60 rooms!  Welcome back the next time in Lund!!  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson

column7: Ankom til hotellet og blev modtaget af en venlig ung mand, fik anvist vores værelse.  Værelset størrelse var fin, rent var der også. Men så var der så lige at værelset vendte ud til det indre af hotellet, det vil sige at de gæster som boede modsat os kunne se lige ind i…
column8: Response from HConcordia, Owner at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Sep 25, 2016
column10: Hej Houlbjerg,  Tack för Er recension och vad roligt att ni tyckte om vår personal!  Som jag svarade till er resepartner på er andra recension på engelska gällande samma rum och vistelse(kanske lite onödigt med 1 recension på danska och 1 på engelska, eller hur?):   Tyvärr har vi på hotellet gjort ett misstag och felaktigt placerat er i ett Dubbelrum Ekonomi när Ni hade bokat en natt i ett Dubbelrum Superior. Vi beklagar detta och på grund av detta misstag från vår sida, så har vi beslutat att ge er 100 % av det inbokade beloppet för denna natt tillbaka. Vi hoppas att ni finner denna kompensation tillfredsställande.  Ni bodde i ett av våra få ekonomirum på hotellet. Dessa rum har ljudisolerade fönster. Vi har under 5-7 års tid renoverat våra standardrum och nu är det snart dags att renovera våra få ekonomirum. Då ska vi bl a installera ett helt nytt och tystgående AC-system. Vi ska även renovera badrummen på dessa ekonomirum.  Vi prioriterar verkligen underhållet av fastigheten och rummen. Detta är något som vi arbetar med dagligen, året runt!  Vi hoppas att ni ger oss en chans till och önskar er varmt välkommen tillbaka till oss nästa gång ni är i Lund!  Bästa hälsningar  Christofer Eriksson

column7: Fantastisk og hyggeligt værelse med alt, hvad man kunne ønske sig, inklusive BBC på TV.  Forrygende beliggenhed og lækreste morgenmad. Sågar cykler gratis til låns. Alle var venlige og hjælpsomme. Ufatteligt god value for money!

Nice cozy hotel. Best location, nearby to railway. Nice restaurants around the corner. Walking distance to all mayor sites in Lund. Nice competent reception staff. Not very good for disabeled persons.

Ett ganska nedgånget hotell med oerhört små rum. Sängarna var gamla och slitna, badrummet (förutom litet) gammalt och rätt ofräscht. Frukosten var okej, personalen kunde vara mer uppmärksam även om vissa var trevliga. Läget är mycket bra.

Fint hotell. Fräsha rum, kan inte säga mycket om städning då jag inte är bekväm med att folk vistas i mitt utan att jag är närvarande (vilket respekterades). Frukosten hade hög standard. Och kaffe fanns i oändlighet.

Dejligt hotel i hjertet af Lund og i ganske kort afstand  fra gågaderne og restauranter. Morgenmaden var helt i top med friskpresset apelsinjuice, æg bacon, og hvad man ellers kan forvente. God information om parkeringsmulighederne omkring hotellet. Vil helt sikkert booke…

Although the room, particularly bed, is small, all I needed was supplied. Breakfast was good; many hot dishes like sausage, scramble egg and crepe. I wanted to use sauna, but I didn't have time for it.

Hotellet i sig från utsidan ser snarare ut som ett bostadshus där det finns lägenheter och annat - men att komma in i lobbyn gör det till en helt annan upplevelse. Stora pampiga ytor där man märker att det gamla är välbevarat. Det känns som att hotellet har funnits här sedan…

Mitt i centrala Lund ligger denna vackra byggnad med historisk atmosfär och moderna bekvämligheter. Personalen är hjälpsam och har en glad, öppen och allmänt trevlig attityd. Värt ett besök. Vi kommer att återkomma till Concordia.

Would always return to this hotel. The ambiente is beautiful, the staff is friendly, and the breakfast is excellent. The sauna is also nice, although the "spectecular" view is through a window onto the roof tops of Lund, there is not so much special or beautiful about that. But…

column6: Excellent service, good location and a fantastic breakfast
column7: Stayed at the Hotel Concordia for a week-long business trip.  Service was unobtrusive but excellent, from a seamless online-booking experience through to check-out.  The room was clean and modern, but with a distinct old-world charm.  My only (small) complaint would be the lack…

Confortevole , vicino alla stazione ,camera e servizi non proprio da 4 stelle, la terrazza panoramica pressoché inesistente colazione nella norma.  Avevano a disposizione due biciclette per visitare la città io e il mio collega volevamo usarle ma non è stato possibile perché con…

Jeg kan kun anbefale et ophold på Hotel Concordia. Smukke indretning af selve hotel og dets værelser, velsmagende og interessant morgenmad, særligt den hjemmelavede smoothie og friskpressede appelsinjuice. Personalet var meget venlige. Det var et ophold med forkælelse i centrum.

Just only 10 minutes walk from Lund Central Station and within a reachable distance to Town Center...the hotel locates in a good location with reasonable price. The service provides is minimal, but with best value for money.

Verkligt god standard med utmärkt service, bra rum och perfekt läge mitt i Lunds centrum. Rikligt frukostbuffé gjord för allas önskemål. Rekommenderas verkligen !l Ett hotell som håller hög standard på samtliga punkter i frpgeformuläret

Ett fint hotell i centrala Lund med gångavstånd till den historiska delen av Lund, universitet och Botaniska trädgården. Toppenfina och fräscha välstädade rum. Vi bodde i familjerum med separate badrum och dörr mellan rummen. Trevlig personal och god frukost

Andra gången på detta hotell som ligger mitt i Lund och nära tågstationen. Jättegod fräsch frukost med mycket frukt och grönskar samt smoothie, många sorters te! Supertrevlig personal. Rummet stort och fint och fräscht med gott om plats för två vuxna och tre barn. Trevligt med…

column6: Helt ok hotell men saknar det lilla extra
column7: Mycket trevlig personal, fina rum och bra läge på hotellet. men för att få fyra stjärnor hade jag exempelvis sett en lite bättre frukost. Baconen var rent bedrövlig, det andra ok men saknar den där lilla finessen.

Bästa läget och trevlig personal. Men de behöver snäppa upp sig vad det gäller frukost och städning. Frontdesk personalen mycket tillmötesgående och serviceinriktad. Sen skulle det inte skada om man tog kontakt med en inredare som hjälpte dem att "modernisera" uttrycket.

Vi hade varit på stor fest i AF-borgen, så vi var rätt trötta. Men vi fick en verkligt god nattoch en god frukost, så vi var fit for fight också nästa dag. Närheten till Lunds centrala delar är också en mycket stor fördel
column8: Response from HConcordia, Ägare at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Oct 16, 2016
column10: Kära "svenss0nb",  Tusen tack för Er fina recension och varmt välkommen tillbaka till oss!  Extra roligt att ni tyckte om vårt centrala läge.  Varmt välkommen tillbaka!  Bästa hälsningar  Christofer Eriksson

column7: Hotel Concordia, like many others, offers budget deals if you book online in advance.  We booked online in the hotel lobby on the evening of our arrival.  Unfortunately, the booking did not go through for several hours and that lead to considerable heartache, as we did not know…
column8: Response from HotellLund, Owner at Hotel ConcordiaResponded May 24, 2016
column10: Dear "ammt63",  Thank you for taking time to review our hotel.  This particular day, we experienced some techniqal issues with our online booking interface, provided to us by a third party company. We just had to wait until they solved the problem. It took about 8 hours. We apologies for the many hours delay of your booking confirmation.  Welcome back to us soon!  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson

column7: We stayed one night at this hotel. We wanted to stay in a hotel not belonging to a huge hotel chain.  It is central located. The room was clean but small which is fine for just one night. I found the price too high compared to the room standard. The breakfast was nice.

At best this establishment could pass for a basic hostel. We booked because its location was recommended as ideal for a wedding we were attending in the City.  The location is indeed its best (and only) asset. On arrival at 13:30 we expected our room to be ready by 14:00,…
column8: Response from HotellLund, Owner at Hotel ConcordiaResponded May 24, 2016
column10: Dear Tegan Thomas,  Thank you for all your comments. We are very sorry to hear that you did not have a pleasant stay at our 4-star hotel.  Unfortunately,  we don't agree with some of your  comments. You stayed with us  aprox.  1 year ago(June 2015) and your review was made now in May 2016. It's remarkable to remember all these details that you describe 1 year later.  Here are comments/corrections of your review:  I have talked with all my staff regarding your complaints and comments. No one in our staff has promised you a meeting with me(manager). Our highly serviceminded staff always inform me if there is a complaint from a guest.  I think this is very important, to always do our best to fullfill our guests requests.  The checkin time is 15:00, not 14:00. However, we apologies for the long queue when you returned to checkin.  We serve English Breakfast Tea, in guest rooms and in the Breakfast area.  We have been serving this Tea brand since 1982.  The room you stayed in is a Double room and meets all demands for a 4-star hotel. In Oct  2015, the hotel bransch organisation of  Sweden -Visita - controlled our hotel. We got one of the highest point level that a 4-star  Garni (breakfast) hotel can achieve in Europe.  The hotel gym is not big, but we offer  3 cardio machines and free weights. The gym is very modern and was built in 2011.  We tried to give you the best possible service as we are  known for among our guests, but we seemed to have failed this time.   We hope that you will return to us someday for a much better stay.  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson

column7: Ett trevligt, litet och mysigt hotell med bra läge. Rummet var ganska litet men tillräckligt stort för en övernattning. Vänlig personal och god frukost. Duschen var i minsta laget, men ren och fräsch.
column8: Response from HotellLund, Owner at Hotel ConcordiaResponded May 22, 2016
column10: Tusen tack för Er fina recension och  varmt välkommen tillbaka till oss!  Bästa hälsningar  Christofer Eriksson

column7: Toppen! Trevlig personal, trevlig atmosfär! Lund är en pärla i sig, detta hotell förgyllde min vistelse ytterligare med god service lugnt behagligt läge bra faciliteter god frukost och trevlig personal. I hjärtat av Lund med syrener och magnolia utanför dörren
column8: Response from HotellLund, Owner at Hotel ConcordiaResponded May 22, 2016
column10: Kära Saltina2016,  Tusen tack för Er fina recension och  varmt välkommen tillbaka till oss! Extra roligt att ni tyckte om vår personal och att frukosten föll er i smaken.  Varmt välkommen tillbaka!  Bästa hälsningar  Christofer Eriksson

column7: Concordia var nära att få högsta betyg men mottagandet vid ankomsten drar ned det något. Vi erbjöds ett rum som låg klart under det vi bokat tre månader tidigare och betalade för vid ankomsten. Detta rättades till följande dag när den mer erfarna personalen var på plats. Så till…
column8: Response from HotellLund, Owner at Hotel ConcordiaResponded May 22, 2016
column10: Hej Björn O,  Tusen tack för Er fina recension och vi ber om ursäkt än en gång för att ni fick ett annat rum den första natten än det som ni bokat.   Skönt att det löste sig andra dagen och att ni därefter var  mycket nöjda med er vistelse hos oss.  Varmt välkommen tillbaka till oss nästa gång ni är i Lund!  Bästa hälsningar  Christofer Eriksson

column6: Bra läge i Lund. Tyst hotell.
column7: Bra läge. Nära centrum av Lund. Mycket folk på hotellet vilket gjorde att vi blev tilldelade en frukosttid, vilket inte passade oss. Var sedan gott om plats i matsalen när vi kom ner tidigare än den tid vi fått.
column8: Response from HotellLund, Owner at Hotel ConcordiaResponded May 22, 2016
column10: Hej "137mia",  Tusen tack för Er fina recension,  Inom kort(i maj) kommer vi att kunna erbjuda  12 nya sittplatser i samband med frukostserveringen. Våra gäster kan också ta med sig och njuta av frukosten  på hotellets takterrass med sköna loungemöbler.  Varmt välkommen tillbaka till oss!  Bästa hälsningar  Christofer Eriksson

column6: Mysigt hotell, personligt. Mycket fina och goa rum.
column7: Frukosten, utbudet ok men frukostsituation var dålig. Trångt vilket lätt gav en hög ljudnivå. Trångheten gav även upphov till att man fick leta efter sittplats, svårt att röra sig till och ifrån buffén men maten var ok.
column8: Response from HConcordia, Ägare at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Oct 16, 2016
column10: Kära "holstn"",  Tusen tack för Er fina recension! Vi kan glädja er att vi har nu även har 12 sittplatser i lobbyn för våra frukostgäster. Extra roligt att ni tyckte om vår frukostmat.  Varmt välkommen tillbaka!  Bästa hälsningar  Christofer Eriksson

column7: Man trivs bra på detta hotell då man blir varmt omhändertagen, alla i personalen får en att trivas på hotellet och de få gånger som jag behövt säga till om någon brist som hotellet har haft så är det åtgärdat inom kort. Så detta är ett hotell som jag gärna besöker igen framför…
column8: Response from HConcordia, Ägare at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Oct 16, 2016
column10: Kära "tegerdahlt",  Tusen tack för Er fina recension och varmt välkommen tillbaka till oss!  Extra roligt att ni tyckte om vår personal.  Varmt välkommen tillbaka!  Bästa hälsningar  Christofer Eriksson

column6: Familjärt, Serviceinriktat och Centralt beläget hotell i Lund
column7: En ren njutning att vara gäst på detta hotel. Som vanligt helt fläckfritt omdöme!! Med den grundmurade serviceinställning som personalen har så faller inget mellan några stolar. Ett föredömligt bemötande på alla nivåer

column6: Spartansk frukost med stark begränsad utbud som inte ligger i paritet med priset
column7: Saknar rätt mycket inte minst det gröna, frukt och det ekologiska utbudet. Det genuina läget finns men det stora förbättringspotentialet ligger i frukost delen. Väljer ett annat Hotel nästa gång pga av just frukostdelen.

Servicen på hotellet var mycket bra, rummet ganska stort och trivsamt. Det  centrala läget var mycket bra för oss, som kom med tåg. Trevligt även att vårt barnbarn fick en kopp kaffe på eftermiddagen. Även bra att vårt barnbarn och hennes pojkvän kunde äta frukost (mot betalning…

Stayed 2 nights in business. It's a strange layout as two long thin buildings have been joined with a central atrium. That looks Todd but I would not want an internal facing room. Would consider taking my partner next time.

Vi tillbringade en natt i slutet av april, i ett stort tvåbäddsrum med bäddsoffa. Tre personer sover bra där. Frukosten var fräsch men välbesökt vilket gjorde att det var ont om sittplatser och maträtterna tog slut. Hotellet har ingen egen parkering men det finns i närheten.…

column6: Like at home, in the center of Lund
column7: I've been visiting this hotel for my business trips in Lund, and I've been always feeling like being at home. Professional staff, clean and quiet. There is a sauna and gym free of charge, just be sure to book the sauna before, as if someone is already in, you cannot use it. I…

Неплохой отель, расположен недалеко от центра на тихой улочке. Завтрак нормальный, не самый разнообразный, но все вкусно. Парковки рядом с отелем нет. Звезды сняла за то, что сауна не работала. А так - номера чистые, кровати удобные, только в комнате прохладно.

column6: Nice, centrally located but not 4 stars...
column7: We stayed one night and the impression was OK. Its very centrally located, and the rooms are clean and staff friendly. However, this is certainly not a 4 star hotel. Breakfast was OK but basic, the gym is very basic as well as the relax department, bathrooms are basic and parts…

Buon hotel con colazione ricca. Professionale il servizio. Non è moderno, ma datato, eppure fa la sua figura. Il problema è stata la mia stanza che per una piccola parte ha il tetto che scende perché mansardato. Considerando che sono un metro e 90 per me non è stato il massimo.

Litet familjärt hotell men jag har svårt att se att det är värt 4 stjärnor. Mycket enkla rum, åtminstone de tre jag bott i. Ganska ordinär och ospännande frukost Vänlig och serviceinriktad personal Hotell ligger centralt nära station och nära affärer och restauranger.

column6: OK living in the center of town
column7: This is a centrally located Hotel that has been around forever.  A couple of years back they installed a rooftop bar, but it is very seldom open. OK rooms and OK breakfast, but the price point is why you would stay at this hotel.

Trevligt familjehotell inom gångavstånd från järnvägsstationen med bra frukost. Rummet var inte så stort men gemytligt och fräscht. Lobbyn är en inglasad innegård och saknade bar, men vi fick bra tips på lämpliga ställen inom promenadavstånd.
column8: Response from HotellLund, Owner at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Feb 10, 2016
column10: Kära gäst,  Stort tack för den fina recensionen! Vi har fullständiga alkoholrättigheter och serverar även små varma rätter i lobbyn. Ni beställer allt i receptionen/baren. Varmt välkommen tillbaka!  Med vänlig hälsning Christofer Eriksson VD/Ägare, Hotel Concordia

column6: What you expect is not what you exactly get
column7: The hotel is very close to the train station and the city centre, although Lund is not very big though :) The fact that is ranked 4 stars rises a lot of exceptions which are unfortunately not met. Rooms are extremely small, windows cannot be easily open and the bathroom is put…

column6: En av få HotelOaser i centrala Lund
column7: Alla som känner till Lund vet att Hotelmarknaden centralt domineras av 2 stora hotel som ligger under samma ägarhatt! Därför gläder det mig oerhört att sprida lite ljus över ett fantastiskt familjehotel som jag nyttjat under väldigt många år: både som affärsresande och vid…

Ett familjeägt hotell centralt i Lund. Tyvärr var man tvungen att ställa bilen flera kvarter bort då de inte hade några parkeringsmöjligheter på hotellet. Små men fina rum med allt som man behöver. Duschen var dock i slöaste laget med mycket dåligt tryck. Fin frukost och trevlig…

Das Concordia ist ein angenehmes Hotel mit individueller Note, das günstig im Stadtzentrum mit seinen netten Restaurants und Bars liegt. Mein Einzelzimmer war schon etwas klein, aber sauber und zweckmäßig. (Als Geschäftsreisender halte ich mich da nur wenig im Zimmer auf...) Es…

This is a small hotel in a very quiet area but still only 10 minutes walk from the train station.  Staff were very helpful - I had been booked into a very small room by Hogg Robinson Group, but was offered a larger room at the same rate (won't be using them again). I was right…

column6: Helt ok hotell med bra läge, men vilken rörig lobby med för mycket möbler
column7: Fick ett hörnrum som var rymligt och fint. Men trist möblerat och hårda sängar med tunna sängkläder i syntet. Mer trestjärnigt än fyrstjärnigt. Fint badrum med bra dusch. Provade inte frukosten och inte heller gymet.

L'hotel si trova non lontano dalla stazione. Le camere che abbiamo visto sono molto piccole, con un odore strano e i bagni senza finestre. Il personale alla reception non si è dimostrato molto cooperativo né cortese alle richieste della clientela... Non torneremo, a Lund c'è…

The hotel is in walking distance of the station, university and downtown, yet in a quiet location. It is a family owned independent hotel. Reception and staff were very welcoming and helpful. I stayed here only for one night, so cannot judge all services (like the sauna), as I…

Ett helt okej hotell centralt i Lund. Upplevde rummet som enkelt men med skön säng och bra städning. Svinkallt på badrummet trots elementet på max! Frukostbuffén var medelmåttig men ändå helt OK. Fanns en schysst "relaxavdelning" med bastu sol var OK, och några stolar utanför…

column6: Nice and cozy place for business traveller
column7: The hotel is among the best I tried in Lund, located close (few minutes walking) to the train station, yet very quiet. The single room was small, clean and perfect to spend the night, and the bed was comfortable. WLAN worked fine the whole time. Breakfast had a good Swedish and…

This is a lovely hotel in central Lund, about 6 mins walk from the train station. Rooms are small but they have everything you need, the breakfast is great with plenty of choices. Staff are really friendly, would definitely recommend this for a stay.

Located 10 minutes (walk) from the railway station, the hotel is clean and the staff helpful. Breakfast buffet is good. Rooms are small but adequate. Several shops, bars and restaurants near by. Hotel also has restaurant and desk sells soft drinks and beer.

I was attending a workshop in Lund and took an early flight from Stockholm (got up 4 AM). Very tired and hungry, I stumbled into the lobby HOURS before check-in. Asked if I could buy a cup of coffee and a sandwich and sit down and wait for the organisers. The receptionist…

The Hotel is located in a center of the city which make it convenient. The staff were nice and helpful. the quality of the room was average. they don't have a parking lot which is down point. there is pay parking lot close by.

Man kommer in i atmosfär av hemkänsla och elegans på en gång. Supersköna sängar, behaglig belysning, wifi som funkar utan problem, härlig frukost och sist men inte minst en hög serviceanda där man känner sig som en VIP! Vi återkommer gärna dit. Annika och Jan-Erik Månsson

column6: Very helpful staff in central located hotel
column7: Centrally located hotel. Good breakfast incl. traditional Swedish, eggs, pancakes, cereal, fruit, bread, juices. What I really appreciated was how helpful the staff were when I arrived from Australia with my luggage still in Dusseldorf. They contacted the baggage agent for me on…

column6: Nice family hotel in central Lund
column7: We have stayed here many times over the last ten years.  The staff is very accommodating, the breakfasts are great, and the location is very handy to shopping, the train station, the University, and good restaurants.  Highly recommend it.

column6: Mysigt, men skärpning på bemötande och val av rum
column7: Väl placerat. Mitt i stan, mysigt. Vi fick dock ett rum som vette in mot en innergård med insyn. Det är inte vad man vill ha oavsett vilket tillbud man nyttjar. Temperaturen nattetid låg med marginal över 25 grader, varmt, för varmt. Ok frukost. Saknade bullar och wienerbröd.…

column6: There may be better rooms in this hotel
column7: Overall, the hotel makes a good impression, but I got a really tiny single room, where I had to spend one night. It certainly did not deserve the four stars, the hotel is awarded with. The same applies to the breakfast, which was very basic. However, there was a big plus, the…

column6: Lovely family run hotel in central Lund
column7: My family and I had a lovely stay here during 'Kultur Natten'. The location is superb - very central but away from the noise of the nightlife. The hotel itself is attractive and well maintained with an impressive atrium and charming layout. The staff were professional, warm and…

Hotellet är välbeläget nära centrum av Lund. Det är en äldre byggnad som gjorts om till hotell. Enkelrummet var ganska litet men OK utom badrummet. Duschens termostatblandare fungerade inte utan släppte bara fram mycket varmt vatten. Jag påpekade detta för receptionen, som…

Ett litet familjärt hotell med mycket god service. Mycket trevlig och serviceminded personal. God och riklig frukostbuffé i lugn miljö. Gott om tidningar typ DN, Svenska Dagbladet och Sydöstran. Alla rum jag hittills bott i är olika. Litet minus för att gymmet inte var så…

column6: I stayed for two days, while attending a conference in Lund
column7: The room was small, but clean and quiet. The bed was comfortable and the breakfast quite OK. The hotel standard was good average no luxery..But good enough for me. Friendly attendants and help whenever needed. And location was central, almost anything close at hand, in  this…

column6: Perfekt läge för en kort vistelse i staden
column7: Fräscht rum, bra läge, mysig lounge och reception. Frukostrummet var ganska tråkigt, lite känsla av skolmatsal. Bra mottagande när vi anlände av manlig receptionist. Flickan i receptionen på morgonen var inte lika serviceinriktad, vi fick vänta på kontakt medan hon talade i…

column6: Great hotel in the heart of Lund
column7: Great hotel right in the heart of downtown Lund. We stayed 7 days while we were visiting family. Our beds were comfortable and we had two sitting chairs, along with a desk and chair in our room. There was a little gym with a rowing machine, elliptical and bike as well as some…

Trevligt hotell med härliga rum och mycket hjälpsam personal. Kanske lite dålig information om hur incheckningen fungerade. Vi kom dit runt 02.00 och trodde man behövde tagg för att komma in och resten av sällskapet kom senare men kunde checka in då reseptionen var bemannad.…

column6: Ett personligt hotell med professionell service
column7: I mitten av maj 2015 besökte jag och ett mindre sällskap Lund och hade då förmånen att övernatta på hotel Concordia, centralt beläget i Lunds äldre kvarter, på gångavstånd från tågstationen. Vi möttes av bekväma och fräscha rum, en generös frukostbuffé och inte minst, ett mycket…

L'albergo è situato a pochi minuti a piedi dalla stazione di Lund e dal suo centro. Situato in due edifici contigui, la reception è ricavata dalla ricopertura in vetro dello spazio tra i due edifici. Le stanze sono ben tenute e il personale è molto gentile e disponibile ad…

Hotel classificato come 4 stelle, ma classificabile come 3 stelle per gli standard italiani. Si tratta di un'antica residenza di mercanti imparentata con Tycho Brahe nei pressi della quale aveva soggiornato August Strindberg, ma il comfort è rimasto quello di quei tempi.  Mentre…

Location-wise, the hotel is just a 10 minute walk from Lund Central Station, but the cobblestones along the way could spell death for your luggage, so be sure to use those with good wheels if you're going to walk to the hotel.  Stayed here for 4 nights for work and we got the…

Hade betalat och bokat för ett större rum enligt receptionen fick jag ett bättre rum. Rummet var litet med små fönster. slitna golv och möbler och det som skulle vara extra bra var badrummet med badkar som inte var något speciellt. På morgonen var frukosten inte bra heller, det…

column6: Lovely hotel in a lovely city
column7: Well-modernised, charming old hotel right in the centre of Lund - just about 5 minutes' walk from the station. Reception was very friendly, my room was clean and comfortable, and there was plenty to eat for breakfast. I wish I had stayed longer!

Vi var ett antal personer från olika länder på det företag som jag jobbar för som bodde ett antal nätter på hotellet, samt vi hade en endags konferens på hotellet.   Bemötandet var varmt välkommande med en personlig touche. Allting med konferensen fungerade utan anmärkning. …

Hotel Concordia är hotellet med många pluspoäng Plus för: + Välskött familjehotell med centralt läge och i lugn miljö utan störande trafik + Charmigt hotell, inrett i byggnad med historia från Strindbergs dagar + Nära till matställen, shopping och alla sevärdheter + Personligt…

Vi var flere på forretningsrejse, som skulle overnatte i hvert vores værelse. Efter første nat tog vi på arbejde, men da vi kom tilbage var min kollega blevet tjekket ud og hotellet havde taget hans kuffert ud af værelset og stillet den et andet sted. Vi fik at vide, at nu var…

Jag bodde på detta charmiga och välskötta familjeägda hotell i fyra nätter i mars i år. Snygga, bekväma och välstädade rum mitt i centrala Lund. Mycket bra hotellfrukost och charmig ägarinna som ger en personlig prägel på besöket och får en att känna sig välkommen. Litet minus…

Hotellet har bästa tänkbara läge i city med gångavstånd från järnvägsstation, men ändå lugnt vad gäller trafik och gatuljud. Personalen är välkomnande och miljön är ombonad. Har bott här förut och var då mycket nöjd med mitt rum. Denna gång fick jag ett rum högst upp, vilket var…

El hotel esta situado en pleno centro de Lund, muy cerca tanto de la estación central como del centro histórico.  La habitación no esta mal de tamaño. Algo viejo todo el mobiliario y el baño. No entiendo la costumbre nórdica de no poner platos de ducha y que al ducharte inundes…

This old hotel once had charm, but now it is neither charming nor modern. Not even something in the middle.  Room was very well used and furniture had definitely seen better days. Towels and bathrobes were almost see trough material because they've been used for so many years.…

I stayed here along with a group visiting my company's gobal HQ. The hotel feels more like a B&B, with quaint decor and less modern appliances and fixtures. It was very clean, but I heard others in my group complain of small rooms and inconsistent heating. My room was spacious…

Very well located, this is a clean, friendly hotel. As others have said the breakfast is good, with a good choice between hot and cold food, the shower was wonderfully hot but the rooms are a little basic.
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Feb 5, 2015
column10: Dear "CrustyOxford",  Thank you for your nice review of our hotel!  We hope to see you soon again.  Welcome back anytime!  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson

column7: So close to the city centre and to the central station, you can arrive in 2 minutes in the central square. The hotel is really nice and characterized by a classical style. The room is quite big, comfortable and clean. The breakfast is good and you can choose between the European…
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Feb 5, 2015

column7: Just back from three days working in Lund, stayed at the Concordia and have to stay had a great stay. The hotel is situated right in the heart of beautiful Lund, close to absolutely everywhere so no need for taxis. The rooms themselves are not massive but they are clean and well…

We had a very pleasant stay for two nights in the Concordia hotel. The staff was friendly and service minded, our room was spacious overlooking the street. We had a cot in our room which had very nice baby sheets / duvets. You feel that there is a lot of attention to details in…

I have been staying regularly for more than 15 years at Concordia. During that time the hotel has grown and been rebuilt. The staff has changed but has always remained  attentive and nice. Of course it has become more expensive but it is well worth the price.

Concordia Hotel in Lund has a beautiful Scandinavian design. It is centrally located, near everything that counts - train station, shops, restaurants, central area, university. Everything is walkable. The room I had was single, not very big, but very well equipped. The bathroom…

Nettes kleines Hotel in perfekter Lage für abendliche Stadtbummel. Das Hotel liegt in einer ruhigen Straße, nachts kein Lärm.  Das Frühstück ist üppig, für jeden etwas dabei an den in Buffetform aufgebauten Tischen.

We visited Lund to see my son who is studying there so just wanted a base, no frills hotel.   The staff were extremely friendly and helpful, (we forgot our iphone charger so they lent us one).  The sauna was wonderful after a day or sightseeing and sore feet!!  Breakfast was…

Fräscht rum men uschliga kuddar. Varför snålar man på sånt? Fönstret satt lite högt upp vilket gjorde det svårt att se ut. Ger faktiskt lite källarkänsla trots att rummet låg högst upp. Frukosten mycket bra, om än lite få platser. Besynnerlig rumsnumrering. Lite knepigt att…

column6: Rum 307 - om du vill bli bortskämd
column7: Concordia är ett trevligt hotell. Inte coolt, inte modernt men hemtrevligt. Vi bodde i rum 307 och blev rejält bortskämda av det väl tilltagna rummet med egen soffhörna. Ligger dessutom nära den sköna bastun som går att boka - rekommenderas för regniga dagar!

Hotell Concordia i Lund är ett trivsamt, familjeägt hotell med bra priser, inrymt i ett hus byggt 1828 i centrala stan. Mitt enkelrum åt gatan var ganska litet men bekvämt, utrustat med strykjärn, strykbräda och platt-TV. Frukostbuffén är varierad och riklig och personalen är…

Concordia ligger i centrala Lund. Det är gångväg till de stora attraktionerna som domkyrkan och Lundagård men museum. Det finns bara gott att säga om detta hotell som dessutom ligger bredvid huset där August Strindberg bodde under sin tid. Som Ni märker, nära till allt även…

Bokade i god tid en weekend med ett dubbelrum superior på Hotell Concordia i Lund. Jag och hustrun kom till hotellet fredagen den 26/9 vid klockan 16:15 för att checka in. Vi framförde vid bokningen önskemål om ett rum med badkar men detta gick inte att lösa sade mannen i…
column8: Response from HotellLund, Hotelldirektör at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Oct 2, 2014
column10: Hej kära gäster,  Tack för er recension. När vi i ledningen pratade med er nu i lördags 27/9, så lovade vi er en mycket bra kompensation. Vi tyckte att det var ett utmärkt samtal med er och att ni trots allt var nöjda och tacksamma för den kompensation som vi föreslog. Därför blev vi faktiskt en aning förvånade när vi läste er recension här på Tripadvisor, där ni inte ens nämner att vi har haft ett samtal med er och där ni har blivit erbjuden kompensation.   En rad olyckliga små omständigheter ledde till att er totala vistelse inte levde upp till era förväntningar. Vi ska bättra på våra rutiner ytterligare, när det gäller påfyllnad av schampo/tvål. Detta kontrolleras i nuläget av våra våningsvärdinnor 1 gång/dag. Vi kan också bekräfta att det rum som ni bodde i är ett Dubbelrum Superior, men dock ett av våra minsta av våra 27 dubbelrum. Eftersom detta rum ligger högst upp på 3:e vån, så förstår vi inte vad ni menar med er beskrivning av källarkänsla?!  I förra veckan hade vi ett kontrollbesök av en kontrollant gällande hotellklassificering av antal stjärnor och vi kan mycket glatt samt stolt berätta att vår poängnivå innebär att vi är ett starkt 4-stjärnigt hotell. Därför känns det naturligtvis inte roligt för någon av oss, när ni har haft denna mindre bra upplevelse hos oss. Som ni kan se på tidigare gästomdömen t ex här på Tripadvisor, så har vi haft många nöjda gäster.  Vi hoppas ni kan ge oss en ny chans, så vi kan visa er att vi definitivt är ett charmigt och 4-stjärnigt hotell mitt i Lunds centrum!  Varmt välkommen tillbaka!   Christofer Eriksson

column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Sep 11, 2014
column10: Dear Natlhw,  Thank you for staying with us and for your review of our hotel.  We are very pleased to read your excellent comments about our breakfast!  Some responses to your other comments:  -We only have bright parquet floors in every guest rooms, no carpets.  In the corridors we have wall to wall carpets, they were put in 2009 and are presented in a very good condition.   -During 2012/2013 we renovated 15 bathrooms completely and these bathrooms, 8 with a bathtub, provide a really high standard. In keeping our ambition of maintaining a 4-star level, like we always have done, we will renovate the final 3 older bathrooms this winter season, including the bathroom in room 309. We totally agree with you that this bathroom in room 309 needs a renovation. After these bathroom renovations, all the bathrooms throughout the hotel are presented in a very good condition.  Welcome back to us at Hotel Concordia next time in Lund!  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson and all the staff members
