Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson and all the staff members

column6: A very comfortable and enjoyable stay
column7: We stayed for four nights:  two days work (for my husband) and two days sightseeing together.  This cosy and welcoming hotel is situated in the centre of Lund on a quiet back street within easy walking distance of the shops and sites.  We asked for a quiet room on the top floor…
column8: Response from HotellLund, Ägare at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Oct 2, 2014
column10: Dear Daisywoodbank,  Thank you for staying with us and for your nice review of our hotel.  We really appreciate you taking time writing about us. In particularly we liked your comments about how quite and relaxing the hotel is. The hotel are situated in the absolute centre of Lund, on a quite street walking distance to most sights.  Our staff and I were very happy when we read your nice review. We got so much positive energy from your review! We are always very satisfied when our main service goal is fulfilled - to be able to give you and all our guests a really pleasant stay at our hotel. This is why we all enjoy working at Hotel Concordia.  Please visit us soon again!   Welcome back to us at Hotel Concordia next time in Lund!  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson and all the staff members

column6: AN SUPERB HOTEL IN THE CENTRAL OF LUND
column7: This beautiful little hotel is in the central area of Lund. It has clean small rooms with everything you need. Great staff and a great breakfast with everything!! If I were visiting Lund I would absolutely stay here!

Stayed here for 2 nights and more than happy with everything on offer here. Comfortable rooms, friendly staff and ticks all the boxes for a business trip.  Would recommened and stay again - if after something more luxurious maybe try the Grand which is another step up I believe…

column6: Vilken stimulerande miljö för kropp och själ!
column7: Vilken enastående och stimulerande miljö och fristad för tankar, begrundan,samtal etc. i en anda av Concordia. Ett latinskt ord som betyder Harmoni.  Hotellet är behagligt beläget bortom trafik och larm och ändå mitt i den brusande stadskärnan.   Där råder ett vänligt och…

Godt hotel med flinke medarbejdere og en udmærket morgenmads servering. Centralt beliggende i Lund med gode restauranter lige om hjørnet. Enkel værelserne er fine men ikke de største, hvis det bare er for at overnatte er det dog helt fint.

A small, independent hotel that takes environmental responsibility.  When I arrived late and hungry the receptionist offered me a free sandwich. Even though the room I stayed in was quite small and basic for its price I still recommend it if you are looking for something other…

Spend 3 nights in October 2013.  The hotel is very central. It looks it was constructed from a few old buildings. The reception is located in the old common backyard. Quite nice. The room feels old with a face lift but is quite spacious and has a few amenities : fridge, safe,…

This is my kind of hotel, hassle free. It is not cheap, but within Lund's prices. It doesn't feel posh, as it has no luxuries. The staff is never in your face but is very helpful if you need anything. Nice cosy lobby.  The room was clean, and it had all the amenities: ironing…

Concordia is located in the center of Lund. It is walking distance to everything you usually need. The personal is very friendly and service minded, specially the girls in working in the lobby. The rooms are quite different from each other. But I think they have character, at…

I stayed in Concordia, for two nights in September. The hotel is in well located in the center. The rooms are too small, a bit basic, and they have a really small shower. The rooms are dark,  and with no special view. That is a bit disappointing.  Breakfast is served between 7 -…

column6: quiet, friendly, well located family-run Swedish hotel
column7: quiet, friendly, well located family-run Swedish hotel are all the pluses but the rooms are very small and felt cramped and old-fashioned with very little space for anyone with large luggage and there really isn’t any decent space if you’re on business and need to work from your…

column6: Gute Lage, Nette Atmosphere, Gutes Personal
column7: Lage: Gut 10 Minuten zu Fuß vom Bahnhof entfernt, und nur knapp 5 Minuten vom Dom. Das Hotel liegt zentral, aber in ruhiger Seitenstraßenlage.  Mein Zimmer: Ich hatte ein Economy Single gebucht und viel mehr war es auch nicht. Ein schmales Einzelbett, ein Fernseher, ein…

I really would like a family owned hotel to be a success, but this one isn't. They have a very ambitious folder describing how much they love their hotel and how they keep improving their business, but in reality, sadly, it is nowhere to be seen.  The house itself is worn down…

very good hotel in the heart of Lund.. the rooms are small but very comfortable; I had one overlooking the back, no great view but plenty of sun streaming in through the large windows, an excellent breakfast, and very charming, friendly and helpful young women at the front desk…

Bekvämt avstånd från tågstationen och restauranger. Fin, gammal byggnad.  Killen i receptionen var inte särskilt intresserad i oss. Rummet var ganska litet och inte renoverat men rent och mysigt. Blev dock lite besviken på frukosten, hade väntat mig mer.

I april gjorde jag ett besök i Lund och bodde på Concordia. Vi hade ett möte för  Inner Wheel, en internationell damklubb. Birgitta, hotellvärdinnan tillhör samma organisation och vi fick ett strålande bemötande. Vi hade vårt möte på hotellet och åt också middag där.(det är inte…

Jag har bott här flera gånger och det brukar vara bra om man hamnar i rätt rum. Centralt och bra i Lund. Fastigheten är gammal och det kan begränsa möjligheten till rumsstorlekar och allmän logistik, så det får man räkna med. Det är dock en del av charmen med detta hotell. I år…

column6: Good combination of value, comfort and convenience..
column7: I stayed in the Concordia for 2 nights in March.  It was close to train station, and situated in a interesting and safe part of the town. It is very welcoming and provided a good breakfast.  I had a single room that was small but comfortable, and very clean.  Reception staff…

Ett utmärkt hotell med trevlig personal och en engagerad ledning. Rummet var mycket fint, som en mini svit. Sov riktigt gott i den sköna sängen. Visst har jag upplevt större utbud på frukostbuffén men den var helt OK. Ska jag besöka Lund igen så bokar jag in på samma rum!  Tack…

I am beyond surprised to read positive reviews for this hotel.  I had a "pleasure" of staying at this hotel twice. Both times I was booked by the University. This time going to Lund I specifically asked not to be placed there.  Yes, the hotel is family owned and I think the…

I had booked a single occupancy room for three nights stay at this hostel. Although it is a small hotel but good value for the budget. Almost everything was clean and good service. The breakfast place bit small but good quality breakfast was served.

The hotel is very conveniently located in the old part of the city, in walking distance from the train station. Although it is a 4 stars, it is not superluxury. However, it is very clean and comfortable. The best thing is its staff, very kind and accessible. Breaksfast is good…

column6: Very nice staff and cozy hotel
column7: Very nice staff, and good service. The hotel is different than city hotel that are so crowded and big, this one is small and cozy. I stayed 5 nights, the breakfast was good quality and generous, but exactly the same every day.

checkade in och fick ett rum som vette mot en innergård där också receptionen låg. Mycket kvavt och varmt i rummet. Gick inte att vädra. Receptionen erbjöd en fläkt till ingen nytta. Nästa dag blev jag överflyttad till ett trevligt och betydligt större rum mot gatan. Ok frukost…
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Feb 18, 2013
column10: Kära gäst,  Tack för er recension av vårt 4-stjärniga hotell. Vi har precis totalrenoverat 10 rum med nykaklade badrum med badkar på 9 rum.   Vi har 5 rum av hotellets totalt 62 rum som vetter in mot innegården/lobbyn och dessa är renoverade 2007 och är i bra skick. Fönstrena på dessa rum öppnas inåt lobbyn. Vi blev glada att Ni uppskattade det andra rummet bättre än det första som Ni blev tilldelad. Gällande Er kommentar om hotellets frukost, som till stor del består av ekologiska och kvalitetsprodukter, så måste jag faktiskt nämna att vår frukost är mycket omtyckt. Eftersom vi inte erbjuder någon restaurang, så har vi lagt all vår energi och satsar allt vi kan på att kunna erbjuda en bra och varierande frukostbuffé, året runt!   Eftersom vi lägger ner så mycket tid och energi på frukosten, så uppskattar vi verkligen de många positiva kommentarer som vi får, gällande vår frukostbuffé, från de allra flesta av våra gäster. På frukostbuffen erbjuds många olika produkter, bl a följande: Färskpressad juice från Brämhults(inga tillsatser, etc), kaffe, te, varm choklad, smoothies som vi mixar själva (väldigt populära!), pannkakor, köttbullar, prinskorvar, äggröra, bacon, sill (5 sorter), ost- och skinkpålägg av många olika sorter, sylt(3 sorter), marmelad, leverpastej, nybakade bullar (6 olika sorter) från ett närliggande bageri, fiberbröd, filmjölk, müsli, flingor(många olika sorter), Proviva-drycker(5 olika sorter), annanas, gurka, tomat, hårdkokt och löskokt ägg, etc. Ni får gärna kontakta mig på 046-13 50 50. Det skulle vara intressant att höra vilka produkter som Ni tyckte saknades på vår omtyckta frukostbuffé. Vi strävar ju alltid efter att bli bättre!   Varmt välkommen tillbaka till oss och då ska vi verkligen försöka få  er att tycka om vår frukost ännu mer!  Bästa hälsningar  Christofer Eriksson

column7: Underttecknad har varit gäst på hotell Concodia i Lund och vill härmed framföra mitt djupt kända tack. Hotellet håller en mycket hög standard till förmånliga priser. Rummens bekvämlighet och rymlighet, sköna sängar samt tystnaden innebär, att man sover gott. Till rummen hör ett…

column6: Cozy Hotel in the Heart of Lund
column7: Hotel Concordia is a pleasant haven in this university town.  It is just a few blocks from the train station and is a quick walk to the university and steps away from shopping and restaurants.  The staff is very friendly and they do their best to make your stay comfortable.  The…
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Feb 15, 2013
column10: Dear guest "Filmproof",  Thank you for your kind review of our hotel!  We hope to see you soon again at Hotel Concordia in Lund!  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson

column7: I have stayed only once at Concordia, but the experience makes me inclined to agree with the 4- and 5-star reviews here. The hotel rightly claims to be personal. It is a family business and not part of any hotel chain, and it is ethical inasmuch as it uses ecological products…
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Feb 15, 2013
column10: Dear Jan-Olof B,  Thank you for your kind review of our hotel!  We specially apreciate your comments of our big glass walls between the managers office and the hotel lobby. This solution enables us to have a direct contact with our guests and the result of this open environment  is many positive guest meetings.  We hope to see you soon again at Hotel Concordia in Lund!  Welcome back!  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson

column7: We asked for a Family room and ended up with 2 connected roof level Hotel rooms. Miss Teen was ecstatic as she had her own bathroom, TV, etc . . . so were we. We were roughly 500m from the Train station, so great day trip to Malmo, and within easy walking distance to the centre…
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Feb 15, 2013
column10: Dear Robyn E,  Thank you for taking time to write this nice review our hotel!  The Family Room category is pretty new (from 2012) at Concordia and  it is very satisfying to here that our families enjoy this solution with a connection door and 2 seperate bathrooms.   In the beginning of March 2013, we will finish the renovation of the bigger  bathroom in the Family room and then we can also offer a full size bathtub  (excellent for example families with small kids), which many guests have  suggested to us.  We hope to see you soon again and welcome back to us!  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson  .

column7: I´ve stayed at Concordia several days every week and it have become my second home. Concordia have got it all, wonderful staff, gym, relax, nice room and you can be sure to sleep well in their beds. The staff and the hotel director are very serviceminded.....just ask:)
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Feb 15, 2013
column10: Dear Carin B,   Thank you for your kind review of our hotel! We are so fortunate to have you as our regular hotel guest.    We hope to see you soon again at Hotel Concordia in Lund!  Welcome back!  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson

column7: Vi hade en dagskonferens i vad som jag nog inte betraktar som den lämpligaste lokalen,tillika ganska trång. Lund är lite bökigt om man kommer med bil så det är lite knepigt med parkeringen.Hotellet har förvisso atmosfär men det känns inte som de riktigt orkar upp till 4 stjärnor…

I have stayed at many hotels in the world but hotel Concordia is one of the absolute best, may be the best I ever have stayed at. This was my first time at this hotel and I stayed there for three weeks. The staff at the hotel was wonderful, so helpful and kindly and the hotel…
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Feb 15, 2013
column10: Dear Gustaf S,  Thank you for your kind review of our hotel!  We hope to see you soon again at Hotel Concordia in Lund!  Welcome back!  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson

column7: we think that this hotel is very nice and we love being here and we like the people that works here.  the breakfast is very good and it's good that the hotel has a gym and a relax. we would like to stay here more times in the future
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Feb 15, 2013
column10: Dear Erik M,  Thank you for your kind review of our hotel!  We hope to see you soon again at Hotel Concordia in Lund!  Welcome back!  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson

column7: I´ve stayed at Concordia several times during the last ten years. I´ve alwyas been welcomed extraordinary well by the wonderful staff and the hotel director. The hotel offers everything you can ask for... nice rooms, nice breakfast, and relax and gym facilities. But again, I…
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Feb 15, 2013
column10: Dear Peter A,  Thank you for your kind review of our hotel and specially for the  very positive comments about the staff team at the hotel!   We hope to see you soon again at Hotel Concordia in Lund!  Welcome back!  Best Regards  Christofer Eriksson

column7: My wife and I arrived by car one Friday afternoon for a stay over the weekend. The hotel is situated in the city center. Due to several sign posts there was no problem to find the hotel.  We had mad a reservation of a standard double room. The room was excellent with two very…
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Nov 1, 2012
column10: Dear Lars,  Thank you for your positive review and welcome back whenever you´re in Lund!   Tomorrow, 2 nov 2012, we enhance our breakfast buffet service level by start serving smoothies(strawberry/banana/etc) and freshly pressed orange juice!! We did a guest survey and these 2 products were lacking at the breakfast buffet according to our guests. But not anymore. We always try to listen to our guests opions, our guests always comes first! Next time you stay with us you can enjoy those nice products in the morning.   Best Regards  Christofer

column7: Stayed here for a business trip. Very central hotel right in the heart of Lund. Although Lund is quite small its still nice to be in the 'thick of it'.  Room lovely and clean, complete with fluffy bath robes, tea and coffee making facilities, although no milk or sugar funnilly…
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Nov 1, 2012
column10: Dear David,  Thank you for taking the time of reviewing our hotel and your stay with us.  We are also, of course, very pleased that you had a nice stay with us.  Regarding the none existens of Pay-TV channels at Concordia. Today we offer 3 movie channels and we want our guests to be able to see high quality movies for free. No extra costs. However, if you still want to see a movie at a certain time of the day, our internet connection speed is almost always fast enough for viewing the movie on a laptop. There are plenty of movie sites on the Internet were you can pay and download movies. If you don´t have a laptop with you, we are happy to lend you one during your next stay with us!  Tomorrow, 2 nov 2012, we enhance our breakfast buffet service level by start serving smoothies(strawberry/banana/etc) and freshly pressed orange juice!! We did a guest survey and these 2 products were lacking at the breakfast buffet according to our guests. But not anymore. We always try to listen to our guests opions, our guests always comes first! Next time you stay with us you can enjoy those nice products in the morning.   Thank you for your positive review and welcome back whenever you´re in Lund!  Best Regards

column7: Ett fint och prisvärt hotell i centrala Lund. Bra service och underbar frukostbuffe. Bastun var ett extra plus i kanten, ett måste om man sover på Concordia.Jag och min familj rekommenderar varmt detta hotell. Tack för en underbar vistelse. Vi kommer att återkomma!

Fantastiskt läge i centrum av Lund nära kommunikationer, grön områden och trevliga restauranger. Men därvid stannar tyvärr superlativerna.Placeras i pyttelitet enkelrum med unken lukt, mycket slitet och utan utrymme att placera resväska. Trots intensiv vädring försvinner inte…

column6: Good hotel, tiny rooms, great service
column7: Located just few street corners off the main square of the city, Hotel Concordia is a flawless, yet rather tiny, hotel. And by tiny I mean the rooms are rather small, and walls are quite thin. But that's a minor minus, everything else in this hotel works; service is great (they…
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Nov 1, 2012
column10: Dear Timo,  I just read your review and I particularly appreciate that you liked our free for our guests and fast Wi-Fi system throughout the hotel. We´ve just installed 2 new powerful access points with antennas on the 3rd floor, this because we really want our guests to get the best possible Internet connection in all our guest rooms and public areas. The max speed is 100 Mbit/s Internet connection with the fiber to the hotel building.  Tomorrow, 2 nov 2012, we enhance our breakfast buffet service level by start serving smoothies(strawberry/banana/etc) and freshly pressed orange juice!! We did a guest survey and these 2 products were lacking at the breakfast buffet according to our guests. But not anymore. We always try to listen to our guests opions, our guests always comes first! Next time you stay with us you can enjoy those nice products in the morning.   Thank you for your positive review and welcome back whenever you´re in Lund!  Best Regards  Christofer

column6: Great place to stay in Lund
column7: I chose the Concordia as a cheaper alternative to the Grand, which I'd stayed at the previous night, and despite it being about a third of the price it was better than the Grand.  The rooms were decently-sized (for an inner-city European hotel), everything was clean and new, and…
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Nov 1, 2012
column10: Dear Sir,  We are so pleased that you had a great stay at Concordia. Thank you for your positive review and welcome back whenever you´re in Lund! column7: Hotellet er enkelt, ordentligt og hyggeligt. Det er en ældre bygning, som der er taget vel vare på ved renovering. Der er fri forsyning af kaffe, te og kakao døgnet rundt. Overnattede i et enkeltværelse få trin op fra stueetagen. Der er direkte kig fra/til vinduer i nabo ejendom…

My stay at Hotel Concordia was one of the best experiences I've found anywhere!  My single room was very small, but perfect for one person.  It was clean and the bed was extremely comfortable.  The street outside my room was very quiet as was the hotel in general.  Overall, the…
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Sep 25, 2012
column10: Dear Sir,  We were so very pleased when we read your positive review of our hotel!  We can´t thank you enough for those kind words and we truly hope to see you again at Concordia! Welcome back anytime!  Best Regards  Christofer

column7: Das Hotel ist in einer ruhigen Strasse in der Nähe das Bahnhofs gelegen. Die Zimmer waren geräumig, allerdings schon etwas in die Jahre gekommen. Das Frühstück war reichhaltig, einzig die Qualität des Kaffees liess zu wünschen übrig. Insgesamt ein gutes Haus, auch wenn ich nicht…
Excellent hotel. Staff very pleasant. Breakfast was super.
column8: Responded Jun 26, 2012
column10: Dear Madame/Sir,  Thank you for your review of our hotel!  We are very pleased that you had a great stay at our hotel!  Welcome back and have great summer!!  Best Regards  Manager Director  Christofer Eriksson

column7: Admittedly we walked in off the street and were rather windswept, but I still don't think we should have been given the feeling that the hotel was doing us a favor by allowing us to stay. The receptionist was polite, but not welcoming. On finding that we had been given a double…
column8: Responded Jun 26, 2012
column10: Dear Madame/Sir,  Thank you for your review of our hotel!  We apologies for the trouble we caused by offering you a double room with seperate beds. We should also, of course, have helped you with your luggage when you requested a change of room. Regarding your remarks concerning the parking, we actually do inform that the multi car parking garage is situated only aprox. 100 mtrs from the hotel.   We hope that you´ll return to us for a better experience the next time.  Have a great summer!  Best Regards  Manager Director  Christofer Eriksson

column6: 与酒店介绍严重不符，性价比低
column7: 这家酒店自称4星级，在各种网站上贴出的照片和自我介绍都非常好，但实际情况很糟糕，1500瑞典克朗一晚的双人间非常小，而且是阁楼层，据前台说，这是他们最好的房型，再好就是套房，结果看了一下套房就在我们隔壁，也基本上一样。…
Went here for only one night. Very nice rooms and perfect beds. Quiet even if the street was just outside the room.

column7: Hotel Concordia is a nice hotel in central Lund, very good service, nice staff, clean and tidy.

Ein älteres Stadtgebäude, das aber total renoviert wurde (alte Fassade, neuer Kern). Das Personal ist sehr freundlich. Die Zimmer sind zweckmässig eingerichtet, aber etwas klein. WLAN im ganzen Haus (gratis). Kleiner Frühstücksraum mit etwas engem Buffetbereich. In…

column6: 3.5 stars for great location and staff, but shabby room
column7: Great central location.  Very helpful staff (much appreciated!).   Rooms are old and nothing special.  Small gym works alright.  Morning breakfast helps.
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Mar 27, 2012

column7: Jag är enbart positiv till all personal, mycket trevligt bemötande, hjälpsamma till tusen. En underbart god och varierande frukost. Trevligt rum. Bodde här när jag besökte min canceropererade syster liggande på sjukhuset, de beställde taxi x flera. Fick ha kvar min väska efter…
column8: Response from HotellLund, General Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Mar 27, 2012
column10: Kära Gäst,  Tack för Er jättefina recension och vi är mycket glada att Ni trivdes så bra hos oss!  Alla vi på Concordia önskar verkligen allt gott för Din syster framöver.  Varmt välkommen tillbaka!  Christofer Eriksson Managing Director

column6: Nice interiors but dated and small rooms
column7: I booked Concordia because of the good reviews here but was disappointed. The rooms are small for the price paid, the breakfast is pretty average and the hotel is becoming quite dated to the detriment of its past glory. If  If you need to stay in the region I would recommend the…

Hotel sélectionné sur les avis que j'ai pu lire et les photos de l'hotel disponibles sur différents sites. Les plus de l'hotel sont sa proximité avec le centre ville et la gare, le quartier calme et plaisant où il se situe. La chambre réservée pour une personne ne ressemblait…

column6: En oase i en spændende by
column7: Skal I til Lund, kan I ikke bo et bedre sted end på Concordia. Dejlig atmosfære og søde mennesker. Fine værelser og gode priser. Glæder mig til at komme igen ...... Hilsen Marianne Lüth, Kastrup, Danmark

古いビルの外壁のようなタイル張りがされた吹き抜けのフロントは不思議な雰囲気のする空間でした。二つのビルを一つに合わせたような感じです。この空間をみるために泊まってみるのもいいかも。ただし、部屋もベッドもシャワールームも価格からすると狭く、ぜいたくな個人旅行には不向きかと思います。駅から歩く距離はそれほど長くないのですが、石畳みの道路なので重いスーツケースがあると女性だと移動がたいへんかもしれません。もっとも場所は分かりやすく、夜に到着しても歩いて行けました。朝食は可もなく不可もなく、普通でした。

column6: Centrally located, comfortable and gracious hotel
column7: Fully renovated building from the 1800s in the medieval centre of Lund, with comfortable beds, clean bathrooms, an attractive breakfast buffet, and helpful staff. The bathrobe folded up on my bed was a nice touch, and they have a good selection of newspapers to read over…

Efter att ha bott på Concordia ett antal gånger kan jag inte annat än uttrycka min stora förtjusning över hotellet, Att bo på Concordia är inte bara att ha tak över huvudet och någonstans att sova utan en totalupplevelse. De fräscha, välstädade och smakligt inredda rummen,…

column6: A high standard and cozy hotel with superb service
column7: We stayed for one night. The room was big enough for my family and furnished with good taste. It is not like many other hotels that looks more or less the same. This was personal! Actually this started already at the entrance when we got treated very well. They surly know…

column6: Thanks for making me feel like home
column7: Having been a regular for more than 15 years, I have had the opportunity to follow the "evolution of change" at the hotel i.e. extension, re-modeling, upgrades, Relax & Gym.  What hasn't change is the warm atmosphere, excellent service, and not to forget, the superb breakfast.  …

Chambres propres, suffisamment spacieuses, climatisation, bureau, salle de fitness et détente. Très bon et copieux (buffet) petit-déjeuner. Accueil amical et sérieux. Réceptionniste disponible et de bon conseil.  Wi-Fi appréciable. Bonne situation géographique dans la ville et…

We booked ahead an extra spacious room because we were traveling with a baby, but got disappointed when we found out that the room and the bathroom were confined and shabby. The windows were very high and there weren't any view. Breakfast was definitely not of style of a four…
column8: Response from HotellLund, Front Office Manager at Hotel ConcordiaResponded Aug 29, 2011

column7: We stayed here for one night only since we just had a short stop in Sweden. We chose the hotel since it was reasonably priced compared to other hotels (especially with almost no advance 745-995 SEK pr. double room pr. night).   The room we got was vary spacious and clean with…

column6: A former student hostel which doesn't really merit a four-star rating
column7: This hotel used to be a student residence and unfortunately it shows! On the plus side, the location is central and there is excellent wifi available throughout the hotel. However our room was on the small and shabby side and there was no ventilation in the bathroom, which gave…

In einer sehr ruhigen Seitengasse gelegen Parkmöglichkeit ca 250 Meter entfernt (gegen Bezahlung) direkt im Zentrum von Lund - nur wenige Minuten zur Stadtmitte und zum Dom sehr freundlicher Empfang, angenehme Atmosphäre Sehr schönes, geräumiges Zimmer mit Schreibtisch, bequemen…
Centrally located. Nice room, although a little small. Free wireless internet. Short walk to train station and city centre.

column6: Excellent welcome, comfortable, well equipped rooms
column7: I stayed for just one night, but very much enjoyed it. I was greeted with a warm welcome by the desk staff, and the room I was given (on top floor) was more like a suite, with a separate living area and bedroom. The room was well equipped with everything I needed, including…

this hotel has my favorite out of five towns i've stayed in on this trip.  it is small, clean, comfortable, charming.  internet was free & easy to access, very nice breakfast buffet.  one of the staff members went out of the way to assist me in making a local connection that was…

column6: You can bet a hobbit would give this hotel a better review than me
column7: Despite it's central location allowing easy access to points of interest in downtown Lund, this property should show show some restraint in accessing itself a 4 star rating (there's even a plaque next to it's front door indicating as much). Honestly, I've stayed at numerous…

Good position but old, shabby hotel.  We were given a room on first floor (2 adults+a child) with a portable air conditioner making an awful noise; as we opened the door we smelt the strong smell of sewerage: the so called bathroom didn't have a window but it was actually a part…

column6: Excellent service in a great location
column7: I was very pleased with this hotel. The staff was always very friendly and willing to answer questions. My single room was not big, but it wasn't small either. It had everything you could possibly need. There was enough closet space, a minibar, an airconditioning appliance (good…

This hotel provides you a clean room, adequate breakfast and on the most part very friendly service. my room was tucked away on the ground floor which meant I could open the window for a nice breeze. Some of the rooms however only open onto the reception area which means if you…

column6: Great hotel with wonderful service offering guests the personal touch
column7: I stayed here at the start of April for 6 nights. This hotel is in a brilliant location tucked away on a quite residential street in the heart of Lund City Centre.  The hotel is within a short walk away from Lund Station and local transport links around the city.  It is a…
Free wireless, very nice room, and free sauna... Great experience!

I absolutely adore the Hotel Concordia and ALWAYS stay here whenever I visit the lovely town of Lund. Perfect location, perfect hotel - has everything you could possibly need and the staff are just wonderful.  Located just minutes walk from the centre of Lund, shops, restuarants…

Perfect located hotel in Lund. High standard rooms with wireless internet free of charge. Big and very good breakfast. The staff was very service minded. I specially liked the sauna that has a wonderful view over the City.

column6: Freundliches, zentral gelegenes Hotel mit gutem Service
column7: Das Hotel Concordia liegt ruhig und doch sehr zentral rund 5 Gehminuten vom Bahnhof. Die Zimmer sind gemütlich und zweckmässig eingerichtet, jedoch etwas klein für Leute die sich ausbreiten möchten. Mein Einzelzimmer hatte ein Doppelbett. Im ganzen Hotel ist kostenloses WLAN…

column6: friendly service, great location and a wonderful room
column7: We stayed at the Concordia Hotel for 2 nights. The front desk was extremely friendly and helpful. Centrally located we had easy access to stores, restaurants etc. Would strongly recommend it to others.

Stayed here for 3 nights July '08 while visiting friends. Excellent location and very friendly staff. Two laptops in the lobby with free internet access. Very nice breakfast included. Very clean and well taken care of. The price was very good and made this hotel a great value.

column6: Great hotel, great room, great town
column7: This was a quaint little hotel in an ideal downtown location.  I could walk everywhere I needed.  There was a nice breakfast room with a nice traditional breakfast.  The room was nice and fairly spacious.    Staff was also very pleasant.  I would stay here again...and hope to.

column6: Nice little hotel in the center of Lund
column7: I stayed at the concordia for one night on January 4th 2005 with my brother. We payed about 100 Euro for a double room. The hotel is located in a small quiet side road. The city center of Lund is only a couple of minutes away.  The rooms were small but neat and the endowment…

Really enjoyed stay, lovely studio room with hob, microwave, fridge and dishwasher, table with nice view over street and enormous bathroom, beds really comfortable and staff on front desk and at breakfast very helpful and friendly. Breakfast ok, non dairy options available if…
column8: Response from ForenomAparthotelLun, GSR at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded 5 days ago
column10: Hi Michelle!  It's so great to hear that we managed to make you stay special in so many ways. It will always be our highest priority to make sure everything from the rooms, the service, and the breakfast is the best that it can be. We also love when our guests take the chance to use our free bike service - or play a game of table tennis or scrabble in our living room. We look forward to welcoming you back to us at Forenom in the future!  Best regards, Olivia Bröddén Guest Service Representative

column7: Skulle bo här i ett stort rum så vi kunde bo här med rullstol. Dom ringde samma dag när vi nästan var framme att rummet hade blivit dubbelbokad så vi skulle få ett mindre rum. Inte okej att göra så när man bokat det specifikt för att vi ska kunna bo med en stor rullstol.…
column8: Response from ForenomAparthotelLun, GSR at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Dec 26, 2018
column10: Hej Louise,  Vi vill återigen verkligen be om ursäkt för detta. Ibland sker tekniska problem med hotellsystem som gör att två bokningar ramlar in på samma rum och då försöker vi alltid lösa det efter bästa förmåga. Tyvärr går det inte alltid och det är självklart alltid lika tråkigt när det händer. Att det sker samma dag är ju också verkligen något vi inte vill ska hända och vi har full förståelse för er frustation.  Vi hoppas att de saker som kunde lösas på plats gjorde er vistelse trevligare än väntat. Vi önskar er varmt välkomna tillbaka och ett riktigt gott nytt år!  Vänliga hälsningar, Olivia Bröddén Guest Service Representative

column7: Vi havde en enkelt overnatning, helt fantastisk og virkelig sød personale 😉 Vi fik allerede lov til at bruge værelset ved vores ankomst kl 11.00, istedet for oprindelig check in tid kl 15.00, virkelig god service. Værelset flot , rummeligt og rent. Kan varmt anbefales.
column8: Response from ForenomAparthotelLun, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Dec 11, 2018
column10: Hej Andrea,  Tack för dina varma ord, vi är glada att ni haft en bra vistelse hos oss och hoppas att vi får nöjet att välkomna er åter till Lund i framtiden.  Allt gott, Nathalie Jabrell Area Manager Lund

column6: 非常舒适的公寓式酒店
column7: 十分满意！这里的优点有很多: 1，房间带厨房，厨房里的锅刀叉碗碟一应俱全，油盐需要自己买，但很便宜。2，早餐非常丰盛好吃，尤其推荐那个牛角面包，皮非常酥脆，鸡蛋也被细心的分成6分钟和8分钟鸡蛋，周末早餐到10点半，工作日到9点半。3，旁边就有一个大超市和药店，非常方便，出来买东西都不用穿大衣。4，离伦德火车站和伦德大学都是20分钟走路到，不算太近，但也能接受，唯一就是这里都是石板路，第一次来提着箱子一路走来非常痛苦。如果再来这里的话，肯定还会选择这里的，非常推荐！对了，这里的服务也蛮好的，妹子们礼貌友好。
column8: Response from ForenomAparthotelLun, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Dec 11, 2018
column10: Best Jiehu,  Many thanks for giving such a positive and extensive review of your stay. We are glad that you enjoyed Forenom and hope to see you soon again!  All the best, Nathalie Jabrell Area Manager

column7: Obemannat lägenhetshotell. Har inte tidigare bott på något liknande men det funkade jättebra. Superfräscha studios. Vitt grått och ek. Frukosten var över förväntan. Fanns lite av varje arr välja på. Bra ställe för barnfamilj. Lite opersonligt.

Fantastiskt att ni fick ett sådant positivt intryck av våra studios och att frukosten verkligen smakade.  Vi önskar er varmt välkomna tillbaka till Forenom i framtiden.  Vänligen,  Olivia Bröddén Guest Service Representative

column6: Happy home base while in Lund!

column10: Hej Håkan,  Tack för att du tagit dig tid att ge oss feedback på din vistelse. Vi är ledsna att höra att standarden inte levde upp till dina förväntningar. Om du har några konkreta tips på förbättringar tar vi gärna emot det som underlag för att utveckla vår produkt, du är varmt välkommen att återkoppla till nathalie.jabrell@stayat.se om du har tid/möjlighet.  Ha det gott, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager StayAt Lund

column6: Bra koncept och lite mer familjärt än vanliga hotell
column7: Lite svårt att betygsätta, men landar i en fyra. Vi börjar kort med det negativa. Receptionen stänger kl 22. Kan tänka mig att det är lite jobbigt om man som gäst inte tänkt på detta, och kommer sent. Sen var det inget varmt på frukosten, i övrigt höll den bra nivå. Detta är ett…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Nov 13, 2017
column10: Hej taximannen,  Tack för att du tagit dig tid att ge oss feedback på din vistelse. Vi är glada att du uppskattar den familjära stämning som vi strävar efter att skapa och hoppas att du fick tillfället att närvara på en filmkväll under din vistelse!  Sen ankomst fungerar utmärkt även utanför våra öppettider. Ofta meddelar de flesta gäster som kommer efter kl. 22 detta i förväg och då skickar vi ut information via mail innan ankomst. I annat fall får man som gäst support via vårt systerhotell StayAt Bromma som hjälper en att komma till rätta.  Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig åter till oss framöver!  Vänligen, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column6: Mooi in het centrum, normaal, niet bijzonder.
column7: Prima hotel, aan de prijs voor wat er geboden wordt. Schone handdoeken tegen extra betaling is jammer, net als het parkeren; ook bij betalen. Jammer dat dat niet op de site staat! Ontbijtbuffet oké, niet spectaculair. Gekookt eitje -koud- , twee soorten kaas, koffieautomaat.…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Nov 13, 2017
column10: Hello Peter,  Thank you for giving us feedback on your stay.  We are sorry that the information regarding weekly- and departure cleaning along with parking costs wasn't clear enough before arrival. We try to put this information on all sites were you can book our rooms, and would appreciate your help in identifying which website that lacks this information so we can add this for future guests.  All in all, we are glad that your found our hotel value for money and that you are satisfied with the service from the staff.  We hope to get the pleasure of welcoming you back to us in the future!  Best regards, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column7: Arrived on a Sunday very early, 7am. Nobody at reception. Had to deal with a telephone. They let me wait 6 hours (I was very early and check-in is only at 14h00) to get a room. Still they could have done better!   Had a brekkie and could sit in a comfortable common area.  Room…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Nov 5, 2017
column10: Hello Konrad,  Thank you for your review! I'm sorry that we were not able to help you with a room sooner, however it's often difficult to provide early check-in at weekends since most leisure guests stay in their rooms until check-out at 12 o'clock.  We are glad to hear that you could enjoy a breakfast and spend some time in our Living Room while waiting.  Welcome back to us next time!  Best regards, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column6: Good place to stay in Lund
column7: We spent a weekend here as part of a large group (a choir) who were visiting Lund. It’s a really good hotel in a very central location. Breakfast was wonderful, plentiful buffet style. The rooms are large and very well equipped. If you’re on a budget, the fully fitted kitchen is…

column10: Hello Anne,  Thank you for taking the time to give us a review on Tripadvisor. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope that everything went well with your performances this weekend.  Welcome back!  Best regards, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column7: Det här hotellet har allt; superbt läge på lugn gata precis vid centrum, möjlighet att laga egen mat, sköna sängar och bra med utrymme för en familj. Det var fräscha och fina rum och frukosten (som jag inte hade några höga förväntningar på då det saknades varm mat) var också…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Oct 16, 2017
column10: Hej Helen,  Tack för ditt omdöme. Vi är glada att ni hade en fin upplevelse hos oss och hoppas att vi ses snart igen!  Varmt välkomna åter, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager StayAt Hotel Apartments

column7: Los apartamentos de que dispone son amplios y hacen que estancias de varios días sean agradables. Tienen cocina. Ofrece siempre Fika en la planta baja. El desayuno es sencillo, pero completo. Hay un supermercado al lado donde se puede comprar de todo en un  amplio horario.
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Oct 9, 2017
column10: Dear Salamanca-16,  Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback on your stay. We are glad that you had a pleasant visit and hope to see you soon again!  Best regards, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager StayAt Hotel Apartments  The apartments available are spacious and make several-day stays pleasant. They have kitchen. Always offers Fika on the ground floor. Breakfast is simple but full. There is a supermarket next door where you can buy everything at an ample schedule.

column7: These were the largest rooms we stayed in on our trip.  Very spacious.  Very clean.  Well-appointed.  Nice big bathroom.  Nice breakfast, but not as plentiful as others.  We checked in very late at night and there was nobody at the front desk.  We had to call a number and…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Aug 21, 2017
column10: Hello CalgaryGirl26,  Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback on your stay.   We hope that everything worked out well with late check-in with our on-duty staff at StayAt Bromma. Even though we do not have any staff on-site during nights, we are always available on the phone for any questions our guests might have.  In case of emergency, we always have a representative for the hotel on-site within 10 minutes.  We hope you will return if you are visting Lund in the future!  Best regards, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column6: Great apartments for short or long stay!
column7: Booked in a standard queen room. Sparkling clean on checking in. Freshened up once a week unless you pay for extra cleaning. Bed was queens size with two sets of linen half the size of the bed. This made the bed area an eyesore. However, everything else spot on; you have iron…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Aug 6, 2017

column7: Ein schönes Hotel... von dort unternahmen wir unsere Tagestouren. Das Zimmer war im 5 Stockwerk und sehr ruhig. Die Dame am Empfang und das ganze Personal waren sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Das Frühstück war gut und reichhaltig. Für uns war die Küche eher Nebensache aber gut…

column7: What a wonderful place to stay! The staff was friendly and helpful with tips on restaurants and other sites. We borrowed bikes one day and loved the trip route they suggested. Our room was in the back side and fairly quiet. We were there the week of graduation, so I suspect the…

column6: Well placed hotel with good facilities
column7: Basic hotel with with comfortable rooms and nice bathrooms. Parking is expensive as our fees for pet dogs. The hotel is ideally positioned for exploring the town. Breakfast are off a high standard but no hot options are available. Good wifi. Overall we had a pleasant stay. The…

The delivery entrance to the supermarket can cause minor disturbances during mornings for light sleepers in the rooms in absolute vicinity facing Laboratoriegatan. We are sorry about this, and will put you in a different room on your next stay. Welcome back!  Best regards, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column7: Auf der Durchreise übernachtete meine Frau und ich erneut in Lund. Diesmal in diesem Hotel. Die Damen am Empfang war überaus hilfsbereit. Sie stellte uns ein Parkticket aus für die Dachgarage. Leider ist der Empfang am Wochenende nur bis 17.00 Uhr besetzt. Das Zimmer war sauber…

column6: Perfect location, quiet area and spacious rooms
column7: The location in the center of the "oldtown" of Lund is perfect, lots of restaurants and nice walking just around the corner. Despite that, there is no street noice and even right in the middle of the student festivities the street wa quitet at night. Easy parking in the same…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Jun 28, 2017

column7: Отлично было всё: номер, завтраки, ресепшн, рекомендую! Очень уютно, просторные и чистые номера, доброжелательный и приветливый персонал, удобное расположение, для желающих есть возможность организовать досуг (настольные игры)

column7: I spent almost 4 weeks at the StayAt. The room was comfortable and spacious. I had my own kitchen so I didn't have to keep eating in restaurants. It was a memorable hotel experience! The staff was delightful, helpful and experienced. Every week, they organized events for the…

column7: As an apartment hotel the concept is slightly different to a regular hotel. The rooms contain a fully equipped kitchen and by default cleaning is once a week (additional cleaning can be booked).  My room and the bathroom were big enough and clean.  The reception isn't filled…

column10: Thank you for your kinds words! We are glad that you liked our guest events and hope that you had the time to enjoy some of them during your stay with us. We have developed a renovation plan for our larger studios and one of the things that our interior designers have added is more storage space. We hope you'll find this satisfying when visiting in the future!  Best regards, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column7: Bra läge mitt i centrala Lund. Trevlig och hjälpsam personal i den lilla receptionen som är obemannad kväll och natt. Trivsam entré med många sittplatser och spel, tidningar och kaffemaskin. Helt vanlig frukost, men väldigt mycket att välja på. Rummen är stora och fräscha,…

column7: Upplever hotellet mer som lägenhetshotell med en enkel foajé och liten reception som är obemannad nattetid. Bra läge mitt i centrala Lund. Rummet/lägenheten var rent och innefattade mindre toalett med dusch, kök, sittgrupp samt dubbelsäng på en yta som kändes lagom tilltagen.…

column7: Var lite skeptisk till detta boende men är nu mycket nöjd. Mycket fräscht, bra centralt läge, bra parkeringsmöjligheter och trevlig personal. Fruktosten var också ok men skulle kunna innehålla något varmt också. Rekommenderas starkt
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Jan 18, 2017

column7: The serviced apartments are good and the staff are helpful and efficient. The rooms are good, with a kitchenette and attached bath. The breakfast facility is very good. It is close to the university, and is an excellent choice for both short and long term stays.

column6: Good Stay but can be better
column7: I stayed in this Aparthotel for 3 nights. I have been given a room at 5th floor facing back of the market area. The check in was quick. Front desk staff members were helpful with smile on face. Room was nice and quite. Bathroom was big enough, neat and tidy. A small kitchen was…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Jan 18, 2017
column10: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to give us such good feedback on your stay. We apologize for the bad smell experienced from the refrigerator and are currently investigating different ways of dealing with this. We use ozone techniqe for neutralizing bad smell in rooms and open areas at the hotel, but this technique cannot be applied in cold areas such as refrigerators. We hope to find a solution soon!  Best regards, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column7: Bra läge nära till allt. Bra dygnsparkering betalades i receptionen. trevlig personal , Lagom vanlig frukost .  Lite slarvig städning vilket vi påpekade. Men  allt annat bra så vi kommer att bo här flera gånger.
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Jan 18, 2017
column10: Hej Lena,  Tack för ert fina omdöme! Vi beklagar att städningen inte levt upp till våra standards och jobbar hela tiden för att förbättra upplevelsen för våra gäster.  Varmt välkomna åter, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column7: Stayed here on a business trip. The location is perfect, staff at the desk very friendly and the breakfast extensive. The bed was ok, some fan making a semi annoying background sound, the Wi-Fi very fast, the view on the parking lot a bit depressing. I'd probably come back but…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Jan 18, 2017
column10: Hello Hidde-Jan,  Thank you for giving us a review on your stay! We are sorry that you did not enjoy the view over the parking lot, we will make sure to give you a room facing the other way next time you stay with us. Everyone appreciate different rooms and views, some like the parking lot since it is more quiet and others find it more important to have something interesting to look at from the window. We learn about our guests every day!  Hope to see you soon again! Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column7: Stayed here for all five days. Rooms have a kitchen corner, where you can cook for yourself if you'd like it. Bathroom is pretty big! TV with a lot of channels. In the basement you will find a small training room and sauna! Hotel is at the centrum of Lund. I recommend this hotel…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Jan 18, 2017
column10: Hello Andrius,  Thank you for you top review! We are looking forward to seing you with us soon again!  Best regards, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column6: Ett helt okej hotell helt utan finesser
column7: Rummet var stort och rymligt men kändes mer som en opersonlig lägenhet än ett mysigt hotellrum. Tyckte inte om att hotellet inte hade receptionen öppen på kvällen. Vi fick veta att det fanns ett centralnummer i Stockholm att ringa om något skulle gå fel, känns inte helt säkert.…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Nov 21, 2016
column10: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback on your stay! We offer hotel apartments equipped with everything you need for a short to longterm stay away from home and our aim is to create the feeling of home that you sometime lack when staying at a normal hotel. I am sorry to hear that we have failed to give you this feeling during your stay.  Our on-duty staff at StayAt Hotel in Bromma are as passionate about guest service as we are and give the best help possible even from far away - always no more than a phone call away.  Looking forward to welcoming you back to us soon!  Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column7: Vi elsker altid at besøge Stay At. Altid rene værelser. Store og lyse. Med mulighed for at lavet lidt mad eller en kop kaffe. Personalet er altid søde til at hjælpe og kender byen. Vi har været der flere gange, og kommer der helt sikkert igen.

Jätte rymliga lägenheter med två stora rum och stort fräscht badrum. Perfekt för familjer med barn som både får extra sängar och kok-möjligheter. Perfekt beläget mitt i centrala Lund. Trevlig service och god frukost och dessutom tvättstuga och gym som ingår!

We stay with my family one night. Apartments are ample, well decorated and with everything you need for a comfortable stay.  Clean, friendly staff and good breakfast. Would definitely recommend. Walking distance to all main attractions.

We stayed two night at StayatLund and enjoyed it. Although the check-in was rather awkward, as the receptionist had already left for the day and the parking procedure was not very clear for a non-Swedish speaking guest, the place is absolutely recommendable. The rooms are…

late the night before arriving to Lund,  received email from Stay At Lund saying they had lost my reservation,  were full up,  and they had booked me at the Grand (ok, but I really avoid those kind of "Grand" hotels).   Here's the kicker,  keeping in mind they had lost my…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Aug 10, 2016
column10: Hello Mikael,  It is a tough situation when a hotel is fully booked and something happens to leave the staff with an overbooking. We are terrible sorry about how the situation was handled, we always aim for total transperancy against our guests.  We tried to solve a hard sitatuion by accomodating you at the finest hotel in Lund at our cost, and we hope you were able to enjoy your stay at Grand Hotel.  Again, we are sorry about your experience with StayAt and want to ensure you that we really tried our best to make your visit in Lund the best it could be.  Best regards, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column7: We had a family room and it was great. Room is big with own bathroom (website isn't too clear on this) and small kitchen. It's in the middle of town and they have a great parking place outside the hotel. We got a great deal on the price. Would stay here again

Un très chouette séjour. Chambre/appartement familial, avec une cuisine pour y faire nos repas, un lave vaisselle, tout l'équipement, les produits pour la vaisselle, une salle de bains nickel et spacieuse, et une décoration sympa.  Tout cela permet de passer un chouette séjour à…

We have stayed at this hotel twice before and been very satisfied. This visit this time was unfortunately a disappointment. The room we were given had a very bad location, just above the yard of a busy grocery store. Noisy vans, compressors for waste, smoking from the employee`s…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Jul 26, 2016
column10: Hello,  Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear about your latest experience with us and also sorry that our alternatives for room move were so poor this time. We have taken action on your noise complaints and found out that our neighbour were doing prohibited contruction work during night time. This has now stopped fortunately, and we would like to thank you for informing us about this. Normally, the rooms facing the courtyard are the most quiet at the hotel.  We hope to see you soon again! Best regards, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column6: It used to be a better deal. Parking can be a real bad experience
column7: We stayed a couple of times in the hotel, it used to be our favorite hotel in Lund. The prices were reasonable in the last years, now it has become expansive.  This time we booked a superior room which should have had a size of 35 square meters. The room we got was meant for…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Receptionschef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Jun 17, 2016
column10: Hello,  Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry that you experience the room as small. The superior rooms are 35 sqm (including bathroom) in general, but the size can differ little (+/- 1-2 sqm) depending on the room plan.  Parking in Lund is expensive since municipality are working towards making the city center a car free zone. We use Q-Park as a parking alternative to our guests since this is the closest and most accessable parking lot. We really try to be as clear as we can in our information regarding the parking tickets, as we are concerned about how our guests experience parking as part of their stay.  Thanks to your feedback, we are adding a note in English for all parking tickets sold by the front desk to foreign guests. We hope that this will make it all much clearer!  We hope to see you soon again! Best regards, Nathalie Jabrell, Operations Manager

column6: Great location, nice hotel with good breakfast
column7: Stayed a week while visiting our son.  Great location, with restaurants and shopping near by.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.  Room was clean and satisfactory for the 3 of us.  We really enjoyed the buffet breakfast in the morning and the coffee and cookies through out the…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Jun 22, 2016
column10: Hello James,  Thank you for your nice feedback. We hope to see you again next time your visiting your family!  Best regards, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column7: Personalen är fantastisk och man får känslan av att bo hemma hos någon. Vi möttes av värme och hjälpsamhet  och fick hjälp med allt från att  hitta bra restauranger till vägbeskrivningar OCH vi blev bjudna på micropopcorn en kväll. Här vill jag bo igen!
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Feb 22, 2016
column10: Hej Mi,  Tack för din fina recension. Vi försöker vara så tillmötesgående vi bara kan genom att tillgodose alla våra gästers behov. Jättekul att vi gjort ett positivt intryck och vi önskar dig varmt välkommen tillbaka!  Vänligen, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column6: Clean convenient apartments in Lund, if a bit industrial.
column7: StayAt Lund is a great resource with clean and convenient apartments in Lund. The breakfast is great and the apartments are clean. The only downside is that the place lacks a bit of charm. The hallways seem to be inspired by the architecture of the nearby dorm rooms and the…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Chef at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Feb 22, 2016
column10: Hello Julia,  Thank you for your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us! Hallways are a tough one - we agree with you. We are trying to create a more home-y feel to them as we speak by putting up large canvas paintings made by own guests... True artists I must say!  We hope you'll have another visit soon so you can see our new paintings!  Best regards, Nathalie Jabrell Operations Manager

column7: Jag måste ge mitt största beröm till detta hotell! Jag hörde av mig innan min vistelse där och hörde om hotellet kunde bistå med glutenfri och laktosfri frukost. Jag har blivit lovad samma sak på andra hotell tidigare men när jag väl stått där på frukostbuffén har de stått där…

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay while visiting the university. The apartment style room had plenty of room and a fully equipped kitchenette. The bed and the sofa bed for the kids was also very comfortable. The lobby was spacious with coffee and tea available much of the day. He…

column6: Fantastiskt rum och rätt nivå av service

column6: Excellent hotel right in the city center

I stayed here for five nights, prior to moving into a flat for my 3 month stay in Lund. I had booked a studio apartment with breakfast. On arrival the staff were very friendly and although it was only 10am let me check-in immediately. The apartment was a good size with a little…

Rymliga och fräscha rum. Bra service. Möjligen är frukostmiljön inte helt optimal, lätt stökigt men vissa tycker det är mysigt att trängas lite. Rymliga rum som är köksutrustade. Ibland blir man uppgraderad till jättestort och rymligt rum.

column6: Un buon punto di appoggio a Lund

column6: One of the nicest places we've ever stayed!
column7: We arrived here after 2 nights cramped into a Cabinn Hotel in Copenhagen. We simply could not believe it! The location is simply perfect. The place is easy to find. The staff are impeccably helpful & friendly.  The rooms were wonderful. Big - plenty of space for all of us,…

Hotel très bien placé, en plein centre.  La chambre était très grande (environ 30m2), très sympa et très propre.  Le seul petit reproche est due à l'âge du bâtiment en structure bois qui donne des chambres un peu bruyante. Cela reste très raisonnable.  Bref très très bon hotel…

Hotel très bien situé en centre ville personnel accueillant et compétent .grande chambre avec tout ce qu'il faut ...cuisine ,avec table pour six personnes ...... Calme propre .petit sauna et salle de fitness....

Located right at the centre of the beautiful town of Lund, Sweden ; this 'home' / apartment hotel is the best thing that happened on our trip. Very thoughtfully equipped apartments, a filling breakfast and wonderful staff were a few of the highlights. Comfort, Service and…

Det var andra gången vi bodde på At Stay Lund. Perfekt läge, trevlig och professionell personal, bra rum (vi bodde i en studio), och god frukost. Det enda som fungerar sämre är hanteringen av tvättstugan. Inte pga av hotellet men då visa långtidsboende inte respekterar bokningar…

I have just spend I few days at the StayAt and found it to be a very pleasant  hotel with friendly and helpful staff.  The studio rooms were great for getting work done and the espresso machine in the restaurant area helped with relaxing.  It was on the edge of the city centre…

column6: Spacious, smart room in a good central location and excellent service

Nous sommes restés 3 jours à Lund et avons séjourné dans cet hôtel/appartement. A recommander fortement: emplacement idéal au centre, excellent accueil, appartement sobre " à la scandinave" mais où rien ne manque, petit déjeuner très complet. Excellent en tout point ! Vous…

column6: Comfy beds, clean room, helpful staff
column7: We were in Lund for the Fantastik Film Festival and booked this hotel last-minute. Everything about it was just what we wanted - not too far from the station, clean and comfortable and an excellent breakfast. The rooms also have cooking facilities which would be useful if you're…

My family Stayed at StayAt Lund in August while taking my Son to his exchange program at University of Lund. The rooms were clean, and we had a kitchen and laundry facilities. Staff was excellent and price was reasonable. Many good restaurants in the area, close to train…

I stayed in this hotel for 2weeks during my official visit. I must say this hotel is very centrally located. It's in the middle of Lund market area & the railway station is at a walkable distance. Since I had gone for official visit, my evenings used to be free. This hotel being…

Spent one night at this hotel on 7/30/13.  Check in was very efficient.  The hotel was spotless. Offers a free breakfast that starts a bit late for those checking out to catch an early train. Also has coffee and cookies available throughout the day. Room was quite large for…

La verdad que resultó más de lo esperado. Mi sobrina me había realizado la reservación por lo que yo no sabía mucho sobre el establecimiento. Está muy bien emplazado, los apartamentos son nuevos, modernos y luminosos y el cuarto de baño inusualmente amplio para lo que son en…

column6: Convenient hotel but beware of the night reception

column6: Excellent, especially for a long stay
column7: Stay at is very conveniently located, just off the main square, within walking distance of the station- (if you have a big suitcase consider a taxi, because the cobblestones are not good for suitcase wheels). The rooms are airy, spacious and well appointed. Just what is needed…

Room was large, clean and in a great location.  The staff was helpful. The breakfast very good with plenty of items to choose from.  They let us store our bags there to pick up after graduation which was very helpful.

Used the accommodation for  just one night, very close to town, nice cafe opposite. Clean and spacious one bedroom studio. Staff very helpful as we were there for a graduation and although we had to be out by 12, they stored our luggage and we managed to change in the disabled…

column6: Gutes Hotel, wenn man die Reisezeit berücksichtigt

column10: Dear Margo H,  Thank you for choosing StayAt when visiting Lund! I’m pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay here.  I’m happy to inform you that this summer we will be remodeling our Living Room to make more space, a place for more activities and to make your stay even more pleasant. The Living room will be open around the clock after the remodel.   Welcome back to see all the changes soon!  Best regards,  Emmelina Nilsson  Guest Relations Manager StayAt Hotel Lund

column7: Conveniently located in the heart of Lund, the StayAt Hotel/Apartments are quite nice.  Typically Swedish, design is simple and clean.  I can imagine that they would be especially nice for an extended stay with complete cooking facilities in the apartments.  On the down side, no…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Guest Relations Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded May 28, 2013
column10: Dear Mark M,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay!  The front desk is open between 7 am and 10 pm on weekdays and between 9 am and 5 pm on weekends. Outside of these times you can check in using codes that you get from us or by using the intercom located by the front entrance to the hotel. I apologize that you were not informed about this! If you have any questions when the desk is unmanned you can always use the phone in your room or the phone on the front desk to get directly connected to our duty hotel that has service every hour of the day.   We hope to see you again soon!  Best regards,  Emmelina Nilsson  Guest Relations Manager StayAt Hotel Lund

column6: A meta fra hotel e appartamento
column7: Struttura moderna e pulita, con appartamenti semplici e dotati di tutti i srvizi, colazione inclusa, abbondante e di qualita. Un ottimo compromesso se si viaggia con bambini ma anche per viaggi di lavoro è ottima. Unica considerazione... Le pulizie giornaliere si pagano a…

column6: Centrally located und very friendly staff
column7: Friendly staff, nice and spacious rooms with a small fully equipped kitchen. Parking space available although the hotel is located really in the centre of the old town of Lund. I travelled with my familiy but I would also recommend this hotel for business trips.
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Guest Relations Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Jan 24, 2013
column10: Dear Roland S,  Thank you for your review! I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Our location in the centre of Lund gives our guest the opportunity to choose from some of Lunds best restaurants and shopping just a few minutes’ walk from the Hotel.   We hope to see you again during your next visit to Lund!  Best Regards,  Emmelina Nilsson  Guest Relations Manager StayAt Lund

column7: Trevligt hotell mitt i Lund. Prisvärt också. Man hamnar mitt i centrum och tvärs över ligger coop och Mårtenstorget. Så eftersom det är lite av ett lägenhetshotell kan man fika på rummet. Kokplatt kaffebryggare kylskåp finnes.,
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Guest Relations Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Jan 24, 2013
column10: Hej Banjoatte!  Tack för att du tog dig tid att recensera vårt Hotell.   Det är väldigt roligt att höra att du trivs på StayAt Lund. Precis som du skriver har många av våra rum en fantastisk utsikt över Lunds takåsar.   Jag vill önska dig varmt välkommen tillbaka till StayAt Lund!  Med vänliga hälsningar,  Emmelina Nilsson  Guest Relations Manager StayAt Lund

column7: Would give full five stars but... Almost all items in my checklist were fullfilled, except for one. I wonder why the elevators close to the rooms must have the alarm sound on, while opening the doors? Otherwise I was happy to find such a roomy bathroom, with floor heating! Even…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Front Office Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Nov 6, 2012
column10: Dear K0kki,  Thank you very much for your feedback. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us!  We strive to make our hotel accessible to all guests. The sound that you hear when the elevator doors open is to help guests who are visually impaired. Our hotel is also wheelchair accessible. I apologize that the sound was disturbing this is of course not the intention!  I’m glad you liked your room, all our rooms have a armchair or sofa so you can sit down and relax.  We hope to see you again soon!  Best Regards,  Emelie Grane, Front Office Manager Lund.

column7: Si vous devez séjourner à Lünd, je vous conseille cet endroit ; chambre spacieuse, kitchinette bien équipée, très propre, proche du centre et très accueillant....Petit déjeuner gargantuesque ; café, petits fours, fruits à toute heure de la journée....Nous y avons séjourné une…

column6: my favorite place to stay in Lund/Malmö
column7: The staff is what makes this "Hotel" so nice. They are super friendly, open for a chat and help you with everything if possible. It is not really a hotel, because you have a mini-apparatment with kitchen and everything. If you stay longer than one night you will appreciate the…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Front Office Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Nov 6, 2012
column10: Dear Macus K,  Thank you for your nice review! We are very happy to hear that you enjoy staying with us.  We always try to make our guests feel at home here at StayAt.  I’m glad you appreciate the kitchenettes in our rooms, when traveling a lot it can be nice to be able to cook your own meal.   I wish you welcome back to stay with us the next time you visit Lund!  Best Regards, Emelie Grane, Front Office Manager

column7: Dit hotel ligt zeer centraal en alle bezienswaardigheden, horecazaken en winkels liggen op wandelastand van dit hotel. Hou er wel rekening mee dat je moet bijbetalen voor een parkeerplaats. Openbaar parkeren is goedkoper en er zijn een beperkt aantal plaatsen voor de deur.  …

column6: big room with kitchen, wonderful sauna
column7: We stayed at StayAt for two nights. Our really quiet room was furnished like a 1-room appartment with a kitchen and a big bathroom. The door of our shower in our room was unfortunatley displaced and while showering the floor around the shower got flooded. Breakfast was very…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Aug 10, 2012
column10: Dear AnnalenaP!  Thank you for taking your time to rewiev your stay at StayAt Lund! I am happy to hear that you enyoyed your stay at StayAt.  I will let my handyman take a look at the door of our shower to prevent future problems, thanks for the tip!  I agree on that our fresh fruit salad is great, many guest loves it!   I would like to welcome you back to StayAt in Lund again!  BR Måns Friberg, Hotel Manager StayAt Lund

column7: This was our second night of 17 in Scandinavia. The room was roomy and the bathroom the biggest we encountered.  As with all Scandinavian hotels, no wash cloth or bar soap.  There is liquid soap in the shower and at the sink.  The room was clean with a nice kitchette.  We did…

I'm very pleased with this hotel, and we have stayed there two times. You actually rent a small apartment. It's spacious and has a modern interior. The breakfast is  good, but not any luxury. The best with this hotel is that it is situated in the centre of Lund. Still it is…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Front Office Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Sep 10, 2012
column10: Dear Annie 0206,  Thank you for your review.   Its great to hear that you were satisfied with your stay at our hotel. We hope to see you again soon!  Best regards,  Emelie Grane

column7: Had one night here after three nights in Stockholm in the worst value hotel I have ever stayed in. Must say Stayat Lund was a welcome surprise after this. Booked on line and arrived around 7.30pm on a Saturday night. You need to catch a taxi from the train station as it would be…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Front Office Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Sep 10, 2012
column10: Dear Marsala20,  Thank you for your review!   I'm very glad to here that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our one bedroom apartments are perfect for a family or a group of friends traveling together.   We wish you welcome back to our hotel and hope to see you again the next time you are visiting Lund!  Best regards,  Emelie Grane

column7: Stay at Lund is an apartment hotel perfectly located in the centre of the university city, everything you need is within a short walking distance. The rooms are large, modern and comfortable, with a sofa and some simple kitchen utilities if you need to or want to eat in. It's…

column6: Do not stay at Stay at Lund
column7: Let me start by saying it is a rather new property. I have traveled all over the U.S. and Europe and stayed in hotel brands from the Hilton Garden Inn up to the Four Seasons and everything in between. This property is what I would imagine the Red Roof Inn or Econo Lodge would…
column8: Responded Jul 10, 2012
column10: Dear LuvzTennis!  Thank you for your review!   I am very sorry to hear that your stay at StayAt did not satisfied your expectations. Many guests love our beds, of course, it is difficult to find a bed to suit all tastes, and I am very sorry to hear that you found our beds to be terrible.  We will offcourse take a look at the roll out bed and the pillows to make shure that they are ok.  Regarding breakfast, all food are placed on cooling plates that are approved by the food agency in Sweden and the food are continuelsy replaced by new food.   StayAt Lund is a apartment hotel and we protect the environment and guest privacy, therefore we have chosen not to clean the rooms every day for a stay. Of course, as a guest you can always buy this service.   If you ever come back to Lund again, we welcome you as our guest and we want you to have a better stay the next time.  Welcome back!  Br Måns Friberg, Hotel Manager, StayAt Lund

column7: I have stayed at the Stayat on several occassions whilst visiting family in Lund, and have always found it excellent value for money. The rooms are large and comfortable with a kitchen which means that you can eat in, if you need to (there is a handy supermarket in the square…

Lund is a university city with vibrancy, various cultural events and heritage.  StayAt Lund is perfectly placed in the city center, close to everything.  My room was 319, it is really a small apartment, so for those who wish to cook, there is a fully equipped kitchen!  There is…

Har bott på StayAt Lund vid tre tillfällen. Två gånger två personer och en gång med barn. Lika bra alla gångerna. Lägenheten funkar utmärkt.Läget i centrum är perfekt.  Frukosten bra. Kan rekommenderas.

Har bott på StayAt Lund vid tre tillfällen och trivts jättebra alla gånger. Mycket fina och fräscha rum, bra frukost, och perfekt läge i centrala Lund, precis intill Mårtenstorget. Kommer definitivt att välja StayAt även vid nästa resa till Lund.

Convenient location in Lund downtown. Large rooms with wide bathroom and kitchenette, very useful. Free wifi in public areas and/or in room via cable, kindly supplied by the hotel. Satisfactory breakfast, with wide variety of food and beverage. Very nice free coffee and tea…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Mar 26, 2012
column10: Dear Aldo!  Thank you for your comment. We are glad to hear that StayAt met your expectations. I can  inform you that we now provides free Wifi in the entire hotel, for all guests to use. The complimentary coffee and thea in our Livingroom are for everyone staying at the hotel, we want you to enjoy our nice venue all the time.  Welcome back!  BR Måns Friberg, Hotel Manager, StayAt Lund

column6: Perfect hotel with amenities for a comfortable stay
column7: This hotel is like having your own apartment in Lund, and its serviced! It is convenient and has enough room to easily move about and feel comfortable. It is well maintained and very clean. The bathroom is also very large. Breakfast was included and had great variety and good…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, General Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Jan 12, 2012
column10: Hi Melbourne001 !  Thanks for for your great review! I am very happy to hear that your stay was good, and that you thought the hotel suited you well.  I want to welcome you back to us at StayAt Lund next time you are in Lund.  Kind regards,  Mr Måns Friberg, Hotel Manager at StayAt Lund

column7: Not knowing in advance that this is an appartment hotel, I was pleasantly surpised by the very spacious room, kitchen and bathroom. I only had a one night stay but a assume they dont come and clean it that often as a normal hotel room. And I would consider this maybe as a minor…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Dec 1, 2011
column10: Dear Bartnouwen!  Thank you for your respons!  Our guests are often pleasantly surprised when they arrive to our hotel. Big spacious rooms with nice kitchen and bathroom, and central located with restaurants around the corner. Our guests stays with us from 1 night up to several months. So we can say that we have the best from a hotel (Service, breakfast, central location, free internet) and combine it with the best of an apartment (Big rooms, kitchen, and a home away from home feeling)   Welcome back to us! BR Måns Friberg, Hotel Manager, StayAt Lund

column7: Mini apartment for a weekend away.  There is also a laundry room, you just book your time that is good for you. Have a sauna and relax, it's all in the price. Breakfast can be included with your room too, good selection of fresh food. Yes it's value  for money...given it's…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Nov 22, 2011
column10: Dear Anna!  Thank you for your kind words! You are warmly welcome back to us at StayAt!  BR. Mr Måns Friberg, Hotel Manager, StayAt Lund

column7: Stayed for two weeks, loved it as very central, good kitchen could have been some more utensils in kitchen also missed toaster but very good price and well worth the money to be able to not feel as in a hotel when away working. Large rooms, fab beds and clean. Staff very…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Nov 22, 2011
column10: Dear AmeriExpat!  Thank you for taking your time to write a review about StayAt Hotel in Lund.  Yes, we are wondering to, why our hotel is listed as "Specialty Lodging" and are waiting for answer from TripAdvisor (You cannot change it by yourself) Hopefully we will be on the same list as the other hotels in Lund, and then everybodu can see and read all our nice reviews from our fantistic guests!  Welcome back to StayAt Lund,  BR Mr Måns Friberg, Hotel Manager, StayAt Lund

column6: Newly built hotel with all you need
column7: We stayed here for two nights for a graduation ceremony in the winter time. I am not sure why this is categorized as "specialty lodging" as I believe lots of people are missing out on this great hotel. While this hotel can accommodate someone staying for an extended period of…

This serviced apartment has been recently renovated - very nice & clean, 100m from supermarket, car parking adjacent to entrance door & short walk to centre square. The only thing that we missed in the apartment was a toaster. We would certainly return. They offered one free…
column8: Response from StayAtHotelLund, Manager at Forenom Aparthotel LundResponded Nov 22, 2011
column10: Dear TravelPlanner2000!  Thank you for taking your time to write a review about StayAt Lund! We are happy to hear that your stay was great.
