column7: We stayed 2 nights in this hotel near Malmo. Check in is automated and went perfect. Rooms are clean and tidy. Breakfast is bit basic, but for this category you can't expect too much. This hotel is great when you want to visit Malmo and...for a better breakfast, just drive to…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Sep 1, 2018
column10: Dear Amit  Many thanks for your review, greatly appreciated! Best regards Christian

column7: Wij hadden een familiekamer geboekt, inclusief ontbijt. Kamer heel ruim en netjes, eigen keukentje, was erg praktisch. De kamer lag op de vijfde verdieping en dat was wel erg warm, zonder airconditioning.  Vlakbij de snelweg gelegen, niet heel veel parkeergelegenheid. Het is een…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Aug 8, 2018
column10: Many thanks for your feedback, greatly appreciated! Best regards Christian

column7: Ett enkelt men fräscht hotell. Rummet var litet men funktionellt. Frukosten var helt ok även om utbudet var begränsat, testa ingefärsshoten.  Personalen var trevlig och hjälpsam. Om jag behöver bo över i Lund igen då väljer jag hotell Finn.
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 4, 2018
column10: Hej JP Tusen tack för vänliga ord och att du recenserat oss. Du är varmt välkommen åter. Trevlig sommar, vänliga hälsningar Christian

column7: Das Hotel liegt etwas außerhalb von Lund an einer Durchgangs-Straße. Die Zimmer sind aber überwiegend im hinteren Gebäude, so dass es sehr ruhig war. Das vollautomatische Einchecken hat problemlos funktioniert, die Menüführung am PC war sehr einfach. Unser Zimmer war sehr groß,…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 4, 2018
column10: Vielen herzlichen Dank für Ihren wunderbaren Rezension. Es freut uns natürlich das Sie den Aufenthalt bei uns geniesst haben. Wir wünschen Ihnen einen schönen Sommer und willkommen zurück beim nächsten Besuch in Lund. Mit freundlichen Grüssen Christian Weste

column6: Hôtel propre, tout est rapide et efficace
column7: De passage à Lund, j'ai eu l'occasion de séjourner à l'Hotel Finn deux fois, en janvier et février 2018. Le check-in et le check-out se fait via des bornes à l'accueil. J'ai mis moins de 2 minutes à récupérer ma clé et accéder à ma chambre. Il s'agit en fait d'un petit studio…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Informationsansvarig at Hotel FinnResponded Apr 24, 2018
column10: Merci bien monsieur, Nous sommes trés content de lire votre revue. Nous saluons le retour Avec mes meilleures salutations. Eva Persson

column7: Hotell med opersonlig reception där du förväntad checka in och ut själv. Rena fräscha rum med litet pentry. Liten frukostbuffé med det viktigaste. C:a 15-20 minuters promenad till absoluta centrum. Skramlig hiss ett stort minus.
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Mar 12, 2018
column10: Hej Cenneth, stort tack för din recension och välkommen åter! Vänliga hälsningar Christian

column7: I stood there for 2 mounth! It was so cozy and sooo nice. The rooms are amazing! Self service type hotel. Best place ever! The staff was sooo nice and friendly. They also have some bicycles that you can borrow. They have also breakfast .
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Mar 5, 2018
column10: Truly a big thank you for a wonderful review, I'm glad you enjoyed it here with us. Hope to see you back in the future again.  Best regards Christian Weste

column7: Super oplevelse! dog med et lille men..... da vi ankom kl. 16:15 var dørene låst vi fulgte anvisningen ved døren for at få hjælp men der kom ikke noget svar. En venlig gæst låst os ind, således vi kunne tjekke ind uden problemer. Det kunne være en ide med en talkode til døren…
column8: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Värdansvarig at Hotel FinnResponded Jan 2, 2018
column10: Hej Paul Erik, Tack för att du tagit dig tiden att dela med dig om ditt omdöme, är uppskattat! Tråkigt att ni inte fick något svar vid porttelefonen och absolut kunde vi har skickat en kod till dig. Men blir glad av att höra om den fina hjälpen ni fick av en annan gäst! Tack för den trevliga recensionen och hoppas att få välkomna er åter! Vänliga Hälsningar, Emelie Jörgensen

column7: Es un hotel moderno, muy limpio y cómodo. Las habitaciones son muy amplias, tienen una pequeña cocina, una sala, y un baño de buen tamaño. El personal de servicio es muy atento y el desayuno está muy bien.
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 1, 2017
column10: Thank you very much for nice Words and welcome back. Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column7: ett fräsht hotell med självbetjäntning vid in och utcheckning. bodde här 1 natt, fanns inget att klaga på men checka in sent på kvällen och checka ut tidigt på morgonen så hann inte se så mycket, men av vad jag såg så var det klart prisvärd för vad jag betalade.
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 13, 2017
column10: Tack så mycket för din trevliga recension.   Med vänliga hälsningar Christian

column7: Easy-to-use self check-in/check-out counters. Particularly large room and bathroom. Excellent beds. Very good lighting. Our room had a full pantry with fridge, microwave oven etc. Good shower cabin, but a bathroom mat would be welcome to avoid having to walk around with wet…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 8, 2017
column10: Dear Hans  Thank you for this nice review of your stay with us.  A few suggestions that we will take under consideration. You are right, parking spaces are limited and doesn't cater for all 80 rooms. However, during night time when the surrounding shops are closed those parking spaces can be used between 6 PM and 9 AM.  Hope to see you back in the near future!  Best regards Christian Weste

column7: Stayed in this hotel on and off for 18 months for work in a studio large room, the rooms themselves are spacious and have great showers and comfortable beds.    The small kitchenette is OK but lacks an oven, which gets slightly annoying over a longer stay as there's only so much…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 8, 2017
column10: Dear Jay  Thank you for your review, I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and in Lund.  Not having an oven in the rooms is mainly due to fire safety and security, the authorities won't allow it. However, we are planning for a breakfast upgrade, we aim to implement it during this fall, early winter.  Hope to see you back in Lund in the near future.  Best regards Christian Weste

column6: Smart, clean, efficient and good value
column7: My wife and I stayed for 1 night in a large, clean, stylish and comfortable room. It is an easy walk into the town centre and a wide range of restaurants. (We didn't borrow the Hotel Finn bikes, but we noticed that others did. Good to have loan umbrellas avast the door too.)…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Aug 28, 2017
column10: Many thanks for taking the time to write this nice review.  I'm happy to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to see you back in the near future now that your son is studying at Lund University.  Best regards Christian Weste

column6: Fräscht och fint budgethotell i Lund!
column7: Ett prisvärt och fräscht hotell att bo på om man är på besök i Lund, eller på genomresa och inte vill bo i Malmö. Smidig incheckning som man sköter själv via hotellets dator om man kommer sent. Vårt rum var stort och ljust, och bonusen var den lilla köksdelen med kastruller och…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Aug 28, 2017
column10: Hej Agneta  Tack för en trevlig recension, kul att se att ni uppskattade vårt koncept. Varmt välkomna tillbaka vid ett annat tillfälle.  Med vänliga hälsningar Christian Weste

column7: It is close to motorway and to the city center. Very comfortable bad, clean room. The breakfast was enough. Very fast check in and out. Not too many parkering place unfortunately in front of the hotel.
column8: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Host at Hotel FinnResponded Aug 14, 2017
column10: Dear Miki B, Thank you for taking your time to share your thoughts. Glad to read that you enjoyed your stay here.  Hope to see you again. Kind Regards, Emelie Jörgensen

column7: I booked the single room whilst working in the area. The room is very basic with a single bed, TV and bathroom. There is no wardrobe space or anywhere for clothes. The bathroom has the tiniest sink I have ever seen when you try to get a wash in it the water goes all over the…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Aug 28, 2017
column10: Many thanks for writing a review about your stay.  Most likely you booked one of our single rooms with are small in size and most suited for perhaps a stay of one or two nights and for a cost concious guest. We also have larger alternatives in Studio Medium or even Studio Large should you stay longer periods.  You mention the area as a factor, perhaps the next time you visit Lund one of our two other hotels in the city center, Hotel Lundia or Grand Hotel could be an alternative?  Best regards Christian Weste

column7: Dejligt hotel med self-check in. Værelserne er dejlig rene og der er lille køkken. Alt virker nyt og pænt. Der er hvad der skal være til morgenmad, og der er gratis kaffe 24/7. Brød og juice er kedeligt, men æg er varme og tilpas blødkogte. Lidt irriterende at folk skal checke…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Aug 28, 2017
column10: Hej Ulrik  Stort tack för en trevlig recension. Hoppas ni har njutit av semestern och ni är varmt välkomna tillbaka vid ett annat tillfälle.  Med vänlig hälsning Christian Weste

column7: Detta var vårt sista hotel på semestern och vi var ganska trötta efter en lång bilkörning så vår radar gällande hotellet var kanske inte helt påslagen.   Men rummet var helt ok, inget extra men det hade vi heller inte förväntat oss. Det är självklart rent och bra standard men…
column8: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Värd at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 19, 2017
column10: Hej Henric73, Tack för att du har tagit dig tiden att skriva om er vistelse, det uppskattar vi. Precis som du skriver så har vi alla olika förväntningar. Våra rum är neutralt och praktiskt inredda för vi vill att gäster själva ska kunna sätta sin egen prägel, då många gäster bor under en längre period. Men vi tar åt oss av vad du skriver.  Skulle ni besöka oss igen och vill sitta lite mer ostört så får man mer är gärna ta med sig frukosten till rummet.  Önskar dig och din familj en fortsatt trevlig sommar. Hälsningar, Emelie Jörgensen

column7: My husband needed to travel to Lund for a conference and this was one of the listed hotels. We had never stayed at a self-service hotel, but the reviews here helped me know what to expect. The hotel is clean; it is simple to check in and out. We didn't get the breakfast, but…
column8: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Värd at Hotel FinnResponded Jun 29, 2017
column10: Dear Georg'ann C, Thank you for taking your time to write about your stay, much appreciated. Glad that you liked it here and you are more than welcome to visit us again.  Kind Regards, Emelie Jörgensen

column7: Mycket centralt beläget hotell, nära till restauranger och livsmedelsbutiker. Passar utmärkt för dem som tänkt stanna lite längre, det finns tvättmaskin att låna, ett hyfsat bra gym och rummet har ett litet men förvånansvärt välutrustat pentry. Smart!  Inredningen är fräsch,…
column8: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Värd at Hotel FinnResponded Jun 29, 2017
column10: Hej Veronika B, Tack för att du har tagit dig tiden att skriva om oss och din vistelse. Kul att läsa dina positiva ord om rummen, möjligheterna och kaffet. Det har blivit mer vanligt för barnfamiljer att komma hit och vi håller på att kikar på lite olika saker vi skulle kunna göra för barn och deras trivsel, speciellt så vill vi göra något roligt för dem nere på vår innergård - så det håller vi tummarna för att kunna göra snart. Frukosten är tänkt att vara simpel och bara ha det mest nödvändiga. Många kan laga sin egen frukost på rummen. Nästa gång får vi se till att du får ett ljusare rum. Varmt välkommen tillbaka en annan gång. Hälsningar, Emelie Jörgensen

column7: Märkligt hotell, ingen personal större del av dagen o hela kvällen. Hänglås på kylen med alkohol, kan endast köpas när personal finns på plats, vid frukost alltså! Medioker frukost på IKEA porslin. Grab and go låter trendigt, men är en medioker frukost. Urusel bäddsoffa,…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded May 30, 2017
column10: Hej Michael  Det stämmer att vi primärt är ett självservicehotell, vi driver även de mer traditionella Hotel Lundia och Grand Hotel i Lund som kanske är bättre lämpade för dina önskemål vid nästa besök i Lund. Enligt svensk alkohollag får alkohol inte serveras innan 11.00 och därefter endast när serveringsansvarig personal finns närvarande.  Beklagar att vi inte levt upp till dina förväntningar med just denna annars omtyckta och alltmer populära produkt.  Med vänlig hälsning Christian Weste

column7: Totally misled by the opinions in here I've chosen this "Hotel"... Seriously? Can't they call it simply youth hostel perhaps because of its price?? To start with, do not come late: the advertised phone did not work and there isn't reception. I had to wait 10 min to be open by a…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded May 17, 2017
column10: Dear LaurenoF  Sorry to read about your experincies and that the stay didn't live up to your expectations. We are mainly  a self-service hotel, staff is on site normally between 6-12 and 15-21. Outside these hours Hotel Finn is monitored 24/7 by staff at our sister property Hotel Lundia. Registration is however always made at one of our two check-in terminals in the lobby.  Reading the comments maybe a more traditional hotel would suit you better the next time you visit Lund? You can find more information at Lundia.se or grandilund.se.  Best regards Christian Weste

column7: Have stayed at Hotel Finn on several occasions and always considered the hotel to be good value for money.  The hotel is very peaceful and with all necessary services and facilities in place; especially for those who are perfectly fine with "self-servicelike hotels". The rooms…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Apr 7, 2017
column10: Many thanks for the kind words and for taking the time writing a review.   Never hesitate to get in touch with our hosts should you have any questions.  And should you ever forget the entrance code there's a 24/7 intercom to get in touch with staff at our sister property Hotel Lundia.   Best regards and have a nice weekend.   Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column7: Trevligt rum och bra med ett eget kök. Fräscht och god sovkomfort. Litet gym. Frukosten var enkel men med möjlighet att ta med, vilket var bra i vårt fall. Läget är superbra om man inte ska vara i centrala Lund men bussen till centrum gick utanför hotelldörren.
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Feb 26, 2017
column10: Hej  Tack för att du tog dig tiden att skriva om vistelsen hos oss.  Varmt välkommen vid ett annat tillfälle.  Med vänlig hälsning Christian Weste

column7: Very polite staff. They have a small but useful gym, a computer free for the guests, a free car parking just in the front of the entrance. The rooms are clean and cozy. I was here in October and back now on February and, for sure, I will stay there next time I will be around
column8: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Hostess at Hotel FinnResponded Feb 13, 2017
column10: Thank you for your review and your kind words, Giulio F. You are more then welcome back to us anytime, we are glad to have you here. See you soon again. Kind regard, Emelie Jörgensen

column7: Having now spent my 40th week at this hotel I thought I ought to review it!   Rooms: I've stopped in M, L and XL rooms all of which are good with comfortable beds, TV with Swedish and Danish channels plus BBC World, iron and a kitchen with fridge/freezer, microwave, Dolce Gusto…
column8: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Host at Hotel FinnResponded Feb 13, 2017
column10: Thank you for your review and your kind words. It is much appreciated and we are more then happy that you have been staying with us for all this time and that we will keep seeing you. I will see you soon! And Thank you again for this kind review. Kind Regards, Emelie Jörgensen

column7: We arrived late and called the person of permanence who opened the door. We then checked in "electronically" and quickly accessed our booked rooms. Great.  The next day, we discovered that the coffee/cappuccino/etc. machine was out of order and a really basic breakfast choice:…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Feb 12, 2017

column7: The hotel is located a bit outside of downtown Lund, I estimate it is about 15 minutes walk. the rooms are nice, clean and large with a small kitchenette. Beds are all right. there is a gym that I did not use as well as a self service kitchen where you can buy soft drinks and…
column8: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Hostess  at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 11, 2016
column10: Dear MartinFJ71, Thank you for taking your time to write about your stay and your kind words. You are more than welcome to stay with us again. Would like to take the opportunity to wish you a Marry Christmas! Kind regards, Emelie Jörgensen

column6: Great hotel with everything you need!
column7: I rented the studio for 5 days and it was just wonderful, I loved the design. Since this is a slef service hotel, I didn't see the staff a lot, but the ones I saw were very friendly. The breakfast was a bit repetitive, but still good. On my last night I had some problems with…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 11, 2016
column10: Thank you for the Review and my apologies for the disturbance from your neighbour, I'm glad our staff could assist you.  We hope to see you here again.  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column6: Lund onder de rook van Malmo
column7: Een net hotel onder de rook van Malmo. Voor een lang verblijf geschikt en de studio zijn groot en schoon. Direct in de buurt van restaurants en verschillende mooie golfcourts die in de natuur verscholen liggen. Binnen een half uurtje bent u in het centrum van Malmo.
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 11, 2016
column10: Thank you for taking the time Writing about your stay, I'm glad you enjoyed it here.  Hope to see you soon again.  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column7: Если номер будет в сторону трассы - шумно, поскольку по ней курсируют как междугородние автобусы, так и кареты скорой помощи  (или полиция) с сигналкой... Все системы автоматизированы и персонала нет, кроме девушки утром, смахивающей крошки со столиков и подающей что-либо…

column6: Decent, but not very business travel friendly.
column7: If you need a place to stay with a very flexible check in and check out logistics this is a good place because it's self-checking. That doesn't mean there's no one there to act as reception, but their availability is limited. Some things in the lobby to keep you entertained.…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 11, 2016
column10: Thank you for taking the time reviewing us. I'm sorry to hear that you stay didn't match your expectations, despite Nutella for breakfast.  I'm curious to find out which room you stayed in, just to make sure that our houseman has had a look at the electricity.  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column6: Bra hotell i utkanten av Lund
column7: Trevligt och enkelt hotell i utkanten av Lund. Enkla, moderna och rena rum. Bra och trevlig personal. Hotellet har också större lägenheter som man kan hyra. Hotellet har enkel men ok frukost. Det finns ingen restaurang på hotellet men en bra pizzeria runt hörnet.
column8: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Hotellvärdinna at Hotel FinnResponded Nov 13, 2016

column6: Don't clean the room between days!!
column7: Coffee machine usually broken or malfunctioning, nobody in the reception during night. If you have a problem, the only way is contacting someone outside by phone.   Poor breakfast, and far from downtown.   Some thermostats are unintentionally blocked, so you cannot change the…

column10: Dear Raul,  Thank you for taking the time and reviewing us, we appreciate that. That is true, there is no staff at the hotel during nighttime but there is always possible to get in contact with the staff if there would be any problems or doubts. The temperature is set for the whole hotel to be at a convenient temperature for our guets.  We have taken your thoughts into consideration and if you would like to book again, please ontact us directly at info@lundia.se. We have two other hotels, Hotel Lundia and Grand Hotel, they might be a better choise for your needs.  Again, thank you for taking the time and we wish to welcome you back again. Wish you the best,  Best Regards Martina Bergqvist

column6: Pretty good for a short stay
column7: Things we liked:  - Full sized sofa bed in our studio room for our child to sleep on. - Free laundry facilities! - Location of the property, both to the Lund central square (15 minutes walking) and to the highways in the local region. - Basic kitchen facilities in the room. -…

column6: Best place to stay in Lund!
column7: As I travel to Skåne on a regular basis, it took me a while to find the best place to stay. I have now found it: Hotel Finn in Lund. A great concept of very comfortable apartments, a nice gym, great connections both by car and public transport. My favorite place for sure!
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 2, 2016
column10: Dear Jan  Many thanks for your kind words, I'm glad to hear that you are enjoying your time with us. I'll make sure Camilla & Emelie will spread this among our colleagues.  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Receptionist at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 18, 2016

column7: Das Finn Hotel ist ein von außen eher unscheinbares Hotel, das durch durchdachte Details und Geräumigkeit punkten kann. Die Doppelzimmer sind ca. 20m² groß, das Bad mit eingerechnet. Die Betten sind okay, es gibt eine moderne Küchenzeile, ein Bad mit ebenerdiger Dusche und…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 2, 2016
column10: Vielen herzlichen Dank für Ihren Bericht. Wir hoffen dass Sie uns bald wieder besuchen werden. Mit freundlichen Grüssen Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column7: Lätt att köra dit. Parkera gratis. Smidig automatiskt incheckning  Rent och fräscht. Stort rum. Liten dubbelsäng för två personer, så jag låg på golvet. Bara en uppsättning handukar men det fixades snabbt när jag sa till. Bra med fruki5man kan ta med.

Hjärtligt välkomna till oss igen.  Med Vänliga Hälsningar Martina Bergqvist

column7: hotellet på sidan om,men nära att gå in till stan där det finns fina restauranger och gångvägar.det stora pusset är den lugna placeringen att man även vågar parkera en dyr bil.inge restaurang,frukosten...men det finns småplock så det räcker
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 6, 2016

column7: It was a bit surprised after entering the hotel for the first time to have no reception only some monitors where I was able to check in. It was very simple to do and was also surprisingly quick.  The rooms did were a nice size with the little kitchen and the table. The bed was…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 6, 2016
column10: Dear Critical Duck  I enjoyed reading your review since it's very spot on to what features this mainly self-service hotel has or hasn't. However, we have staff on site every morning up until noon and most evenings between 3PM and 9PM. Outside those hours you can always get in touch with staff at one of our other properties in Lund 24 hours. When it comes to the cleaning you may alert our staff and we'll see to your request. Also due to us being a self-service hotel we provide a lighter breakfast which recently during June was updated, this mainly due to guest feedback and we think it will suit future guests even better. The next time you visit Lund you might perhaps consider our other hotels, have a look at our websites www.lundia.se or www.grandilundia.se to find out more. Should you deside to stay at Hotel Finn again, don't hesitate to contact me beforehand at christian.weste@lundia.se and I'll make sure that we take good care of you.  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column7: If you are after convenience and cleanliness, then Hotel Finn is a good place to stay. If you like dealing with a real person at reception and a bedroom with a bit of character, then find somewhere else (My room was basic and didn't have a kitchenette/drink making facilities). …

Very nice rooms with a small kitchen and fridge(!) I love that it feels like a small apartment and I can cook my own meals. Small gym if you feel like working out. Nice lounge area. Nice staff. Free parking and wifi. I will be coming back!  Only the breakfast was a little under…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 6, 2016
column10: Dear Mikael  Thank you for writing this review, I'm glad to see that you enjoyed your stay. Yes, since we are mainly a self-service hotel, the breakfast is a little different from a more traditional hotel. However, we have recently made a few changes which we think will improve the guest experience.  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column7: Vorab: Zugang gibts nur mit zugesandter Codenummer oder Nr. der buchenden Kreditkarte. Oder man wartet bis jemand kommt, also ein anderer Gast. Hotel hat eine automatisierte Rezeption zum Einchecken. Personal ist nur morgens beim Frühstück anwesend, dann aber gleich zwei Leute.…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 6, 2016
column10: Sehr geherter Hr Hartwig.  Vielen Dank für die Bewertung über uns.  Beim einchecken gibt es am Eingang ein Intercom, da kommt man in Verbindung mit Personal am Hotel Lundia und die können die Türe aufmachen.  Personal sind jeden Morgen bei der Arbeit bis 12 Uhr. Abends vom 15 bis 20 oder 21 Uhr wieder, Änderungen oder andere Zeiten können vorkommen. Den Frühstück wurde in die letzten paar Wochen etwas umgeändert und verbessert, es gab nämlich auch andere Gäste die sich die Wahlmöglicheit wünschten. Es freut mich das Sie ingesamt einen guten Aufenthalt gehabt haben.  Mit freundlichen Grüssen Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column6: Really nice rooms for a good price!
column7: The rooms have a lot of space, really fresh and new rooms, bathrooms and they also have a kitchen where you can cook your own food.  Really nice hotel room that is not very expensive. Probably because the hotel is a self check in hotel, but it went really smooth and if you have…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 6, 2016
column10: Dear Nina  Many thanks for nice words, I'm glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Welcome back in the near future.  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column7: We arrived around 20:00 and when we arrived there was noone at the reception and an old couple staying there opened the door for us. It is almost a no staff hotel and you have to figure it out how to check-in, but they make it quite easy with thorough explanations. They have…
column8: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 6, 2016
column10: Dear Erdem  Many thanks for taking the time writing a review. Yes, we are mainly a self-service hotel and hosts are available every AM and with few exceptions most evenings also. You can always get in touch with staff at one of our sister properties by unsing the house phone in the lobby, available 24/7.  Swedish laws regarding alcohol prevents guests from self service in public areas.  We hope to see you here again in the near future. Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column7: Had to stay & found this place on a short notice. Very friendly place with freedom & all necessary facilities.I would recommend to all.Accommodation is nice & spacious with in house mini kitchen for self catering. 24 hour breakfast facility is special though you have to pay for…

column7: Ho soggiornato in questo albergo per una notte, durante l'ultimo viaggio a Lund. C'è la possibilità di fare il check in e check out in autonomia. La stanza è confortevole e colorata, un piccolo monolocale con cucina. Il personale è molto gentile. Scarseggia nelle proposte per la…

Om man kan tänka sig en kvarts promenad in till centrum så är Hotell Finn ett utmärkt alternativ med gratis parkering precis utanför porten.Vi fick ett stort rum på markplan med pentry och sittgrupp. Rymligt och fräscht. Extra plus för varma croissanter till frukost.
column8: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Hotellvärd at Hotel FinnResponded Feb 25, 2016
column10: Hej Annika D, Tack för du tagit dig tid att skriva om er vistelse hos oss.  Härligt att ni fick ett rum som ni trivdes i och att croissanterna var uppskattade. Hoppas ni kommer och besöker oss igen. Önskar dig en trevlig dag! Med Vänliga Hälsningar, Emelie Jörgensen

column7: Städningen var inte helt 100 i badrummet, och toaborsten bada i vatten. Annars fick jag ett bra intryck, fräscht och trevlig personal, med små medel hade receptionsområdet kunnat gjorts lite mysigare...(roligare belysning) Frukosten var bra trots mycket engångsförpackningar,…

column10: Hej, Tack för att du tagit dig tiden att skriva en recension till oss och för att du valt att bo hos oss.  Städningen av toaletten har tagits upp med städarna och det har setts över.  Tack för tipset om lite roligare belysning, ska ta en titt på ljussättningen och se vad vi kan göra för att göra det mysigare. column7: Simple self-service check-in, and large clean family room with modern design and kitchenette. Great lobby area and self-service pay-as-you-take snack.  Breakfast a little chaotic, due small serving area and morning rush.  Overall good value for money.

Havde 2 overnatninger på Hotel Finn. Man skal lige være forberedt på at al ind- og udcheckning foregår elektronisk og uden betjening. Værelset var fint og rummeligt og med et godt stort badeværelse. Man kan gratis låne cykler på hotellet eller gå de 15 minutter ind til centrum.…

This hotel suits you who want's a clean, modern and quiet place to sleep at. You check-in by yourself at a touch screen computer which then spits out a key card.   I've only stayed in single rooms, which are small but fills it's function, nice beds and very fresh WC/shower.  The…

column6: A great place for a long term stay
column7: We stayed for about two weeks in a suite - bed, bath, kitchenette, sitting area.  The bed was comfortable, the bathroom larger than European norm, and the kitchenette had just enough to get by.    Two highlights: one was the table on wheels in the suite with two chairs allowed…

The good side of this hotel is the location: ten minutes walking from the city center. All the rest is nothing special, my room was big but there was no writing table nor garderobe, and I was located in the basement, so it was really dark. Breakfast was included, but the free…

Great hotel with all you need. Clean, great beds, WiFi that works and simple but good breakfast. Free parking right in front of the door. Small gym and spa/sauna in the basement that you can use for free. They have bikes as well if you want to take a ride into town.

We travelled by car, two adults and a teenager. Parking was no problem, and the hotel was close to the highway. Reception is self service, which was no problem at all. The hotel seemed to be brand new, clean and high standard of reception area, stairways as well as rooms, beds…

The hotel location is right on the highway with parking facilty. The room was clean and ambience was great! I loved it, the kitchenette, bathroom were so user friendly and comfortable. The bed was cosy and inviting......i would surely go there again......

Been there for one night. High profile self-servisse hotel. Structure and place are OK. Good facilities in the room and high finish quality. Not so many places to park around the hotel, so it´s reccomendable to take car of it.

A very good self-service hotel. Clean rooms, free parking and Wi-Fi, within walking distance to the town centre (10-15 mins), convenient price. Good breakfast, you can take 5 items and you can eat them there or take them as "breakfast to go". Excellent hotel for one night stay.

Vi anlände ganska sent och den automatiska incheckningen var väldigt smidig! Dock gick det inte att låna cyklar på kvällen då personalen inte fanns på plats.   Rummet var väldigt fräscht och tillhörande kök var välutrustat (induktionshäll, rivjärn, flera kastruller, porslin,…

column6: Rimelig hotell med en del mangler.
column7: Jeg var på Hotel Finn i 5 dager i begynnelsen av juli 2015 sammen med 2 kamerater. Vi hadde sett mange positive omtaler av dette hotellet på nettet, og dette skapte litt forventninger. Dessverre kan jeg ikke si at alle forventningene ble oppfylt, og jeg kommer tilbake til…

Situated a walking distance from the centre (at least if you have no luggage), the hotel offers cheap accommodation. The satellite rooms are small but comfortable and quiet. The breakfast has limited offering, but everything was tasty and fresh. The only problem was entering the…

column6: Good hotel. Be prepared for automatic check-in!
column7: I chose this hotel mainly since I needed a kitchenette as I stayed for an entire week. The room is large, comfortable and the kitchen is perfect for displaying the needs of a long stay. It's a bit outside the old city center, but easy to get by foot (15 min walk or by bike (only…

Trevligt och fint hotell, Fina rum och sköna sängar!, utmärkt att man har ett eget kök på rummet, Lite ovant att stå och prata med en låda när man vill bli incheckade vid dörren men otroligt smart, det man kan sakna är avsaknaden av personal vi bodde där i 3dagar och såg aldrig…

Bra service, personalen är serviceinriktad, lugnt och skönt, rent och snyggt, hög standard. Lätt att ta sig till hotellet, och bra prisnivå. Att det finns ett litet gym att träna i gillade jag mycket.

column10: Dear Grace C,  Thank you for your review!  I'm so sorry to hear that you are not completely satisfied with your stay.  You should have received a SMS with your personal pin code for the entrance the morning of you arrival.   We are staffed Monday- Friday from 7.00 am to 21.00 pm with exception a few hours between lunch and check in time. On Saturday and Sunday we are staffed from 8.00 -12.30. Our sister Hotel is glad to help you during all other time, again I´m very sorry if there has been some technical problems with the door bell during your arrival.  I hope the rest of your stay was pleasant and that you will come back soon again! If you have any other questions please don't hesitate to contact me.   Best regards Jasmina

column8: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Front Office Manager at Hotel FinnResponded May 30, 2014
column10: Dear Mana!  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about Hotel Finn on Tripadvisor, we appreciate it a lot! I would like to make some comments regarding your review:  - Like you say, our concept might not be for everyone. Hotel Finn is - like we are clear about on all booking channels - a self service hotel. This suits travellers that don't need traditional hotel services and instead like a more relaxed atmosphere. That's why we for example have made the lobby area into Finn's Livingroom where your can come hang out, play Wii and Foosball, eat a meal, etc.   - It takes about 15 minutes to walk into the centre of Lund and a lot of people appreciate our location because of the convenience of being close to the high way as well as public transportation. I know that you got assistance how to take the bus as well as taxi from our sister hotel in the centre but you decided to walk.   - Since the room you stayed in is an apartments, and a lot of our guests prefer to make their own meals in the room, we have decided to have a lower price and make breakfast optional. This is for the convenience of the guest so that you don't have to pay for anything that you won't use. I would also like to mention that you and your partner received a complementary breakfast.   - In my experience the rooms are not hard to find - or at least I haven't had a complaint about it before since there are signs toward all rooms all the way from the lobby until you are in the correct floor.   - Although we are a self service hotel we do have staff here both in the morning as well as afternoon and night time on weekdays. On Saturdays and Sunday we are here for at least 5 hours each day. If there is a problem or if you have any questions when we are not present there is a phone in the lobby which you simply lift to get assistance 24/7. A phone I know that you used while you were here.   Thank you again and enjoy you day! For another visit to Lund I would recommend our sister hotels Lundia or Grand Hotel where you get a more traditional experience in the centre of the city.   Kind regards, your host Emelie

Not pretentious self service hotel but with all facilities that you need. All is in order to makes you feel at home. Stuff is very pleasant and helpful. Very good value for money. The perfect Hotel for business trip.

New hotel with different, automated, approach. Most of things are automated, you will meet staff only few times a day. If you need something, you have to use phone at the desk. But the staff is very kind and helpful.  I stayed for few days in single room and there was almost…

As others have said this is a new "self service" hotel concept. However there was a very helpful and friendly staff member on duty who helped us check in using the airport type check-in machines. He readily admitted they were having teething problems as they had only recently…

column7: Mysigt hotell med lagom gångavstånd till centrum. Nära stadsparken med bra möjligheter för motion och mysiga omgivningar. Toppen med ett litet kök i rummet. Både kyl och diskmaskin fanns. Takbjälkar och stora fönster.
column8: Response from Anna W, Receptionschef at The More Hotel LundResponded May 1, 2018

column6: Häftig miljö med gammalt och nytt i fin kombination
column7: Häftig miljö med gammalt och nytt i fin kombination. Fantastiskt god mat på Vendels matrum och jättegod frukostbuffé. Mycket trevlig och tillmötesgående personal. Ovanliga rum med pentry och mellanvägg med vridbar tv. Kul lösning.

column6: Good and very nice hotel, but...

column6: Fina miljöer och mycket bra service
column7: Vi fick en mycket bra service under vårt besök med jobbet. Lokalerna var fina och välskötta. Frukost, lunch och fika var utan tvekan mycket bra. Extra plus att personalen var så tillmötesgående och underlättade för oss.

Vänligen gå in på https://www.vendelsmatrum.se/ för att se öppet tider för restaurangen.

column8: Response from Anna W, Receptionschef at The More Hotel LundResponded Jan 30, 2018

column7: Room is superb! That's exactly the space and atmosphere I need, very consistent with the pictures shown at the website.  However, I'm a bit surprised that they don't provide toothbrush, toothpaste and hair conditioner. In addition, I think it's a standard to have the room…
column8: Response from Anna W, Receptionschef at The More Hotel LundResponded Nov 17, 2017
column10: Thank you for your comments and we are glad that you liked our rooms and breakfast. We are an apartment hotel and our guest stays both for a couple of nights and for long term so we don´t provide toothbrush etc.  Regarding cleaning; we are thinking about the environment and clean the room if you stay more than 5 nights. Sorry that you weren’t satisfied during check-out but it is our policy to charge the guest before leaving the hotel.

column7: Havde 4 værelser. Alle var lækre, moderne og smagfuldt indrettet. Virkelig lækkert hotel der klart kan anbefales. Kommer helt afgjort igen næste gang Lund skal besøges. Beliggenhed meget centralt og i gåafstand til gode restauranter.
column8: Response from Anna W, Receptionschef at The More Hotel LundResponded Nov 12, 2017
column10: Dejligt att höra att ni trivdes och tyckte om vårat hotell. Hjärtligt välkomna tillbaka när ni ska besöka Lund nästa gång.

column7: On my recent visit to Lund I stayed two weeks in The More Hotel in Lund.  It was a great experience, god location, nice rooms with a dining table, sofa, basic kitchen and a good bed. The staff was very helpful with practical stuff like printing, parking etc. The breakfast was a…
column8: Response from Anna W, Receptionschef at The More Hotel LundResponded Oct 31, 2017

column7: Fint décor, utmärkt frukost, bra träningslokal, utmärkt restaurang, centralt läge, och framförallt personal som ville lära känna mig, ser på mig och ger utmärkt service och vänlighet. Jag känner mig hemma på the More Hotel.
column8: Response from Anna W, Receptionschef at The More Hotel LundResponded Oct 31, 2017
column10: Tack för dina fina kommentarer. Vi vill gärna att våra gäster ska känna sig som hemma fast dom är borta och det kändes som vi prickade rätt för dig. Hoppas att vi ses igen när dina vägar korsar Lund.

column7: We stayed here for one night. It's not far from the city center (15 min walk). The room was big, we had one big bed and a sofa for 3, it was perfect. Bathroom is also big and well designed. Breakfast is good too. We had everything we need.
column8: Responded Aug 29, 2017
column10: Hi,  Thank you for the positive respons. You are more than welcome back to visit us again.  Try the hotel in the wintertime, a nice evening by our lovely open fire and a hot cup of coffee.

column7: Smakfullt hotell med jättetrevlig personal, snyggt, hemtrevligt, modernt med stil och känsla för inredning. Superb frukost och underbara smaker på de vedugnsbakade pizzorna. Här bor vi igen, längtar redan tillbaka för att prova jacuzzin och ha det mysigt! Lägenheten för fyra…
column8: Responded Aug 16, 2017
column10: Hej! Tack för härliga kommentarer och vi hoppas verkligen att ni kommer tillbaka.  Tyvärr kommer inte jacuzzin komma igång igen men man kan njuta av en skön bastu.

column7: We were booked at the More Hotel Lund as part of a block of wedding guests traveling from all over the world. As a result, we were able to see several of the rooms at the More as we visited with the other guests. All of the rooms were great. Minimalist Swedish style, clean, and…
column8: Responded Jul 26, 2017
column10: Hi,  It has been great having you here at our hotel. You are all more than welcome to visit us again. We are a small hotel we don´t have 24hour staff, but we have night call from 8pm until 7am when the reception is closed. Since we are an apartment hotel we don´t have housekeeping every day, but weakly cleaning for longstay more than 5days. Depending on what kind of deal och reservation you make the breakfast is normally included in the set bar price. Our rooms differ from each other in form of size (studio small, standard, superior, De Luxe and suite) The bed alternative are single, Twin or Queen.   Hope of seeing you all again!  Carina Reception.

column7: Väldigt mysigt och fint hotell. Lagom stort och nära centrum. Jättefina rum med det lilla extra. Vi hade ett familjerum med pentry, bäddsoffa, takfönster samt både sittgrupp och matbord. Fanns pentry med både kyl och diskmaskin. Rekommenderas varmt!
column8: Responded Jul 26, 2017
column10: Tack för ett trevligt omdöme, så härligt att ni ville göra oss sällskap i sommar. Hjärtligt välkomna igen. Glöm inte att hålla utkik efter kampanjer. Ha en bra dag.  Carina The more hotel, Lund

column7: Mycket fint inrett. Fräsch luft i tysta rum och välstädat överallt. Frukosten är mycket fin men lite lite i underkant på utbud. Om det hade varit lite mer på frukost hade det blivit full pott. Kan rekommendera detta hotell.

This was a great hotel at a wonderful price. After having stayed in hotels in Denmark and Northern Germany our expectations had really dropped. The More Hotel was a nice reminder that a simple hotel can still feel really nice at a good price. Our rooms were quite spacious and…

Vi valde ett annorlunda hotell, istället för ett vanligt Scandic, Radisson etc.  Här har alla rummen ett litet pentry, så det är egentligen ett lägenhetshotell (oxå). Men rummen är stora och mycket smakfullt inredda. Det är lätt att bara vila och ha skönt häng på rummet, såväl…

column6: Spacious family rooms with smart room divider
column7: Stayed four people in room w doublebed and sofabed. Sofabed did not turn out to be that comfortable, however, the room was nice and kitchenette well equipped.  Bring your own instant coffee/tea, as there is no means to get at hotel.    Friendly reception and cosy breakfast.

Highly recommend this hotel. Built in an old train facility, it is beautifully crafted and decorated. A cozy atmosphere, and it also has meeting facilities, wine cellar and a small gym. Rooms are spaceous and clean. Personnel are friendly and breakfast was really good with…

Stayed at the More hotel while visiting friends in Lund. It is a smart stylish small hotel created from an old engine shed. Rebuilt to a high quality it is comfortable and quiet and well placed for walking to the station or town centre.   The room was large with skylights which…

Det här är en liten pärla. Du bor i en liten lägenhet med möjlighet laga mat om man vill. Fräscht inrett, trevlig stämning. Jättefin frukost. Du bor både som i en lägenhet och som på hotell. Lägenhetsidén gör att daglig städning inte ingår men det är ett ickeproblem tycker jag.

On our way from Stockholm to Copenhagen we stayed in this nice hotel for one night. The rooms/suites are really nice with all kinds of facilities, and to our surprise we also found a small sauna facility downstairs. The only minor thing is that the reception and bar area are…

Mycket fräscht hotell med bra läge, ca 15 min promenad från centrala Lund. Stora ljusa rum med bra sängar. Litet pentry med kylskåp. Bra frukost med observant personal som fyllde på efterhand som saker och ting tog slut. Trevlig personal i receptionen. Parkering mot avgift på…

column6: Cool hotel in a beautifully renovated building
column7: Stayed here after finding on booking.com. Hotel is beautifully renovated and the design is modern and fresh. Rooms are studios with a small kitchen and a bathroom. Bed is comfortable. It is a nice walk into the town which takes around 15 minutes. There is car parking but you…

column6: Stay in Style in a Locomotive Shed
column7: My husband and I booked a superior studio at the More Hotel, located in a former locomotive shed that has been recently and thoroughly renovated into a very nice hostelry indeed.  We found ourselves in a huge, sunny room with a high ceiling, stylishly subdivided by a head-high…

column6: distance greater than you think, quality less than you expect
column7: staying at the more hotel in lund was ok, but it wasn't what i expected nor what would have been appropriate for the price in this town.  1. location: the hotel advertises itself as being just off the center of town. this is an exaggeration. it is at the very fringe of what one…

Just spend a weekend in Lund at the More hotel. Perfect location 10 min Walk from the central Lund. Very nice and comfortable room. Lovely relaxed atmosphere. If you visit Lund this is the place to stay👍.

#A very nice and creative idea, refurbishing an old industrial locomotive depot to make a hotel.#  *Breakfast was close to average(3.5 points) mainly due to slow "fill up" otherwise a good selection. *Room was very comfortable, spacious and quiet. Xtra points for the…

Ett jättefint rum som var inrett med ett litet pentry och köksmöbler. Väldigt modernt och snyggt. Bra frukost, trevlig personal. Det enda som vi inte hade räknat med, var att vi inte fick någon städning under tiden vi var där (stannade 2 nätter). Det gav ett minus till en för…

Gute Lage. Ca. 10 Minuten bis ins Zentrum. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich. Zimmer sind super eingerichtet, man fühlt sich sehr wohl. Alles top, wir können es jedem nur weiterempfehlen.  Das hauseigene Restaurant ist für Genießer, aber auch empfehlenswert.

I was in Lund for a meeting at the University and decided to book this hotel for the good reviews. Right choice. My single room was spacious, very clean and a small kitchen in case of long stay. I was there for two days hence I did not take advantage of that but it could be…

Mycket bra rum, rymligt och trevligt. Rent och snyggt! Skön säng och bra planerat med ett litet kök, soffa, säng och ett fräscht badrum.Bra läge i stan, nära till allt.  Frukosten var urdålig och personalen i reception och kök kunde inte vara mer ointresserade av gästerna. Vi…

L’hôtel n'est pas en plein centre ville (compter 10 minutes de marche) mais à part cela il est excellent ! L'ambiance est chaleureuse, la pièce principale est très agréable et ouverte toute la nuit pour s'y poser tranquillement et même boire un café (une machine nespresso est en…

Fantastiskt bra hotell!  Trevligt bemötande i receptionen vid incheckning.  Rummet var förvånansvärt rymligt och snyggt inrett. Otroligt skön säng och ett mycket bra badrum. Stort plus för tv:n på justerbart väggfäste, mörkläggningsgardinerna, kylskåpet och strykbrädan.   Hann…

Suverän service, rymliga och mycket fräscha rum, bra läge, skön avkoppling framför den välkomnande brasan, välutrustat gym och skön bastu samt en grym frukost. Med självklara val hädanefter... Perfekt om man vill träffa sin släkt och vänner men ändå ha sitt egna. Prisvärt och…

column6: Bra boende i fejkad historisk byggnad
column7: Gamla lokstallarna i Lund är Hotel, men inget finns av den gamla byggnaden, utan det är allt nytt. I alla fall är det ett trevligt Hotel med helt ok rum. Vi var en familj på två vuxna och två tonåringar i en "Studio Superior".   Jag blev lite förvånad att det var lite…

Een aangename verrassing, leuk hotel, grote , nette kamers. Met kookmogelijkheid. Vriendelijk personeel en een lekker restaurant. Proberen waard. Wij komen terug,  Uitgebreid gezond ontbijt met veel fruit

Jättemysigt hotell med stora och fräscha rum. Sköna sängar, bra badrum och plus med egen strykbräda på rummet.Trevlig personal både i reception och matsal. Rekommenderas varmt för både familjer och par.

Antingen 4 eller 5 som betyg! Mycket bra, fint o fräscht - dessutom till ett bra pris.  Väldigt fräscht badrum. Enda som saknas (men som man man oftast inte använder) var schampoo o balsam. Även frukosten var mycket bra. Rekommenderas varmt till ex (som vi) föräldrar som besöker…

Perfekt för en kortvistelse i Lund på lagom promenadavstånd från centrum. Snyggt och trevligt inrett. Skönt med bastu och härlig frukostbuffet. Det enda minus var kostnaden för parkering (100 kr per dygn), visserligen helt nära men kunde ha ingått.

I stayed for 2 nights on a business trip. It was a pleasant room, bright and comfortable, with high ceilings – a great feeling of space. I can thoroughly recommend the breakfast. I would be very happy to stay again should I return to Lund.

Besökte the more hotel en helg i juni 2014 och trivdes jättebra. Rummen var stora, med kök och vardagsrum som skiljdes av med en halvvägg från sovrumsdelen. Fräscht och nytt. Trevlig personal, otroligt god och fin frukost och trevlig lounge i restaurangdelen.

Hvis man skal til Lund kan dette Hotel anbefales, det var et meget hyggeligt hotel i en gammel remise, som man nænsom havde bevaret, man kunne bruge det lille køkken som var på hver værelse, hvis man ellers gad og lave sin egen mad, men man skulle prøve Vendels Matrum samme…

Nicely renovated Hotel in the old Trainstation in Lund. Very big Studio rooms with kitchen and living room. Gym and Sauna and Whirlpool frr to use, parking on site and only 5 min by foot to towncenter. Great Hotel in a lovely atomsphere.

column6: Rymligt och snyggt med läcker design.
column7: Egentligen är det mer ett lägenhetshotell för veckovis boende än ett traditionellt hotell. Men jag använde det som ett vanligt hotell och det fungerade utmärkt om man kan leva med att receptions stänger på natten, vilket jag kan.  Rummet var stort, vackert och trevligt inrett.…

A nice stay for short-term, it is definitely clean and kept warm in winter.   The staff however are quite unfriendly, they left me with a soured memory of the beautiful Lund after accusing me of smoking in my room; I have never been a smoker in my life and was offered no apology…

More hotel i Lund er innredet i 2012 et mer enn 100 år gammelt lokomotivverksted. Innredninger er moderne og smakfull. Rommene er store. Det største hotelllbad jeg har sett med både dusjkabinett og badekar! Frokostsalen er lys og vennlig og frokosten utmerket. Vårt rom hadde…

column6: Mycket bra hotell för sin prisklass
column7: Detta är en pärla i Lund. Hotellet har stora generösa rum som är som en liten ettrummare med litet kök. Du kan sköta dig själv men det finns också en alldeles utmärkt frukost i en trevlig miljö. Du får ingen städning under vistelsen om du stannar fler dagar så det blir lite som…

column6: Good for business (and pleasure) in Lund!
column7: I tried this hotel for a Day Conference with lunch. Very nice and professional staff, well equipped conference room and stimulating atmosphere and ambiance. In walking distance of the city centre and parking 10 m from entrance.  Perfect for the smaller and more informal meetings!

Härligt med ombyggt lokstall och genomgående tågresa. Bra läge med toppenrum. Perfekt med minikök. Mycket trevliga och hjälpsamma receptionister. Bra frukost men har kunnat haft ett lite större utbud. Fräscht. Vi kommer definitivt bo här fler gånger. Det är andra gången vi bor…

We stayed in The More Hotel Lund for three nights at the end of a short vacation in South-Sweden in July. The hotel was a very, very pleasant surprise. We had booked only ten days before arrival through booking.com and got a huge discount.  The rooms are spacious and luxurious…

This hotel was fabulous with one exception. First the good: great design; sumptuous free breakfast; solicitous staff; great room including kitchenette; good wifi reception; tons of tv channels;  quiet; good price. But the design did not allow open windows except for one large…

column6: New, big, clean and great location
column7: This hotel appartment is really great. We stayed with the three of us and the room was plenty big. Also shower and kitchen is really nice. Personell is great, girls at from desk as well as breakfast gentlemen. Breakfast is great, everything you can think of and even 15 minutes…

The More is yet a relatively successfull result of refurbishing an industry building to boutigue hotel. The rooms are large and clean. The breakfast is good. The sevice at the check-in was friendly. We stayed here during Summer, where staff was cut down to bare minimum. After…

Great newly renovated hotel built in an old workshop for railway locomotives. Very nice atmosphere. Simple, but good breakfast. Well working WiFi. You will have to pay for parking. Small gym and spa in the basement. Their evening restaurant is also good.

We stayed for one night and found the hotel and the room nice and practical. The breakfast consisted of a good variety of breads, cereals, cheese, meet, egg and juices and was perfect. Our room, on level 3,  had adjustable roof windows to regulate intake of fresh air. As it…

column6: Fantastic hotel in modern style renovated OLd industrial building
column7: Very nicely renovated hotel with beautiful details of The OLd factory.  Rooms are more than ok and fantastic restaurant with exellent menu. International Oriented Staff is very friendly. Located in area with hardly any noise so sleeping is no problem.

The More Hotel ist ein sehr gutes, zu empfehlendes Hotel in Lund. Die Zimmer sind sehr groß , sauber und geschmackvoll auf das ehemalige Bahnhofsgebäude abgestimmt. Das Frühstück ausreichend und für jeden Geschmack ansprechend. In den Zimmern besteht auch die Möglichkeit sich…

Min arbetsgivare i Lund använder detta hotell för sina övernattningar vilket jag inte har något emot. Jag upplever bra service, relativt stora och rena rum och intressant design både på fasaden och i loungen. Det är ett alldeles perfekt "lagom"-hotell.

Elegant och smakfull inredning med stora och rymliga rum. Genomgående hög kvalitet med sköna sängar och fräscht badrum. Bra beläget, nära motorvägen men samtidigt gångavstånd till centrum. Trevlig och vällagad frukostbuffé som serverades i en ljus och smakfull matsal.

På gjennomreise og ankom etter midnatt. Resepsjonen var stengt. Hadde mottatt kode på sms for å låse oss inn. Fungerte knirkefritt. Stort rom med plass til hele familien på 5. Nytt og rent. God frokost. God pris. Anbefales til de fleste overnattingsformål.

A very nice hotel in Lund (more like a rented apartment with a  very functional kitchen). Very clean, very quiet, very comfortable. The hotel has a very nice sauna and a small gym (used both). The room had a fireplace and a very cool skylight (which closed automatically when it…

column6: Fräscht, modernt, rymligt hotell, en bit från "city"!
column7: Jag bodde på detta hotell med min familj i Juli. Rummen är mycket rymliga. Sängen är skön och det är mycket härlig känsla i rummet. Man får mycket för pengarna. Perfekt när man har familj. Finns diskmaskin, kylskåp, micro. Man kan också boka tvättmaskinerna under sin vistelse…

column6: Perfect hotel for a stay in beautiful Lund
column7: In the fall of 2012 we were looking for a hotel in the university town of Lund, where the first requirements were fitness area; sauna; and large rooms with pantry in a quiet area at the center of Lund. We fell over the More, which met our search criteria. That was the beginning…

Fint hotell.  Lett å finne frem. Parkering bestilles på forhånd. Vi fikk et stort rom med gode senger. Rent og ikke noe å klage på. Veldig god frokost og veldig  behagelig  vertinne. Supert relax avdeling med både sauna og boblebad. Gå avstand til Lund sentrum. Fint uteareal med…

I stayed in this hotel for a week while official visit to Lund. It is a a nice comfy hotel with helpful staff. The central area of Lund is at short walk from the hotel. They offer apartments so you can cook your own food.

Buon hotel nel centro di Lund vicino a tutto, camere molto spaziose da considerare più come mini appartamenti che normali camere, munite di tutto , TV , lavastoviglie , micro onde, piastre cottura , servizio completo piatti bicchieri pentole ect ect. Anche il bagno spazioso e…

We were four persons staying in Superior Studio. The room was spaceous, well equiped and clean. The hotel had a nice gym with adjoining room with sauna and jacuzzi. An excellent breakfat buffet was served every day. The staff was nice and attentive, but the front desk had…

Quiet location. Friendly, helpful staff, clean and modern, gym, Sauna and jacuzzi. Recently renovated historical building. Restaurant closed but plenty of options nearby. Ten minutes from (beautiful) medieval City Centre. A town worth visiting!

My wife and I stayed here for a couple of nights. The room was spacious, and well equipped, though the kitchenette was not so well equipped that cooking would be easy. The bed comfortable, and there were enough hangers. As it is a apartment hotel, they do not routinely do daily…

We booked 4 rooms at this hotel to attend my daughter's wedding in Lund. I researched local hotels and selected this hotel initially, then told other family members, who came from 3 countries (we came from Denver CO). We were not disappointed. The front desk lady was very…

column6: Lovely hotel, wonderful staff and great breakfasts
column7: We stayed 9 nights at the More Hotel for a family reunion. After a glitch at the start where the booking hadn't gone through correctly, we were upgraded for the duration of our stay. The rooms were great - plenty space, nice facilities for if we wanted to prepare food ourselves.…

column6: flotte, flotte værelser i en smuk og interessant bygning
column7: Hvis man skal overnatte i Lund er dette stedet, også selvom det ligger lidt uden for centrum. Vores værelse var stort med både sofagruppe, spisebord og lille køkken, og det var virkelig smagfuldt og godt indrettet. Selve hotelbygningen er utrolig flot istandsat og har masser af…

Had a great time here. The only downside we had to this place is where it is situated. You can walk into the town centre in 10 minutes but the sttation is exactly the other side of the town so it's a fair walk or relatively expensive journey here. Otherwise all is good. Large…

Bra arrangemang vid sen incheckning, funkade precis som planerat. Stort rum med fräscht duschrum och sköna sängar! Frukost av god kvalitet i läckert rum, goda våfflor. Nära till det mesta som finns att göra på stan.

Excelente hotel, limpo, e diferente, as atendestes não ficam 24h na recepção se voce chegar la apôs as 7h voce entra no hotel e no seu quarto apenas com uma senha. Cafe da manha bom, quartos grandes e confortáveis.

Das The More Hotel bietet ein tolles Preis-Leistungsverhältnisse. Die Zimmer sind enorm gross, eigentliche Appartements mit eigener kleiner Küche. Ideal für einen längeren Aufenthalt. Das Frühstück bestens. Wichtig wer nach 20.00 sollte dies anmelden. Denn ab da ist die…

Dejligt hyggeligt lille hotel. Perfekt til kærestepar eller ægtepar. Morgenmaden var super lækker, dejlig buffet. Venlige og serviceminded personale. Tæt på centrum, dejlig lille by. Kan varmt anbefales! Kan ikke sige noget dårligt om dette hotel. Prisen er rimelig. Dejligt…

En väldigt bra och fräscht hotel mitt i smeten, nära till allt som man skulle vilja ha och besöka. Modernt men endå personligt, väldigt snygg byggnand och riktig trevlig personal som var väldigt arbetsvilliga.

Mycket trevligt bemötande när vi anlände och positivt överraskade att det var så fräscht hotell. Stort trevligt rum (studio) med det mesta, som kylskåp, spis, mikro, bestick, kastruller, glas osv. och väldigt sköna sängar, men vart har nattduksborden tagit vägen? Frukosten var…

column6: Very nice venue and lovely breakfast!
column7: Really enjoyed my stay - the suite was very spacious and the venue was really nice. Good spa with sauna, jacuzzi and some fitness apparel. Good breakfast with fresh made waffles and oat meal, don't miss these. Good bed with nice sheets. No minibar in my room which would have…

We arrived in Lund after a long flight from Denver. The front desk was excellent in getting us settled, the room was wonderful and the breakfast was perfect for our first meal. The entire experience was great and the people are just the best. Highly reccomend if you get to Lund.

En gammel togremisse bygget om til moderne hotelkompleks. Fantastisk ide. Her er alt hvad man kunne ønske sig, jacuzzi, sauna, fitness og helt igennem lækker morgenbuffet. Vil klart anbefale til andre. Det eneste der generede vores øjne var at stort set alt var skævt. Ikke fordi…

Stunning place and the staff are exceptional  I travel to Lund regularly and this hotel just does everything I want and need.  Great rooms modern and big and the breakfast is extremely well presented and run.  The staff are key in this hotel they just are very easy open and…

The More hotel is a lovely property about a 20 minute walk from the train station. The staff is exceptional and the rooms have character. The only big problem I had with the place was the jacuzzi was too cold (36°C) which is a common problem in Europe.

column6: Fräscht och toppenbekvämt till rimligt pris
column7: Toppenfräscht hotell på gångavstånd till centrum. Vi bodde 3 personer i en en studio som var mycket rymlig, på rummet fanns det mesta man skulle kunna behöva, strykjärn, porslin, fullt utrustat pentry, matplats… Frukosten var kanon och personalen trevlig och hjälpsam. Fanns även…

Large and comfortable room and nice looking hotel, inside and outside. Relax downstairs which was very nice. Very good breakfast with everything you need.  The room was a little hot as the window you can open is too small and there is no aircondition. However, when we stayed…

Hebben een gratis upgrade gehad naar de suite. Schitterend. Alles klopte vanaf binnenkomst tot vertrek een dag later. Zou helemaal niets negatiefs kunnen bedenken. Prachtige badkamer en kamers. Lekker ontbijt en vriendelijk en behulpzaam personeel.

Detta är årets överraskning. Fräscht, nästan lite fashion hotell, i gamla lokhallar. Priset för ett dubbelrum var 800 kronor. Stora rejäla rum, rent o snyggt. Mycket serviceinriktad personal. Sköna sängar. Parkering på gårdsplan. På promenadavstånd från centrum. Underbar frukost…

This ultra modern hotel is located in an old brick building, former a railway car maintenance work shop. It's about two years old. Each room is a miniture single room flat with a kitchenette to enable you to prepare your own food. There is also a dish washer. These amenities…

Bra läge nära stan, lite längre från tåg. Mycket fräscht, snyggt och modernt, men vi saknade A/C. Varmt i rummen, trots ljummen svensk sommar. Bra frukost men inte överdrivet. Trevlig relax- och gym. Serviceinriktad och trevlig personal.
column8: Response from TheMoreHotel, Receptionschef at The More Hotel LundResponded Jul 2, 2014
column10: Hej Michael R, Tack för ditt omdöme. Kul att höra att du tyckte om hotellet och dess läge.  Vi tittar just nu på en ventilationslösning då våra rum tenderar att bli väldigt varma under sommarmånaderna. Vi har bords- eller golvfläktar på samtliga rum för att göra det lite svalare. Önskar dig välkommen åter!  Med Vänliga Hälsningar Caroline Johannesson Receptionschef

column7: The more hotel combines great design with a quiet location (that is still only 10 minutes walking distance from downtown Lund), spacious rooms and great breakfast. Perfect place for researchers visiting Lund and its university.
column8: Response from TheMoreHotel, Receptionschef at The More Hotel LundResponded Jul 2, 2014
column10: Dear Jelle L, Thank you for your kind review. I´m glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at The More Hotel Lund and wish you welcome back.  Yours Sincerely Caroline Johannesson Front Desk Manager

column6: Clean and fresh place in Lund
column7: The More hotel in Lund is a great hotel offering good value for your money. Room standard and cleanliness of rooms and other facilities is very good. Quite location and nice beds gives you a good night’s sleep. Breakfast meets all your expectations.
column8: Response from TheMoreHotel, Receptionschef at The More Hotel LundResponded Jun 8, 2014
column10: Dear Wilhelm D, Thank you so much for your kind review. I´m glad to hear that we achieved your expectations in terms of price, rooms, cleanness, location, and breakfast. You are most welcome back!  Yours Sincerely Caroline Johannesson Front Desk Manager

column6: Probably the best hotel I have visited
column7: Excellent modern decoration, spacious rum having TV, sofa, fridge, stove, micro and high speed internet,together with a very nice bathroom made the hotel a very enjoyable experience. A couple of things would however elavate the experience: 1) Safe box for valubales 2) 24-7…
column8: Response from TheMoreHotel, Receptionschef at The More Hotel LundResponded Jun 8, 2014
column10: Dear Ali n, Thank you for your kind review. Good to hear that you liked our design and concept with spacious rooms with all you can need, almost like home. We have chosen not to put safety boxes in the rooms since we have experienced that not very many guests uses them. Our front desk is manned during the busiest hours and after that we have on call service. This is a part of our concept and so is the cleaning. You are always able to add extra cleaning if you prefer daily cleaning. There are two pillows in each bed so if one is too soft you can put one on top of the other. Yours Sincerely Caroline Johannesson Front Desk Manager

column7: We stayed here last weekend for a wedding and this hotel did not disappoint in terms of complimenting the whole experience. Such friendly professional staff ... Particularly the breakfast staff... Delicious breakfast so much and all you can eat! Would definitely return! A******
column8: Response from TheMoreHotel, Receptionschef at The More Hotel LundResponded Jun 8, 2014
column10: Dear Kristy13, Thank you so much for your kind review and I hope the wedding was great. I´m glad to hear that the staff took good care of you during your stay with us and that you found a lot to eat for breakfast. You´re all most welcome back to The More Hotel Lund.  Yours Sincerely  Caroline Johannesson Front Desk Manager

column7: Stayed in plenty of the hotels around Lund and this one is by far the best. 10-15 minute walk into town but worth it the ambience and room quality is supberb. Unique environement very individaul and pleasant. Staff are magnificent extremely helpful and friendly.
column8: Response from TheMoreHotel, Receptionschef at The More Hotel LundResponded Jun 1, 2014
column10: Dear Graeme B, Thank you very much for your review. I´m proud to hear that you think The More Hotel is the best one in Lund and that the staff took good care of you. You´re most welcome back.  Yours Sincerely  Caroline Johannesson Front Desk Manager

column7: Very nice, cosy and homely. Every room has a small kitchenette which is very convenient especially in the winter cold. It would however be even better if they cleaned the rooms more often. My room was not cleaned even once during my 6 day stay
column8: Response from TheMoreHotel, Receptionschef at The More Hotel LundResponded Apr 23, 2014
column10: Dear Hope Nairobi,  Thank You so much for your kind review and I am glad that you felt at home with us. If you stay with us for 6 nights the room should be weekly cleaned once and for some reason we missed it.  I am very sorry for the inconvenience caused by this.  I hope to see you soon again.   Yours Sincerely  Caroline Johannesson Front Desk Manager

column7: Bodde i Studio standard och var mycket nöjda. Gott om plats och fräscht. Konceptet passade oss. Trevligt bemötande av personal både i receptionen och vid frukost. Vi blev lite bortskämda med nygräddade pannkakor.  Vi hittade detta boende till ett lågt pris, vilket givetvis…

Lovely new and modern hotel just five minutes walk to centre of Lund. The room was modern and clean had apartment facilities for self catering which were of a high standard. Bathroom clean and modern and room large with lounge. The only think that stopped it been a top hotel was…

column6: Clean, cosy and modern hotel with an old touch to it
column7: I stayed in the hotel for 5 nights and truly enjoyed my stay. The hotel is very nicely remodeled from old engine sheds. It has a modern feel to it, yet you can also feel the history. The rooms and corridors are relly clean. The area around the hotel is quiet. I greatly enjoyed…

column6: Beautiful hotel but it comes with a warning...
column7: Not sure how to rate this hotel. It´s great in many ways, nice, spacious, modern, the staff is wonderful, location great etc etc. But we stayed for one night and had to check out earlier than planned because we could not stand the heat! I think the room was at least 25 degrees…

The More in Lund is one of those places where the architect should have (and maybe did) win an award. Very new. Nicely laid-out. Not far from the train station and downtown with many interesting ways of walking to and fro -- through the park, through the scenic city…

Clean, smart and spacious with a fully functional kitchen in most rooms (I think) and a lovely breakfast buffet, walking distance to charming Lund city centre. No bath tub in my room (or any, I think). We saw a wheelchair basketball team as well as several families with young…

We spent a night at The More Hotel for our ten year wedding anniversary. We had the suite which was gorgeous with a fireplace in the bed room, jacuzzi and skylight. The renovation of the hotel is true to the origins of the building but with modern twists. The service was…

Great stay in a Studio Suite with a fireplace in the bedroom! Helpful and Smiling Staff, excellent breakfast! And In the hotel there is now a new restaurant, pretty expensive but offering modern and very original fusion food! Overall a perfect experience!

Good - very spacious and clean rooms - nice 'renovated farm building' look and feel - small but more then sufficient breakfast. Including hot food, which is not always the case in this size of hotel - excellent beds  Minor - no restaurant and 5min walk outside Lund city center…

What a find. Arrived after the reception staff had gone home but was not an issue as they had a operator-controlled door and a really cool digital key-safe. Rooms were large and well kitted out. Nice hotel....recommended

- accueil souriant - propreté générale excellente ! - chambre très vaste, bien insonorisée, moderne et design avec tout le confort souhaité (TV, frigo, ...). - salle-de-bain dans la chambre, excessivement propre, moderne et fonctionnelle.  - kitchenette  équipée, d'une propreté…

I've been in this hotel for a week.  Pozitive: Very large rooms with kitchens in it. Nicely build hotel. Nice recreational room with Jacuzzi, Sauna and fitness elements. Nice location. Negative: No reception after 8 pm until early morning.

Sehr gutes Business Hotel, welches stark durch Angestellte der gegenüberliegenden Firma Tetra Pak frequentiert wird. Die Zimmer sind gut und sauber und das Personal ist sehr hilfsbereit. Das Frühstück ist ausreichend zur Verfügung und es wird regelmäßig aufgefüllt. Der…

column7: Absolutely clean and quite rooms. The breakfast was great and the staff was very welcoming. I stayed for three nights, and it was an absolutely trouble free stay at this hotel.The hotel had a gym and a sauna but I did not use it, and hence can not comment.

column7: Vi unnade oss en helg i Lund! Fina ytor med tilltalande inredningsdetaljer! Är man en familj kan man med fördel boka anslutande rum som leverera samma kvalitet! Ett stort plus för den trevliga personalen!

Vi ber så mycket om ursäkt att ni fått uppleva detta. Frukostutbudet uppdateras kontinuerligt och jag hoppas verkligen att vi ändå får chansen att välkomna er vid nästa besök i Lund. Då hoppas vi att kunna överträffa era förväntningar och ge er en oförglömlig vistelse.  Med vänliga hälsningar Emilia Hallström Marketing Coordinator

column7: Trevliga rum ljuda och tilltalande med bra tillgänglighet. Har varit härvid flera tillfällen, bra förbindelser till Malmö. Trevlig personal, maten är ok inte över sig men bra lunchmat, fikorna är ok och rakt utanför dörren.

column6: Great hotel.Perfect combination between business and familiar

column7: I’ve spent a lots of days in this hotel. The hotel is in a quiet area. The rooms are tidy and clean. The staff is faster and professional. The breakfast is quite good. In general is a good hotel to spend days for work.

column7: Vi har bott här ett par gånger. Bra parkering även för större fordon. Precis vid motorvägen. Dock hittar typ ingen GPS till adressen.. Bra in/utcheckning o även övrig service kopplat till bokningen. Bra frukost o helt ok rum (superior) även om jag saknar tex vinglas o skohorn…
column8: Response from annablomqvist, General Manager at Radisson Blu Hotel LundResponded Oct 12, 2018
column10: Bästa Malin, tack för att du tagit dig tid att recensera vårt hotell. Vi tycker det är jättebra att få reda på vad gästerna tycker, för då har vi ju faktiskt möjligheten att förbättra oss. Kul att du är överlag är nöjd med oss och att ni bott hos oss flera gånger. Men det var ju tråkigt att du inte var nöjd med restaurangen. Vi får vanligtvis mycket beröm för vår restaurang och därför reagerar jag över just detta. Om ni besöker oss igen får ni gärna fråga efter mig, jag hade tyckt det var jättekul att berätta mer för er om vår restaurang och kanske få bjuda på en bit mat.   Varma hälsningar Anna Blomqvist General Manager Park Inn by Radisson Lund

column7: Vi følte os meget velkomne på hotellet. Værelset var meget stilrent og moderne med god smag. Alt var meget rent.  Om aftenen spiste vi i den lille restaurant Aperitivo, hvor vi bestilte plankesteg og kylling. Meget velsmagende og tilpas portion. Stemningen var hyggelig og…

column7: Very bad service from the receptionist. They gave you wrong information then other worst receptionist ever I have ever met, she said it is not there mistakes because her colleague is in internship and doesn’t know about their procedures!!!!!
column8: Response from annablomqvist, General Manager at Radisson Blu Hotel LundResponded Sep 9, 2018
column10: Dear Muath,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are so sad you are not happy with the service at our reception. We usually hear that we are well-known for our service minded staff. It seems like you've met our trainee Johanna, who just started with us. Johanna is a young girl, 16- years old, who goes to high school. She has the goal of getting a job at a hotel and is really eager to get out and practice and learn how it really works in a hotel reception. As you can understand, Johanna is a beginner, as we have all been, but I can assure you that she is doing her absolute best every day to meet our guests' demands for service. And we teach her as much as we can. I apologize if you think you received poor service from our trainee and I really hope there was nothing serious that happened to you. Hope that we will have the chance to make you feel welcome, please feel free to contact me if you visit us again.   Best regards,  Anna Blomqvist  General Manager Park Inn by Radisson Lund
