column7: Hotellet är ett lågpris men är verkligen som ett vanligt hotell. Personalen är verkligen serviceinriktad och motiverad. Rummet var av hög standard rakt igenom och städningen var helt perfekt. Rekommenderar detta hotell till mina vänner.

Jag hade gjort fel i beställningen - fel månad! Receptionisten hjälpte mig när jag var på väg att ge upp. Trots att det vällde in folk hela tiden hade hon tid för mig. Jättetack för det!! Hotellet ligger på promenadavstånd (150 m) till hamburgerrestaurang och har även cyklar att…

+Lättillgängligt. Bra standard och mycket trevlig personal. +Bra riklig frukost. +Rent och välstädat både inne och utanför. +Mycket bra parkering både för personbilar och större fordon. - Lite trånga rum. - Smala sängar.

The rooms are far too small and not declared on the homepage.  Don't eat dinner there, I would rather go to McDonalds or Burger King. Breakfast is satisfying, rooms are clean.  One night is enough......

The Good Morning Lund hotel was better than we expected. Driving up and seeing the exterior as twilight was upon us made the hotel appear a little sketchy. However, we were pleasantly surprised with the interior in the lobby, lounge/cafe/breakfast/bar, and rooms. The staff…

column6: Pænt hotel, men alt for lille værelse
column7: God beliggenhed med gratis parkering og indkøbsmuligheder. Sød, flink og hjælpsom personale. Rent og pænt. God morgenbuffet. Desværre var vores værelse ret småt, uden en stol at sidde på, ikke ret meget gulvplads omkring sengen. Kufferterne stod altid i vejen. Eneste…

Ett jättebra hotell i närheten av E6 för vidare färd norr över mot Göteborg.Rent och snyggt, jättebra sängar och en trevlig personal.Mycket god mat i restaurangen till ett rimligt pris.Frukosten var helt perfekt.Vad mer kan man begära.Good Morning hotell ser tråkiga ut.liknar…

column6: Un halte  aisée sur un long trajet
column7: Hôtel simple mais bien tenu en zone commerciale proche autoroute.  Chambres exigues mais pour un court arrêt, pas de problème ,petit déjeuner correct  Éloigné du centre de Lund pour visite, la ville mérite une promenade.

Wir haben eine Nacht hier verbracht und waren zufrieden. Das Zimmer war zwar recht klein, jedoch hatte es alles, was es braucht und schließlich waren wir nur zum Schlafen hier, da braucht man keinen Ballsaal :)  Das Personal war super freundlich und zuvorkommend. Wir haben am…

column6: Depends on your purpose for the trip
column7: Rooms were clean and they had all services needed. However, the location is not very easy. It is 3km away from downtown in the middle of a highway. Buses after 9pm do not arrive that far and you have to walk. What I really dislike was the attitude of the reception. They did not…

The room we had was TINY. My husband needed to be able to sit, but there was NO chair and there would only have been room for one without armrests. As it was, we tried to use his wheelchair so that he could sit down in some comfort, but that meant blocking access to the bathroom…

- Rummen var rätt trånga. Bodde bara där en natt men skulle inte rekommendera en längre vistelse med tanke på rummen storlek, om man inte reser väldigt lätt.  +  Positivt med gratis parkering & att all äta i personalen var supertrevliga :-)

Du skal være klar over at hotellet er knap 4 km.uden for byen og det er mest praktisk at have en bil. Hvis du overnatter en varm sommerdag er der også meget varmt på værelserne og det er et lille rum i hvertfald det vi havde, men når man tænker hvad prisen er er det okay. Kunne…

column6: getting Looong in the teeth by now..
column7: Very Basic. If you Have to crash en-route I guess it's ok,but not much more. Prices are up with nothing new to show for it. "Eateria" VERY basic,same meny as before the vessel Vasa sank! Free coffee is the one slight plus I can give here.

really friendly staff that makes you feel welcome. good food, good breakfast and a nice (a bit small) clean room. close to major roads its a perfect stop on our trip from sweden back to denmark. would book again.

column6: My experience with a small hotel in Lund
column7: Hotel location is a concern but it's service is over my expectation.  Taxi service in town is a big concern - check the price before getting into the car.  I've a bad experience n the first day of my visit - was charged almost 4 times more.

Bra service och nära till Nova Lund! Enda saken som störde mig att när vi skulle checka ut så fick vi samtal av receptionisten för att lämna rummet. Kollade direkt på kl så var det 12.02. De kan åtminstone vänta 10 minuter bara för att vara mer vänliga. Överhuvudtaget så var dem…

Pulizia, staff giovane e cordiale ottima posizione p. L'hotel si trova davanti al centro commerciale Nova e la fermata dell'autobus è a pochi passi. Colazione ottima, la camera non era grandissima ma era in ottime condizioni.

Carino, pulitissimo, staff molto gentile e disponibile La camera non era grandissima ma era in ottime condizioni, parcheggio auto gratuto, zona perfetta: l'hotel si affaccia sul centro commerciale Nova e la fermata dell'autobus per il centro ê a pochi metri. Zona tranquillissima.

This is clearly a budget - but hygienic -hotel, the people are very helpful. The food at dinner was very basic and not 'Freshly cooked' in my opinion. But if you don't wanh to spend much money, only look for a place to sleep and don't care about the location it's a good…

Vi valde Good Morning Hotel Lund för det låga priset och närheten till Lunds universitetssjukhus. Anledningen till vår vistelse var svärfaderns livshotande operation, och att vi då skulle få trivas så bra på hotellet var en klart oväntad bonus! Dubbelrummet är litet (men precis…

Ett fint och prisvärt hotell med små men trevliga rum och trevlig personal. Enda invändningen var frukosten som var mindre bra. Det var ständigt tomma fat och skålar och ganska dålig varm mat. När grejerna fanns var det bra utom det varma och avsaknad av grovt bröd.

This is a budget hotel, the cheapest in the Lund area, so I had no right to expect anything, but my stay was very pleasant, with a wonderful breakfast buffet and comfy - if small - room. It is slightly out of the way, hidden behind a Shell garage on the outskirts of Lund at the…

nothing negative on the hotel, very nice. Only thing the buses in sweden cost a lot and taxis even more, you need 2,20 euros for a one way ticket to the center and 3,65 if it's at night (after 17:00).

Meget venligt personale. Gode små værelser, mangler bare muligheden for at have vindue åben. Middag og morgenmad meget tilfredsstillende. Kan anbefales til overnatning, ikke til et ophold, måske til unge mennesker. Der er lidt langt ind til centrum.

Vil ikke overnatte der igen. Man kan ikke gå rundt om sengen. Efter morgenmaden var vi nød til at rydde op efter os lige som man gør på burgerbar. Man kan tydligt høre de andre gæster i de andre værelser.

Bra frukost, men rummen är mycket små. Behövs bättre information från väg till hotell. Bra parkering. Inget kylskåp på rummet. Bättre belysning från gata till hotell behövs. Mycket god frukost. Tyst och välstädat. Bra personal, plus att reception alltid är bemannad.

Nice friendly hotel. Nice renovated rooms, good breakfast, big parkingspace at the hotel and for all very friendly staff members. I recommend this hotel for businesstrips and holliday. It is not in a citycentre but close to highway and Malmö.

This hotel is a good option. Clean room, comfortable bed, quiet place, many options for breakfast and friendly staff. The only bad thing I found is the location, it is on the edge of the town and it is obligatory to take the bus.

Dålig service och förståelse för min arbete. man var tvungen att stå och diskutera mitt ärende medan jag visste att de väntade på mig därhemma så fort som möjligt. Hade sett fram mot härliga dagar i Lund men arbete tvingade mig att åka hem. Bättre förståelse och större…

column6: Kanon bra pris och hotell i Lund
column7: Jätte trevligt hotell, nytt och fräscht med  jätte bra rum och en underbar säng, mycket mycket bra frukost helt klart den bästa på länge. Lätt att hitta och bra parkering, man kunde även äta kvällsmat där

Närhet till shopping, skola, centrum höjer betyget betydligt. NOVA köpcentrum bara någon minuts promenad från hotellet. Frukosten var ok, hade önskat lite "mer" pålägg, annars var det en bra och stabil frukostbuffé.

Mycket prisvärt med bra frukost och trevlig personal. Inga problem att få middag kl. 9 på kvällen. Ligger centralt vid infarten till Lund. Rekommenderar detta hotell speciellt till dem som reser med husdjur!

column6: Sleep in the car, you will have a better nights sleep.
column7: Stayed here with work for a few days.  The bar is a desk and the choice of food is limited to say the least. Prices are more central Malmo than a budget hotel.   Rooms are very small, unless you are lucky and get one of the disabled rooms as I did. Although the radiator is warm…

column6: Standard European room, but pet friendly!
column7: This hotel provided a decent basic accommodation with the added benefit for us that it allowed pets.   The bed was a decent size and comfortable, but the room was quite small.  Unfortunately for us, we had a few suitcases, which squeezed us a bit.  The wifi was free and easy to…

The hotel was modern, clean and comfortable, although the rooms were small. It was located slightly towards the outskirts of the city, however, not a problem to where we needed to be.   Service at the hotel was good and friendly and breakfast in the hotel was of a very good…

Jeg bestilte et værelse på "Good Morning Lund", men hotellet hed faktisk "Ibis styles Lund". Ikke umuligt at finde, men dog meget forvirrende. Der var, hvad der skulle være i værelset, og absolut ikke mere end det. Værelset var så lille, at man skulle gå ud på gangen, bare for…

Due to it's location on the outskirts of this charming historic university town you will definitely require a car or bus to access the sights. Clean,modern,comfortable and offering a standard continental breakfast. The on site car parking is free but unsecured. Found all the…

This  Ibis styles hotel is in a area not far out of Malmo Sweden a lot cheaper than the ones in Copenhagen if traveling to Sweden. The staff very very helpful and good command of english. The room was very small and not much space, food was OK; Wifi connection very good in room …

Een slaapplek zonder inspiratie. Het oogt het meest naar een stapel gekoppelde containers. Openbare ruimtes wel aardig ingericht. Zeer kleine kamers. Dit hotel wordt gebruikt voor monteurs ed welke op doorreis of op klus zijn.

Comparing with other hotels from Ibis, Lund is actually the best i saw. Working people very nice, all the time caring for the customer, relax, easy contact...not like in some hotels where you see only commercial smiling people...Lund is BRA.

column6: Ugly building, friendly service, cute rabbits
column7: I'm not going to lie: Form the outside Ibis Styles Lund is one of the ugliest buildings in the whole Scandinavia. It looks like a small castle made out of mint colored corrected iron. Inside the situation was better: reception and the dining area could have featured in the Ikea…

Et billigt sove sted med gode madrasser. Værelserne er små, men rene og fine.  det er en fin morgenmads buffet, med god opfyldning.  ligger fin i forhold til turen længere op i Sverige, eller en weekend tur fra Danmark

column6: Better for a stop-over than for visiting Lund
column7: This is an OK hotel situated close to the major road network of southern Sweden both leading south (to Malmø and Denmark) and north/east (to Gothenburg and Stockholm). It is 4 km from the city center of Lund (a 45 min walk or you can take a public bus). The room (first and top…

Stannade en natt på genomresa. Rummet var mycket modernt och fräscht, men litet. Badrummet var stort, nästan som rummet... Frukosten var helt ok. Hotellet ligger ju i utkanten av Lund, så om du tänker gå ut i stan och åka taxi är det bättre att boka ett närmare city, för taxin…

column6: Good overall but a two bed room is a bit squeezed
column7: The price was good, the hotel clean and the breakfast good.  We were in a two bed room which was a bit cramped.   The staff was friendly and helpful.  We were visiting friends in Lund for the weekend.  Good value for money.

column6: A little out of the way but very helpful staff
column7: Just of the main road but traffic noise is not an issue with the windows closed. Very close to a Shell Petrol station for late night snacks, water, drinks etc and a large shopping mall with a Co Op and ISA supermarket about 800m away. A ideal one night stopover and very…

Grosse déception pour cet Ibis Style loin d'être à la hauteur des établissements de l'enseigne : les chambres sont bien trop petites pour deux personnes, vous pourrez à peine faire le tour du lit pour vous déplacer, seulement 7 chaînes de télévision proposées dont aucune en…

column6: Budget option with great service, clean rooms and comfortable beds
column7: Great value hotel in Lund. The rooms are small, but very clean and the beds are comfortable (but also on the small side). The nightly rate includes free wifi as well as breakfast which is simple but decent. The staff at the hotel is very nice. I had requested that we could check…

The hotel fits to Accor standards, everything is new and clean.  The building has a strange architecture, but is the standard of this Styles brand.  It has a very interesting cost and benefit ratio.   Restaurant is ok.   The location is very good to know Lund and Malmö, but must…

column6: Super service but very small rooms
column7: I am a regular user of the Ibis Budget brand which, generally, does exactly what it says on the box, providing clean, practical accommodation which is ideally suited to the traveller simply wanting a bed for the night. My perception of the Ibis Styles brand, on the basis of…

Hi,   hotel location is on the outer ring of the city, rooms are quite small, but cozy and functional.... amazing staff service, they manage to serve you at 04.15 AM a fresh Breakfast... no other hotel in 15 years global travelling managed that..... thumbs upppp!!!!

Arrived here after driving overnight from London without a booking, explained to the receptionist my situation and she booked me in straight away (10:30am), amazing !!  Very clean, good rooms, very quiet with no traffic outside. excellent thick duvets on the bed, great nights…

Что вид отеля, что месторасположение...ощущение, что работаешь на трассе. Ооочень маленькие номера. Тесные. Сам отель ( такое двухэтажное здание, оббитое сайдингом) маленький. Зато недалеко большой шоппинг-мол. Скажу так, на 2 дня одному в номере с маленькой сумкой нормально.…

Pas du tout aux standards de la marque Ibis Style... Chambres petites, à peine 11m2, une fois les valises posées c’est la gymnastique pour se déplacer. Uniquement des lits Twin (pas de lit double).Décoration vieillotte, la prestation est loin de ce que nous pouvons connaitre…

Hotel situe au milieu de nulle part! Accueil correct sans plus. Un surprise de taille: les chambres sont exiguës:11m2. Pour 2 c'est plus que limité. On répte  pour aller sur le lit! Salle d.eau correcte

i have stayed in the Ibis lund a couple of times when working in  Malmo + points near the main highway clean quiet - points  not cheap typical ibis level hotel = 2 * a little tucked away to not too easy to locate out of the city center so nothing to see

I utkanten av Lund intill ett större affärscentrum finns hotellet ibis-styles.  Utbudet i lund var litet, men IBIS erbjöd detta rum för natten. Rummet var i minsta laget  - knappt plats för två bäddar, men toaletten med dusch rymlig och fräsch. Vårt rum låg tyvärr intill en…

column6: Pas au niveau d'un Ibis Styles...
column7: Pas du tout aux standards de la marque... Chambres exiguës, décoration datée, PdJ (--), la prestation est loin de ce que nous pouvons connaitre dans d'autres Ibis Styles ! Je ne recommande pas cet hôtrel...

We stayed at this hotel a weekend in september but will not come back again. First the hotel was not easy to find, the signs were very small and it is situated in an area so that you can not see it until you are already there.  Several members of the staff was really unfriendly,…

column6: Bra läge men se upp med bokningssystemet
column7: Hotellet  funkar perfekt för övernattande bilister. Lätt att hitta. Gratis parkering och nära stort köpcentrum. Men boka övernattning på www.ibis.com eller någon annan hotellbokningssite. Hotellets egna webb för internetbokning (www.ibis-lund.com) kan bli dyr. Bokningsalmanackan…

column6: Ok for a night's sleep ... But only just
column7: We booked this hotel for a night on our way from Berlin to Stockholm.   The rooms are tiny but the bathroom is ok in size. Beds are comfortable. The walls are a bit thin as we could hear our neighbors talking throughout the night.   There are virtually hundreds of shops nearby…

L'hôtel est très bien pour une étape en Scandinavie. Etant à l'écart de la ville, il est très calme. De plus, il est situé à la proximité de la E6. Le personnel est sympathique et les repas sont bien préparés.

We had to stay one night in Lund on our way to Ruegen Island. We searched for the cheapest alternative and this time it was Ibis Styles. We didn´t expect a lot but we were positively surprised. The hotel was quite easy to reach, room and bathroom were good and food was like home…

Это стандартный сетевой отель с небольшими, но удобными и уютными номерами, вкусным завтраком, который сервируется неизменно за отдельную плату и, на самом деле, благодаря масштабам самого Лунда, даже в пешей доступности от центра. Внешние шумы практически отсутствуют, соседи у…

Auf unserer Reise nach Mittelschweden haben wir hier eine Nacht verbracht. Die Doppelzimmer sind viel zu klein und eng und die Betten viel zu schmal. Ich habe mir ständig beim schlafen das Bein an der Heizung gestoßen, dass Bett stand direkt daran. Für eine Nacht geht das aber…

We booked this hotel room for a quick nap whilst being en-route to Stockholm and will consider to do so again. The hotel is well positioned from the E6 Highway, is located in an industrial zone, and is basically a so-called container hotel, raised by interconnected 'containers'.…

Friendly and helpfull staff. The room felt small for a family with one child, small space between bed and walls, maybe it was just my room. (Doubleroom). The hotell is easy to access either from E6/E20 or E22.  All was clean and nice. You have a shoppingcenter in walking…

Hôtel sympa,propre et calme.Personnel très accueillant.Facilité d'accès avec restauration aux alentours. Point négatif: les chaînes télévisées ne sont que suédoises seule une est en anglais! Petit déjeuner copieux avec spécialités suédoises.

column6: man får vad man betalar för
column7: som det brukar sägas får man vad man betalar för. stämmer för ibis i lund iaf. sov gott, ok frukost och rena rum. kanske kunde det varit lite roligare inredning och så. bra hotell för den som bara ska övernatta och kommer med bil till lund - mindre bra om man är ute efter en…

We spent the night of the 27 June 2014 at the ibis Styles Lund, from arrival to our check out it was the most painless ever encountered during any hotel stay. Our room was on the ground floor a short walk from the reception and restaurant .. no noise whatsoever.   The staff was…

Det mindste værelse jeg har boet i, ingen strygejern og hårtørre, men alt var rent og pænt. Svært at finde, ligge uden for Lund centrum, er nok et sted hvor folk kommer for én nat. Personalet var søde

Even though this hotel looks like an office block from the outside, it's much nicer from the inside. Dinner list is very limited but it's okay when considered that there's not a lot of staff available. Breakfast was better than expected though. Rooms are okay, very small but…

Wery nice hotel, located only 20km from Downtown Malmø, Sweden. Small, nice, clean and well decorated rooms some with acces for wheelchairs, nice resturant/relax area also outdoor tabels too, good breakfest not big but okay, but Coffee can be better... free wifi

on the entrance roads to beautiful Lund city. On the plus side. Newly constructed. Great Swedish building quality. Internet. Breakfast. Dinner. Parking. Petrol Station. Easy access to roads to Lund, Malmö and Stockholm. Walking distance to supermarket and bus to town. The not so…

This hotel is a bit out of town but looks clean and new. The breakfast was good and so was the bed. If you can live with the distance from downtown (also not much to do around the hotel itself), this is a good choice.

With a GPS it is easy to find, on the outskirts of Lund, close to Malmö.  Nice and helpful staff in the reception.  Small restauration available, good parking facilities.  The rooms are small, very small. To the point that there is not enough floorspace to open a suitcase…

Stayed 4 nights whilst we explored the lovely area around Lund and Malmø.  The staff were excellent and very friendly, the rooms were clean and there was ample parking.  However the rooms were tiny and cramped for 2 people. Our bathroom was clean but always had an unpleasant…

positv: - freundliches Personal - Sauberkeit der Zimmer negativ: - Zimmer sind extrem klein (ohne Bad kleiner als 10 m²) - Es gibt keinen Stuhl oder gar Sessel (kein Platz), nur einen niedrigen Hocker. Der ist so niedrig, dass man als großer Mensch nicht vernünftig darauf sitzen…

När vi anlände på fredagen hade hela hotellet en doft av avlopp! Det arbetades med verktyg på lördagsmorgonen i något rum! På söndagsmorgonen 0530 hade någon uppvaktning med allsång och hurrop mm i ca 45 min. Romen är för små till det priset vi betalar på weekend, motsvarande…

Nice hotel overall. Good value for money (although a bit too far from the city centre with no regular public transportation after 21pm). Although I was surprised at good selection at breakfast and great bedding :-)

avrei voluto mettere nella media perchè le stanze sono davvero piccole ma onestamente molto ben pulite. ma il punto in più lo fa meritare la gentilezza del personale che quando si viaggia con due bambini piccoli fa davvero la differenza.

Dieses Hotel liegt im Aussenbezirk von Lund, zwischen E6 und E 22 ,leicht von beiden Schnellstrassen zu erreichen. Es ist im typischen Ibis-Stil gebaut, kleine Zimmer aber verhältnismässig grosses Bad. Das Frühstück ist reichhaltig, das Personal freundlich und hilfsbereit.

stile semplice.. colazione con buffet con molti cereali.. le camere sono un po piccole ma accoglienti... la televisione in camera purtroppo offre solo sei canali e nel ristorante o zona colazione si mangiano solo panini...

Innanzitutto bisogna arrivarci in auto, e non è nemmeno tanto facile: fare attenzione ad un piccola insegna che vi indirizza sul retro di una stazione di servizio, dalla quale parte la stradina che porta all'Ibis. Accoglienza ottima, hall piccola, stanza pulita ma piccolissima,…

Einfaches, aber zweckmäßiges Übernachtungshotel für Skandinavien-Reisende, verkehrsgünstig unweit der Öresundbrücke an der Strecke Malmö - Göteborg gelegen. Der Restaurant-/Frühstücksbereich ist etwas eng und knapp bemessen.

Stayed for two nights. The reception was helpful and professional. The dinner was ok. The breakfast buffet however was pretty bad with a rather small selection of food. The rooms were clean, but a bit on the small side. Works well for a short stay, but wouldn't recommend for…
column8: Response from NorseHotels, Manager at Good Morning LundResponded Oct 24, 2013
column10: Dear Martin  I would like to thank you for answering about your stay at our hotel. I am sorry to hear that the breakfast when you visited us was not as you expected. We at Ibis Styles in Lund straive  to have a good and variated breakfast, therefor i will assure you that I will share your experience with my staff.   Best regards   Håkan Magnusson Hotel Manager

column7: The hotel rooms are very clean, the location is quite and well connected to the city centre. I have visited the hotel three times, and in a couple of occasions I got a very competitive price. The restaurant is fine, if you don't have high expectations.
column8: Response from NorseHotels, Manager at Good Morning LundResponded Oct 24, 2013
column10: Dear Carlos  We,  the team in Lund are grateful for your positive feedback.  We hope to welcome you back soon at our hotel.  Best regards   Håkan Magnusson Hotel Manager

column7: das hotel ist ca. 10 autominuten vom zentum von lund in einem gewerbegebiet gelegen und erinnert an einen barackenbau - der style ist oberflächlich wie mc donalds, demnach auch das preis-leistungsverhältnis mies - wie ein burger um 10 EUR.  es war unser erstes hotel in schweden,…

Rent och fräscht hotell men rymmen är väldigt små, kändes nästan som att man fick gå in och backa ut. Bra läge men tänk på att om ni åker på morgonen så är det köer överallt! Trevlig frukostbuffe med olika variationer. Stort plus att man kan ha hund med sig!
column8: Response from NorseHotels, Manager at Good Morning LundResponded Oct 30, 2013
column10: Hej  Tack för att du tagit dig tid att skriva om din vistelse. Det betyder mycket för oss. Jag hoppas vi kan önska dig välkommen hos oss igen.

column7: L'hôtel est situé en bordure d'une grande zone commerciale, à proximité de l'autoroute qui relie Malmö à Stockholm, ainsi que la route qui mène à Lund. Il est cependant suffisamment en retrait de ces routes pour qu'on ne les entende pas depuis les chambres. Un grand parking…

Sov en natt där och det var ett toppen rum! Bekväma sängar,täcken och kuddar. Sov kalas gott. Frukost buffèn var super fräsch och god. Personalen trevlig. Bilderna var sanningsenliga  Kommer definitivt sova där igen och kan verkligen rekommendera detta hotell.

Auch ich habe noch niemals in meinem Leben ein so kleines Doppelzimmer bewohnt. Und wir hatten mit großem Hund gebucht. Als wir im Zimmer waren, wussten wir nicht, wo der Hund sich hinlegen könnte...Das Bad ist so klein, dass man auf Tuchfühlung mit dem Duschvorhang ist, wenn…

Come molti hotel della catena, la struttura è essenziale ma pulita e dotata dei comfort fondamentali. La colazione è buona e non ho rilevato particolari aspetti negativi, se non il fatto che l'hotel si trova lungo una strada un po' trafficata. Consigliato a chi viaggia per…

Found this hotel clean and staff helpful.  Rooms were compact, nearer to etap standard than holiday inn. Location, on an industrial estate is typical of the genre and expected, Reasonably quiet and an easy ride into Lund.

Rapport qualité prix correct mais les chambres sont de même petites ! Restauration assez médiocre et un peu chère 13 euros pour un repas industriel. Emplacement en zone commerciale en dehors de la ville un peu loin pour les visites mais pour une halte d'une nuit cela convient.

De douche was iets minder, maar voor de rest was de kamer prima in orde! Het ontbijt was uitgebreid en ook prima in orde ! De ligging was wel even van het centrum van Lund, maar voor onze doorreis was dit zo ook gekozen.

column6: Hotel mit centralerLage zwischen Malmö und Lund
column7: Ibis Lund liegt in einem Handels-und Industriegebiet . Sowohl Malmö als Auch Lund sind leicht zu erreichen, da das Hotel direkt an den Anfahrten E6 und E22 liegt. Die Zimmer sind klein, aber dennoch bequem. Das Früstück ist gut und der Service ist sehr gut.

We stayed one night, booking two rooms for ourselves and our son, daughter-in-law and granddaughter. The reception staff were outstanding and could not have been more helpful to us travelling with a baby. The food in the evening may not have had a lot of choice but it was very…
column8: Response from NorseHotels, General Manager at Good Morning LundResponded Aug 12, 2013
column10: Dear Hazel, Thank you for your generous feedback. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and wish you welcome back next time you visit Lund and Sweden! Have a nice summer! Kind Regards Ibis Styles Lund, Maria with Staff

column7: We stayed one night in this place and it was very comfortable. Its great value for money if you don't want to spend too much and still have a reasonable stay. The food was great as well and it was fairly easy to get.

column6: Hotel normal, con calidades normales, nada de lujos
column7: Un hotel, donde te puedes encontrar agusto y poco mas, no es un hotel de vacaciones pero para estar unos dias esta bien, esta en Lund, y puedes visitar esta bonita ciudad aunque tienes que desplazarte unos kilometros para ir a Malmo, Es una opcion de lo mas barato para estos…

Wir haben uns wohl gefühlt. Das Personal war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Das Frühstück war reichhaltig und vielfältig. Mit dem Auto war es eine ziemlich zentrale Lage für etliche Ausflüge in der Umgebung. Das Zimmer hätte ein bisschen größer sein können.. Alles in Allem war…

Perfect for families, very clean and quiet :) We did not get a family suite, as expected, but the rooms were very nice.  Close to the city centre, close to the high way, perfect spot to stop for one night!

The hotel was pretty okay. Breakfast was good! The thing that wasn´t good was the inefficiently soundproof. I woke up one day because of the elevator was sounding high. And when you shower there were nothing to use to get the water in the water well. So when you where going in…

column6: Trip to Lund, Sweden with friends
column7: Good experience. Very good value. Very helpful staff. Hot breakfast included in addition to fruit, cereals, yogurt plus coffee, expresso and a variety of teas. Free Internet with easy access. The rooms were small, but very bright and clean with flat screen TV. Location is very…

Schone kamer met uitstekende bedden, enigzins gehorig en  jammer dat er geen stoel in staat wel een zitmeubel zonder leuning. de bed lampjes zouden minder fel kunnen zijn al met al een uitstekend hotel.

Positiv: Lage sehr günstig zur Autobahn, daher ideales Übernachtungshotel. Lage in einem Gewerbegebiet mit Einkaufsmöglichkeiten. Peronal freundlich und hilfsbereit. Zimmer klein aber ausreichend und sehr sauber. Sanitäre Einrichtungen in einem guten Zustand. Das…

Very friendly reception and since I had a hire car the slight out of town location was not really a problem. Would certainly recommend it to anyone. My wife passed out in the toilet and hurt herself. We had to go to the hospital in Lund and the front desk lady was kind enough to…

The location is important. Not to far from center of the city, walking is easy approx 3,5 km. Due to the mainroad it was a quit area. No noise from traffic nore from guests. For one nights sleep and breakfast I am delighted for the pricing. I only wish the scrambled eggs would…

column6: Nice, clean but very small rooms
column7: We stated two nights at the recently refurbished and rebranded Ibis Styles. The room was so small that the double bed was up against the wall so I had to crawl over the foot end of the bed to get out of it. There was really no space in the room for luggage and no place to sit…

We really liked the room and the service was also excellent. We had a great time in Lund. The breakfast was amazing and well done. Thank you very much. The location was perfect, not too close and too far from the city centre.
column8: Response from NorseHotels, Manager at Good Morning LundResponded Jun 18, 2013
column10: Thank you for giving us such positive feedback, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Welcome back the next time you visit Lund!  Kind Regards Maria Andersson General Manager

column7: I totally agree with other commentators. The rooms are the smallest i have seen. I was alone in my room but i cant imagine how 2 people can stay here with suitcases. The bathroom was ok. The breakfast was quite alright with warm eggs and meat products. I stayed here only for a…

column6: Alla frös på detta så kallade 4* hotell
column7: Iskallöt hotell vid konstant temperatur, alla frös. Dålig koll på detaljer. Ex hällor på barockar , uppmärkning på kaffeautomat, dymotejp gick inte att läsa, För att inte frysa på natten krävs morgonrock i sängen. Klart övervärderat med 4*, Det sämsta 4* jag bott på . värt 2+*

réservation en octobre pour une courte période peu avant noël. Dix jours avant le départ: prévenu par téléphone de l'annulation de la réservation par IBIS en raison de fermeture de l'hôtel par suite du manque de réservations !  Et pas d’alternative vraiment crédible proposée...

Very good value. The room was clean and nice for sleeping. A bit small for other activites, but I didn't have that need so it was no problems. A bit outside the town of Lund but very quiet and nice for sleeping.

column6: Pulito e molto essenziale, forse troppo
column7: Struttura con ampio parcheggio esterno, collocata fuori dal centro abitato nei pressi di un distributore di carburante ed a lato di una strada di grande comunicazione. Ospita un piccolo ristorante. L'aspetto esterno dell'edificio non e' particolarmente attraente. Le camere sono…

Katastrof servic otrevlig personal, hemsk mat och sitta å vänta 25 min för att ens få beställa, man hör micron Plinga å strax kommer maten! bemötandet av personalen är mer försvinn än välkommen känns som att man stör...

column6: Takes Cheap to a whole new level
column7: This was a convenient stop with our car after getting off the ferry from Sassnitz on the way to Uppsala.  Easy to find and convenient parking.  The breakfast was adequate.  That's the positives! We have stayed in several Ibis hotels in the past few years and this one is by far…
column8: Response from NorseHotels, General Manager at Good Morning LundResponded Oct 25, 2012
column10: Dear guest,  I am so sorry that your stay with Ibis Lund did not at all meet your expectaions. I can see that you, by several reasons, had reasons to complaint.  All issues will be shared with my team in order to make sure this never happens again, and to get some explanation to why this could occour in first place.  Once again, I am sorry for this and I hope that you contact me for a further communication.  With Kind Regards Maria Andersson General Manager, IBIS Lund

column7: Prima hotel die wij hebben gebruikt als tussenstop op onze reis naar Zweden. Kamer was vrij klein maar prima waar die voor bedoeld was, en dat was voor ons om te slapen. Nette douche en toilet. Ontbijt buffet was ook keurig geregeld. Al met al een prima overnachtings hotel in de…

El hotel está bien, el parking correcto la wifi es de pago la habitación bién, lo malo fué la cortina de ducha, es incómoda y antihigiénica un poco cara la estancia del perro lo mejor que en los países nórdicos los edredones son de plumas de verdad, suave!!!

Nous y avons séjourné fin juillet pour une étape. Comme lu dans les précédents avis, pas de clim mais contrairement aux autres Ibis où nous avons logé en Suède sur ce séjour, la fenêtre s'ouvre sur sa totalité. De plus quand nous y sommes allés, il faisait 26° et il n'y avait…

column6: Pourquoi des chambres si étroites dans un ensemble neuf?
column7: Tout est conforme à ce qu'on attend d'un hôtel Ibis à une exception près. Et quelle exception. La chambre est exigue et convient à une personne seule qui peut poser sa valise sur le second lit. A deux, il faut faire des contorsions pour éviter la valise qui dépasse le petit…

column6: Bon IBIS malgre les toutes petites chambres
column7: L'hotel se trouve un peu a l'ecart de la ville, mais est calme et propre. Les chambres sont malgre tout un peu trop petites ( meme pour les habitues des IBIS ), mais propres et avec une bonne literie. La salle de douche ( tout comme la chambre ) est refaite a neuf. Petit bemol -…
Vriendelijk hotel met goede service op korte afstand van het centrum met de rust van de rand van de stad waar het aangenaam te verblijven is.

Niemals zuvor habe ich in einem so kleinen Hotelzimmer geschlafen, wie in dem im Ibis Lund. Menschen mit Klaustrophobie rate ich dringend davon ab, sich für dieses Haus zu entscheiden. Völlig unfassbar, wie ein ein Doppelzimmer (!) wie dieses - mit so wenig Platz - überhaupt…

Het zou erg prettig zijn als  we als gezin op 1 kamer zouden kunnen verblijven.  Helaas is dit niet mogelijk in dit hotel. De volgende keer zullen we waarschijnlijk kijken naar een andere mogelijkheid.

We travelled by car so hotel was not far from Lund itself but also handy for travel in all directions. Staff were amazingly helpful with directions and tips for making visits just that bit easier. Good breakfasts lasted us well into the day after a good night's sleep. Just what…
column8: Response from NorseHotels, General Manager at Good Morning LundResponded Oct 4, 2012
column10: On behalf of my team we would like to thank you for your positive feedback. We would be happy to serve and accomodate you again and would like to wish you welcome back whenever you visit Lund again.  With Kind Regards Maria Andersson General Manager, Ibis Lund

column7: We are staying on the average 50-75 nights a year in various accor hotels in Europe & elsewhere. Both for leisure & business reasons.  About Ibis hotel, Lund Sweden,  It has been "sort of" renovated and or refurbished resently without too many improvements to the guests.  The…
column8: Response from NorseHotels, General Manager at Good Morning LundResponded Oct 4, 2012
column10: Dear guest, Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay at Ibis Lund, I am sorry that our standard didn't meet your expectations. We are very happy that our hotel has undergone a complete renovation, but due to the construction of our buildning, the size of our rooms are still the same. We also chose to keep the shower curtains, due to the fact that a glasswall would have been to narrow.  I hope that you would give us the chance to accomodate and serve you again, and wich you welcome back to Ibis Lund.  Kindest Regards Maria Andersson Ibis Lund

column6: Bra hotell som var bättre förr
column7: Med den nya möbleringen har rummen blivit svåra att använda om man är mer än en person i rummet. De nya sängarna är alldeles för stora och jag bävar för den dag det blir kallt och vinter när ena sängen nästan helt står mot värmeelementet. Det saknas golvyta att ställa väskan på,…

Ibis Lund ist ein preiswertes Hotel in einem Industri-und Geschäftsgebiet. Die Lage ist nahe der grossen Durchgangsstrasse, aber leider nicht ganz einfach zu finden. Das Hotel ist kürzlich renoviert worden. Die Zimmer sind sehr klein, aber für eine oder 2 Nächte durchaus…

Jeg har bodd her to ganger og hotellet er helt ok. Det er ikke et sted jeg ville ha lagt en 2 ukers ferie til, men som et sted å krasjlande en natt før man kjører videre så er det helt ok. Rommene er ganske små, men det er rent. Det er stille om natten og sengene gode. De…

My girlfriend and I booked this because it was the cheapest hotel in Lund, but when we arrived we realized it's not close to the city center.  It's about a 12 euro taxi ride or a 30-45 minute walk along a highway from the city center.  The rooms are also very small, although…

war diese Woche im Ibis in Lund, ich weiss nicht ob alle Zimmer, ich hatte 201 war ganz neu renoviert, nett eingerichtet und mit allem Nötigem, ausser einem Fön ausgestattet. Fernsehen bringt nur BBC und 6 SChwedische Sender aber das läßt sich verkraften. Das Hotel liegt direkt…

Dieses Hotel ist völlig neu erbaut. Damit verbunden jedoch ist zu unserer großen Enttäuschung, dass IBIS offensichtlich bei Neueinrichtungen wohl dazu übergegangen ist, die von uns bisher gewohnten normal bemessenen Zimmergrößen drastisch zu verkleinern. Das bedeutet im…

Kleine kamers maar goede prijs kwaliteitsverhouding. Gerenoveerde eetzaal. Klimaatregeling in de kamers kan beter. Goed hotel voor een overnachting op doorreis. Vriendelijk personeel. Locatie buiten het centrum maar makkelijk toegankelijk vanaf de grote wegen zonder dat er…

column6: A place to sleep - nothing more
column7: This is a place to sleep, nothing more... And the bed is unfortunately not that comfortable. The room is very small esp. if you are more than one person. The service was not good, we had some problem with our booking (the staff couldn't find it when we were checking out!) and…

Se encuentra en un lugar con mal transporte publico, dado que el autobus mas proximo deja de dar servicio a las 21h. aproximadamente. Los recepcionistas no hablan español, cosa que hubiera falicitado su trabajo y mi comunicación con ellos. Las habitaciones son pequeñas y los…

I Have visited a number of IBIS hotells in Sweden, and must say that the IBIS Hotell in Lund was a good experience in terms of service, value and above all cleanliness! In terms of location, well, not difficult to find even though not particularly central position. Will gladly…

column6: Good hotel to stay a night when travelling
column7: Hotel is located in suburb in a commercial zone. Rooms are small, but clean.  Free parking, reasonable room rates.  I think all Ibis jotels in Sweden look/are the same prefab buildings, so you know what you get. Good hotel when travelling and you have to sleep somewhere. If…

No está mal. Caro para lo que ofrece, aunque a lo mejor para Suecia está bien. El wi-fi es de pago. Está en las afueras y bastante lejos de Malmo que es don de queríamos ir, y como te lo ofrecen. La limpieza es correcta y el trato también.

Good hotel in location and price. But comes into question since my ordinary hotel was not available.There will probably be more visits to Ibis Lund in the future.Coming late and leaving early for just a sleep over is one of my needs.

Ich fahre jedes Jahr 2mal in dieses Hotel auf der Durchreise nach Mittelschweden. Das Hotel ist von der Autobahn aus gut zu finden aber weit weg vom Zentrum in einem Gewerbegebiet. Der Service ist ausgezeichnet, sehr nettes Personal. Die Zimmer sind ibismässig klein aber man hat…

ideal as stop-over by car on your way from Denmark to Stockholm, free parking, shopping mall next door with supermarket and lots of other stores, pets allowed (not so common in Sweden), friendly staff speaking excellent English

very good hotel, good location, good service, good food, good price when you book online, it is recommended to stay here, close to the city where there's lots to see plus it is close to Malmö in the Øresund bridge for further travel in Europe

Die Betten waren nicht optimal - zu weich. Die Dusche war nur durch einen Duschvorhang abgetrennt.  Das Zimmer war (auch im Vergleich zu anderen IBIS-Hotels) sehr klein. Das Essen im Restaurant war gut und das Personal sehr freundlich.

column6: Nice stay, does the basics well
column7: Not in the heart of Lund but the hotel does lots of thing very well. It is clean, quiet and comfortable with very friendly staff. The food was surprisingly good too.

un hotel moyen et bien ,mais tres loin des villes principal, sans vehicule  c est tres difficile de se deplacer.les employers sympatique et les chambres propre.par contre la literie pas tres bonne.le site tres loin du centre ville et difficile a trouver

Easy to find hotel in a shopping area. Very small rooms, not suitable if you have large luggage. But very helpful and friendly staff, good breakfast, free parking, easy access  and good value if on special. Ibis hotels in Sweden are smallest Ibises I have seen anywhere in Europe.

column6: Praktisches Hotel für Ausflüge in Südschweden
column7: Das Hotel liegt etwas ausserhalb in einem Industriegebiet, nahe an der Strasse zum Zentrum. Es handelst sich um ein typisches IBIS-Hotel. Die Zimmer sind kleiner als gewöhnlich, aber zum ûbernachten ist alles da. Die Gegend ist ruhig sodass man bei offenem Fenster schlafen kann,…

The room is extremly small for 2 persons espesially if you have luggage. The room we got is only for one person but in the reservation it was declared that we were two persons. There was an extra bed for a thired person but I do not understand how three persosn can be in the…

column6: for a short stay a good hotel
column7: Good located and clean hotel. Perfect en kindly service at the reception.  Enough parking space ( safe and for free ). Very small chambers, but clean, and tidy. So for a short stay a  perfect hotel almost directly at the highway

Zimmer sind für eine Person OK wenn man keine großen Ansprüche stellt. Stau möglichkeit für die Klamotten ist ein bischen kapp. WLan ist kostenpflichtig --- :-( TV- keine BBC or NTv, N24 und keine Deutschen Sender.  Frühstücksbüffe ist gut gewesen !  Personal ist sehr…
Erg kleine kamers, geen comfort - wel vriendelijke receptie, gelegen op industrieterrein.
Bra läge för en övernattning på väg söderut, utmärkta parkeringsmöjligheter, tyst och lungt.

I chose Ibis the most time because I need no breakfast. I only want a clean room and a very clean sanitary. This I get at Ibis all the time till now. And this was in Lund as well. The usefulness was good as all the time.

Coming from the Netherlands the location of the hotel direct beside the road was easy to locate. Suprisingly near the centre of  Lund, it was easy traveling and sightseeing around. Nearby there is a big supermarket and shopping centre. Although the road is not far from the Hotel…

column6: Just back from a business trip to...
column7: Just back from a business trip to Scandinavia. Had the misfortune to stay here. Very cramped hotel. Tiny box room. Hotel next to main trunk road. Minuscule room with useless shower room. Only helpful person there was trainee.

Das Hotel liegt leider relativ weit weg vom Zentrum, ist zwar mit Bus erreichbar. Jedoch am Wochenende sieht es eher schlecht aus. Mit Auto ist das kein Problem, aber man will ja doch was trinken gehen in der Stadt. Zimmer sind klein, fast winzig. Es gibt eine Art Doppelbett und…
IBIS like modern room.   I was happy with the room mainly because we got a good deal for it and the toilet is the best of any other IBIS hotel I had been so far! (Am particular about toilets...)

The positive thing about this hotel is that it is cheap. However you get what you pay for!!  The rooms are very tiny indeed with no room to move around at all, the bed was also the smallest double bed I have ever slept in! The duvet didn't even cover the 2 of us!  The bathroom…

Extra cost for breakfast when prices were already more than expected, left me feeling that this was not good value for money. Eating at the hotel restaurant took much longer than i expected and the food was overpriced and of below average quality, i think this was because of the…

In September 4 family members and myself visit this city whose name is  the same as my maiden name.  The city is so beautiful, clean , historical yet enterprising.  The people were so friendly, helpful and cheerful. We spent 4 days there at the IBIS hotel.  The service and the…

Comfortable, spacious, convient, well thought-out, clear expectations, clear communication, quick replies to questions. Amazing location, beautiful surroundings and close to Lund C. Nice bathrooms and showers, spacious and open kitchen, two modern refrigerators. Lots of comfy…

column6: Här övernattar man förmånligt i Lund
column7: Här övernattar man förmånligt i Lund om man är på genomresa i Lund. Några minuters promenad från järnvägsstationen. Praktiskt, välordnat, städat och lugnt men samtidigt opersonligt. Obemannad incheckning.

Perfect location, very close to the central train station. Also close to restaurants, supermarkets and easy to walk around the city. Cozy, clean, quite and well-organized. Highly recommended to travelers.

If you are looking for some comfort and privacy in a hostel world this is a right place to stay. A very welcoming and friendly atmosphere is created by the people working there and the overall vibrancy of Lund.

This is a very good hostel. The common areas, bathrooms and kitchen were all very clean. The beds have a nice curtain, making it very cozy and a private. It's a bit pricey - but so is everything in Sweden. Wi-Fi was reliable. The location is great, near the train station, the…

Bra och lugn plats hoppas att jag kan komma till baka där , jag träffade inte personaler eftersom jag kom till sent men allting var regelbundet . Om man vill koppla av rekommenderar jag ens att boka där

This hostel was really close to the train station. I found it really easy, and had been provided with codes in advance of my stay. The beds are in small pods which gives the feeling of your own space. There was also a locker. The bathroom was located just off the room – there…

Detta är ett vandrarhem. Det är rent och fräscht och så, centralt och bra, men hur i hela friden kan det vara så dyrt? Det är inte någon vidare vacker miljö att vistas i och personal finns inte. Hur kan detta kosta bara 200 kronor mindre än ett dubbelrum med frukost på ett…

column6: コスパの良いホステルです。
column7: ホテル代金の高い北欧。私は、旅の予算を節約するため、いろいろなユースホステルを利用しています。このWinstrup Hostelはとてもおススメです。  　まず、駅近。駅から歩いて３分もしません。近くにセブンイレブンやカフェがあります。さらに、街の中心まで歩いて3分ほど。  　さらに、清潔です。私が泊まった日は、宿泊客が少なかったせいでしょうか、トイレやシャワーが清潔でした。ベットのシーツも敷いてあるので、自分で作業する必要はありません。宿泊客が使えるキッチンと洗濯機もあります。 …

column6: Strategic location but a bit pricey...
column7: Sweden can be an expensive country, but I thought Winstrup was a bit expensive for a bed in a room with three other people. However the beds are nicely built so as to allow a maximum of privacy. The shower cabin was quite comfortable. The employees were very helpful when I asked…

Very nice and clean - and excellent location close to everything in central Lund.  The beds are built into the wall and you can get your own private space when closing the curtain.   Self check in and entry codes to all doors makes you don´t have to worry about loosing your…

Had a great stay. Very nice place, clean and we were in the middle of everything! Could walk everything and just á few minutes to the train station. Over all á good place to be and the price alright..

Supermysigt hostel med nära till allt! Sköna sängar i mysiga kojer med lampa och eluttag gör att det känns som eget rum trots att man bor i sovsal. Fina och fräscha badrum, bra kök med all utrustning man behöver och trevlig personal. Jag har blivit stamkund!

column6: Very good It’s nice , clean  , and quiet .
column7: It’s nice , clean  , and quiet . I prefer having a sofa in the room and shampoo in the shower .  Very good  It is too close to  the station , and  very close to Copenhagen’s airport that’s why it is good option for passengers   Thanks

Location is very convenient and the hostel itself very clean. The dorm room was very spacious, the little nook beds were both adorable and comfortable, and the owner is very friendly and helpful. The hostel seems to be underneath a kindergarten or daycare, so from about 8:30am…

Nice and cozy, really tidy and comfortable place for couple of nights stay. I particularly liked the idea of having a bunk beds with curtains which enables people to have privacy within a group room. Toilets and other amenities are clean and spatious
column8: Response from Ulf P, Ägare at Winstrup HostelResponded Feb 14, 2018
column10: Thank you for your positive feed-back! It is great that the work of our staff is appreciated.

column7: There where two other people in my room but thanks to the curtain infront of the bed I felt it was private enough. Very affordable! The only downside I thought was that it was a bit to warm in the bedarea so I had some troubles with falling asleep!
column8: Response from Ulf P, Ägare at Winstrup HostelResponded Jan 22, 2018
column10: Thank you for sharing your comments. The radiators, as well as the ventilation in each room may be adjusted by the guests according to their preference.

column7: I stayed here in Nov, so there were not many people. Winstrup Hostel is quiet and comfortable same as the city Lund.  The kitchen in Winstrup Hostel is tidy and easy to cook food. The room Selma is  also good for ladies.  And the hostel is very close to the center station in…

column6: A good stay for the price. It could have been better.
column7: A 6-bed room with bed at the upper level. It wasn't so convenient ,but somehow I managed. One bed is good enough for two persons. The room was spacious ,but table was too small and lockers too tight. Only two chairs. The room was warm enough. A modern technology is part of this…

It is very near to the train station, which benefits a lot for people have poor directional senses like me. The room is clean, and the staff is helpful. If I will have another trip to Lund, I think Winstrup Hostel will still be of my choice.

column6: Utmärkt läge mitt i hjärtat av Lund!
column7: Överraskande bra för att vara ett "Hostel"! Ordentlig fräsch frukost, stort smidigt kök med goda förvaringsmöjligheter samt bra service i övrigt! Mycket smidigt boende om du t ex ska resa med en skolklass!

Sparkling clean, friendly personnel. Bed was made. Letter awaiting my arrival. Would have liked a sign on wc/bath within dorm, as I had no idea that an anonymous green door led to loo and shower.  Would also have liked some explanation to the (excellent) little shelf with three…

Excellent location!  In the middle of city Lund, nice hostel and very clean place. Easy to check in and out. It is very comfortable for a traveller who just visit lund for a short time to stay there. I recommend it.

The bunk beds are funny and isolate rather well from others around. I stayed here several times and find it comfortable. This time unfortunately a couple had to leave at 4 pm so their stumbling around was annoying, but if you can sleep again after such an intermezzo it does not…

Just leaved Lund it was a great time staying there at the Winstrup Hostel. Nice decorate and clean place. Easy to check in and out. Good  with a kitchen to fix your own food. It was locaced in city and  near to everything. Will recommend to other if they visit Lund. Will come…

Winstrup ligger centralt i Lund nära buss och tågstation.  Bra anordnade sovalkover med förhängen. Stora skåp på rummet (ta med hänglås). Fönstren går att öppna helt och hållet vilket gör att man kan ventilera rummet bra. Eluttag, lampa och liten hylla vid varje sängplats.   Det…

This is a very nice and clean recently renewed hostel in the middle of the city. Pitty they don't offer breakfast but they figured out a nice solution with the nice and friendly girls of creperiet. Check in was easy, as check out was.

I loved Winstrup Hostel. The facilities, services and rooms are really amazing, I felt welcomed at the reception and it was close to Lund's city center.  If I ever visit Lund again, I would definitely stay here :)

I didn't say it from the start but now that my stay is over I can certainly say that Winstrup hostel is the best hostel I've ever been so far. Nice, clean, modern, fully equipped, well organized and perfectly located. It's a bit more expensive than other hostels I've been to but…

column6: Clean, fresh and loads of toilets
column7: I was very content with my stay! I came after the reception had closed but there was a letter left for me with the info I needed. The room was nice with ok ventilation, a ready-made bed with a comfortable mattress. The bunk beds were practical and nice. There were toilets on the…

The location of the hostel is perfect for any student or visitor in Lund. The common area, bathrooms, and shared bedrooms are all very clean. The sheets are provided by the staff and the bed was already made upon my arrival. I was worried I would feel claustrophobic in the…

No one on reception. Pin number for doors emailed - worked for 1 door but not second. I travel lite so like to rent a towel but no one there to do this. Laundry advertised but because no one there, couldn't do my laundry. Txt messages sent - no reply. Rooms clean and tidy, not…
column8: Response from Ulf P, Owner at Winstrup HostelResponded Jun 8, 2017
column10: Dear Kiwoze, Thank you for your feedback. Not much seems to have worked as intended. I am normally on site until 6 pm, and after that time we rely on our check in process to work according to instructions we send to our guests. We also provide a 24/7 phone number to resolve any issues or requests. Unfortunately your text message never reached me. As we state in our arrival letter, door codes for your room is listed in a document (with your name on it) waiting on the reception counter. This is not the same code as for the front doors for security reasons. I gather this document was missing when you arrived since you used the front door code to your room without success. We will continue to enhance our communication and check in process to reduce the risk for your issues to be repeated

column7: The hostel is nice and very easy-going. All bunk-beds have curtains and personal storage space. The kitchen area is big and fully equipped. There are enough bathrooms, which are also very clean. I could not find the lockers described in the advertisement. I also didn't ask…

column6: A basic but fun place to stay.
column7: This place has all you need and it is all very very clean. The location is great and I would definitely go there again. The service, such as it is (you never see anyone unless you need them) is friendly and extremely helpful.
column8: Response from Ulf P, Ägare at Winstrup HostelResponded May 16, 2017
column10: Thank you for your great feedback!

column7: We were 20 persons staying at Winstrup Hostel when paying the Univerity a visit for two Days. The Hostel is extremly well located and it is only 300 m from the Railway station. It is no through traffic outside in the streets so it is very quiet. Breakfast is optional but the one…
column8: Response from Ulf P, Ägare at Winstrup HostelResponded Apr 25, 2017
column10: Great to have you visiting us again! Breakfast for individual guests can be enjoyed at our partner, Creperiet, just around the corner for a discounted price. By pre-arrangement we can serve a sufficient breakfast at the hostel for larger groups.

column7: Rent och fint sköna sängar mysigt med en egen liten grotta bra med kontakter vid sängen för laddning av tel. mm. Trävlig personal. Centralt endast 5 min. gångavstånd från tågstationen, affärer och restauranger runt hörnet. Museer och parker.

column6: Very good location, easy to book, arrival at any time possible!
column7: I booked in the afternoon and stayed one night, for which a hostel (shared room) is absolutely fine. Its location is perfect, close the the train station. I arrived around midnight, the automatic check-in procedure was easy. The badroom/shower was clean, as well as the rooms.…
column8: Response from Ulf P, Ägare at Winstrup HostelResponded Apr 6, 2017
column10: Thanks a lot! We have been working on our check-in procedure to make it simple and give guests more flexibility when it comes to arrival times. Glad you liked it!

column7: Winstrup Hostel is tucked away in a quite lane on Winstrupsgatan, away from the humdrum of the busy streets around. Its a stone throw away from the Lund Central station & the Bus station. It is surrounded by places to eat according to your budget and there are departmental…
column8: Response from Ulf P, Ägare at Winstrup HostelResponded Apr 1, 2017
column10: Your feed-back is much appreciated. We'll keep on working to make it easy and comfortable to stay at Winstrup Hostel, right in the heart of Lund.

column7: This was my first stay, but definitely not my last. I stayed one night and I was treated like a VIP guest and got a 8-persons bedroom all by myself. I felt very safe and relaxed during my stay. I will recommend it to everyone!

I only stayed one night here. It was very clean and warm. I loved the bed it was so comfortable. There is a personal light and a plug socket also a thick curtain so you are not disturbed by others. There are no staff here but my experience was great. I was emailed directions and…

column6: Cosy bunkbeds in the beautiful old town of Lund
column7: The Winstrup Hostel is freshly renovated and offers a big shared kitchen, shared showers and bathrooms and a big common area. The rooms are made up of a genius type of bunk beds I haven't seen before. Each bed is like it's own room with curtains a lamp and two sockets for…

column6: A NEW PLACE TO STAY IN LUND,SWEDEN
column7: The place appears new renovated and you can see that immediately as you come-in in the hostel.A guests  told me that the place has been opened for 3 years but it was first a refugee center before they turned it to a modern and practical hostel.Not far from the main train station…

It's a fantastic hostel. Clean, spacious and a very central  location. It's a hostel, but still has a private  feel to it. You your own little private compartment.  It's the best hostel I have everest stayed at!!!!

column6: Smal and nice place to stay
column7: With short notice thay managed to fix beds for our group of 14 persons, and they made it so we got 2 rooms for just our group. Its one of the cleanest hostel we have ever been to. Amazing service and if you arrive at night you will get a code for the door in a welcome letter and…

The most notable thing about the whole stay was the above and beyond service. I cannot stress enough the accommodative and service-minded attitude we were met with. No problem was a problem, and any and all wishes were happily met.  The rooms are efficient and the beds were like…

I stay in a room here for about a week while I was visiting a friend who was studying at Lund. It was not during the school year so it wasn't crowded, but I hear that there are more people right before Lund starts while people find housing.  The well-stocked full kitchen was…

Это был не самый дешевый хостел в жизни, но однозначно самый лучший! Удобное центральное расположение, приятный персонал, просто безукоризненная чистота! Я забронировала койкоместо в 12-местной комнате и в итоге ночевала в ту ночь одна, т.к. низкий сезон и больше никого не было.…

В хостелах я останавливаюсь очень часто. Потому что практически никогда не бываю в городе больше двух дней.  Винструп хостел - это лучший бюджетный хостел в Европе, в котором я жил. А в Лунде и подавно. Чистые ухоженные постели, большая кухня с морем кухонной утвари. Всё ЧИСТО.…

column6: The Cleanest Hostel in My Europe trip and without any attendant.
column7: Amazing !!! This was my first stay in a hostel where there is nobody behind the desk. You get your 4 digit code to enter this Hostel and then a code for your room door. It was one of the most clean hostels I stayed in Europe, The common self cooking kitchen was fully equipped…

column6: Heel centraal gelegen in Lund, wel ietwat een de dure kant
column7: Toen ik incheckte in november was er geen ontbijt in het hostel zelf: alleen bij een naburig restaurant genaamd "Oskam". Ook was er geen check in bij het hostel zelf: ook dit vond plaats bij Oskam. Het meisje daar was erg netjes, vriendelijk en deed haar werk prima. Er was…

The very location upon arrival at Lund makes Winstrup an excellent place to reside. The available space at the kitchen that allows you self prep offers makes it incredible. The serenest and quiet nature as the rooms are prepared makes sleeping looks like been a king in a palace.…

It was difficult to find a cheap place to stay in Lund besides Winstrup hostel. The location is great actually. It would be nice if it has someone in the reception even though people in the café Oskar (a café where the reception service is placed) were super nice and very…

I stayed 2 months at winstrup (student without any accomodation)   - The first month it was great, I met a lot of student in my situation. We are still friends and we spent a lot of great moments !! The kitchen is convenient, and the shower / WC very clean.  - The second month…

column6: I Love to be in winstrup
column7: Winstrup is à great place in all Way. Close to the train station and buses. Winstrup is clean and cosy. They have à Nice kitchen. Modern bathrooms. Verk cosy beds. The breakfast at café Oskar is awesome👍

column6: Cozy place where people go insane.
column7: Lund is very calm and lovely. The kitchen is very nice and fully equipped. The common area could be more interesting and inviting to communicate. Everything is there and nice but only functional. The rooms are ok there could be more space. The bathrooms are clean but every room…

column6: strategic location, clean and good privacy for a good rest
column7: - The place is clean with nice decor. The kitchen had all the important necessities. - The location is very very near to the rail station.   - I am impress with the 'bunk bed'. Each bed had a curtain, a plunger and the usual reading lamp. Really cozy.  It was not the typical…

column6: Stayed for 3 weeks- Great experience throughout!
column7: Got a last minute place at Lund University so had to find a hostel while looking for housing. So glad I found Winstrup!  Excellent service from booking to checking out! The owners and staff were helpful and friendly throughout my stay. The hostel is really a cosy place with a…

This was my first time staying alone anywhere and the first time i stayed in a hostel, and i must say it was really nice and cozy. I didn´t mind sharing the room with other people. It was actually quite nice and made me feel less alone. Winstrup has a very good location in the…

I needed a room for an overnight stay and this was ideal, as it was so near the railway station. The door code system worked fine. It might, in my view, nonetheless,  be better if staff were employed in two shifts, say from 10 to 2 p.m. and then 6 to 10 p.m. I arrived at 11 p.m.…

I've stayed for 3 nights while I was looking for a room to move in since I'm a Lund University student and it was really great! Clean, big kitchen, nice rooms and a lot of privacy since every bed place has curtains. One of the best hostels I've been to. Good even for meeting new…

The hostel is really close to the train station and university, but was still generally quiet. The rooms were cosy and you could have your own space. The shared facilities are really modern and very clean. The WiFi is free, fast and stable. I was checking in very late & checking…

The hotel is very close to the train station. Wifi was very good. Big common room with kitchen and fridge for everyone. Very clean. It was really unpleasant that they didn't send me the code to open the front door so I had to knock on the door until another guest showed up and…

Pulito, accogliente, centrale nella piccola Lund . Città che ospita una importante università e perciò piena di gente giovane che scorrazza in bicicletta. Gli interni del hostel sono moderni e gestiti modernamente . Serve una certa capacità di adattamento per dormire in camere…

column6: The stay in Winstrup Hostel was really great!
column7: The staff is really friendly, everything is clean and cleaned every day. Even though you are living in a shared room, but you can have your own spaec by closing curtains, if you want to meet new people you can go to the kitchen and share a meal :)

Right in the middle of the city, this modern youth-hostel is clean and practical. The small rooms have a cosy boat-cabin feel, the shared facility are modern and clean. If you're not self-catering, breakfast at a the nearby partner café is excellent, and staff is very welcoming…

column6: Clean and practical, excellent breakfast buffet
column7: Centrally located, within easy walking distance of station and Lund attractions. We also used this as a base for visiting Malmo just 10 minutes away by train. The 4 single bed dorm was basic (as expected) but the design more convenient for a family of 4 than a sharing a hotel…

I have never had such a great hostel experience. The location couldn't be better. Just next to the church and a 2 minute walk to the train station, connecting the 2 worlds of Lund. At first we were a bit anxious because there was no one at check in, but with the organisation…

Not only did they give me key codes for a late night entry without credit card info and trust me to go to Cafe Oskar around the corner the next morning to pay me bill, the accommodation was comfortable, quiet, and convenient to the train. Breakfast at the Cafe was perfect,…

Very close to train station, easy to find. Good kitchen if you want to make your own meals with enough space to eat with new friends or travel companions. Beds are cozy, fairly comfy, with some amount of privacy with the curtains. Electric outlet for computer etc within bed…

Winstrup is a good hostel with great location. I stayed here 3 nights. At the beginning I was upset to get an upper bed, but it was comfortable to sleep on it. It would be good to have a place to sit in the room, sometimes the kitchen area can be crowded.  Very helpful staff.…

Excellent location, with plenty of  shops nearby. The bunks are big and the bathroom and shower are right by the room. Everything was clean. I booked very last-minute and was able to get all the necessary info and codes etc within a couple of hours.

I stayed in the room Greta, very clean, the bed was very nice. Everything was perfect considering the price. Except that early in the morning the floor was full of water. I tried to mop it up but there was no mop.

I would like to thank you very much. very friendly and helpful staff, fair price, convenient location, comfortable beds, very clean and free Wi-fi. i had a great time in the hostel. I will definitely stay here next time when I will be in the area and I recommend this hostel to…

Je suis resté 4 jours en solo. Les lits sont confortables et propre , les douches communes spacieuses et le wifi de trés bonne qualité .Il y a une cuisine américaine commune toute équipée  pour cuisiner. Nombreux commerces aux alentours et la le centre ville est dynamique .

column6: Clean and friendly with excellent value breakfast
column7: I got in late at night and left early in the morning and still this hostel was so much more than just a bed to sleep in! Everything was very clean with cozy bunk beds that gave you some privacy. Breakfast was excellent, if you like me order breakfast during a less busy period…

We stayed 9 person participating in a local sports competition. The Hosten was great, the kids liked it espacialy the coasy bed spaces. Next time I visit Lund we will definitly stay at Winstrup, both privat, business or with friends

I stayed at Winstrup with four of my friends. We got the room "Astrid", very clean and with fun bunk beds where you feel privacy. In the bed there was a light, charging outlets etc. The bathroom facilities were really clean and fresh, newly renovated. Did not try the breakfast.…

column6: Bath and toiletfacitilityes are very clean and fresh.
column7: Nice bedclothes and mattress. I always sleep well. The parking-information is not so good. One time I was there, my car was "loocked" inn by another car, and nobody told where I should park. Now I know.

Idéalement placé au centre ville à proximité de toutes les attractions, bars et  restaurants. Le mode d'accès par code est très facile et pratique pour les arrivées tardives. Chambres avec rideau pour chaque lit, plutôt bien pensé.  Bon séjour mais ça manque de contact avec les…

It was a great experience, especially considering the great price!  The beds are comfortable and the little "cubbies" they're in makes them cozy and private.  There's plenty of room to sit up inside, along with a reading light, outlet, and small shelf for book, phone, etc.  I…

A really good hostel, fresh and clean, and check-in at Café and Creperie Oskar was easy. Nice beds, nice bathrooms. We just had trouble with some of the guests in our room coming in really late and making a lot of noise, but overall it was very good. It was very central and…

As two young girls, we felt safe during the entire visit. It is easy to feel the seriousness in this hostel; I really recommend it! The bathrooms were always clean and also the sleeping areas. We never used the kitchen, but I bet it would have been as great of an experience as…

Das Hostel kann man empfehlen. Alles nett und sauber eingerichtet. Gleich in der Nähe zum Bahnhof. Bei Oscar gibt es lecker Frühstück für 69 Kronen - da kann man nicht meckern! Leider hatten wir Pech mit einem Schweden, der sich über Ostern sein Nest im Hostel gesucht hat und…

Mycket fräscht och välordnat. Mysiga kojer. Stegen till kojen skulle kunna sitta lite mer mittför öppningen, lite svårt att klättra upp när där inte är något att ta tag i. Det var det enda som inte var 100.

Vilket modernt, rent och trevligt ställe! Här finns gott om plats i både sovsal (vi bodde i 4+4 bäddar) och i duschrum.  Pentryt praktiskt och rymligt. Jag har återvänt hit, och jag kommer att göra det igen. Priset är ju en till trevlig sida av övernattningen.

I really like this hostel. The room was large, and the beds are constructed so they don't squeak or make noise. Each bunk has a privacy curtain, light, shelf and powerpoint. The kitchen was large, with enough cutlery and crockery for many people to cook at once.  The bathrooms…

It is excellent stay for all kind of travelers, could be better to have a small table and chairs in Rooms for laptop user and extend the Wi-Fi range up to the room. Being 6 person in a room snoring may disturb your/others sleep, need to be prepared. Kitchen very good and…

Wir waren zu den lundaspelen gast im winstrup hostel. Alles lief sehr reibungslos.  Die kinder haben sich unheimlich wohl gefühlt und konnten in den sehr witzigen betten gut schlafen und kraft tanken. Wir alles betreuer genossen sehr die abendliche Atmosphäre.  Lieben dank wir…

Винструп хостел находится в 10 минутах ходьбы от главной станции Лунда. В хостеле очень чисто, и мало людей. Есть кухня со всем необходимым, где все можно приготовить. В моем номере было 6 кроватей. Все кровати закрываются шторкой, так что когда вы спите, абсолютно не…

column6: Excellent value for money, quality place
column7: The best and the only hostel in Lund, great breakfast and facilities and very central location.. Delivering high quality service and has a very trained staff  Would recommend to anyone coming to Lund...

Ive stayed here a number of times. Surprisngly for a college town there are few affordable places to stay in Lund but this one fits the bill nicely. Super clean, very new facilities, and the kitchen is better than a luxury apartment! Very central as well, just 2 minutes from the…

Um dos melhores hostels que já me hospedei na Europa. Ótima localização (central), excepcionalmente limpo e bem organizado (quartos, banheiros e sala de estar), silencioso, e com camas pensadas de modo a lhe permitir um pouco de privacidade. O café da manhã é ótimo, com uma boa…

-Good location, only few minutes' walk to train station. -Nice room, clean, fully-equipped and well-designed. -Warm service, providing bed liens and also there's no need to make bed by oneself.  -Perhaps the check in time is quite limited.

column6: Amazing hostel on budget and close to the city center
column7: I had a great experience in my stay in Winstrup Hostel, the hostel is close to city center everything is reachible whithin few hundred meters, train station, restaurants and shops. Rooms are quieter and you have access to wifi and kitchen as well.

Very nice little Hostel located at the heart of Lund. We decided to discover Lund last-minute, and the staff helped us with everything even the reception was almost closed.  The room have funny little cabins and are big and clean. Good showers and a modern kitchen. Overall we…

I really enjoyed the stay at Winstrup Hostel. The staff is really nice and helps you whenever you are confused. The kitchen is big, I did not miss anything there and loved to cook in it. Everything was clean, the beds are very nice and offer you privacy. Last but not least it is…

it was a nice staying. the curtains of the bed are really useful. the bathroom of the room was big and clean. the kitchen, although i didnt use it a lot had everything for cooking and everything is still clean.  i didnt like too much the service of the reception. i didnt have a…

+ very clean  + comfortable beds,slept well even though i was on the top bed + very spacious bathrooms + interesting interior design  + very informative emails + fast, easy check out + very close to the station  - there is free wifi but it did not reach the rooms (for me it felt…

It is a great time to stay there! The hostel is near the train station and there are shops & resturant around. The staff are nice and helpful. The room is clean and I love the kitchen the most. And I would recommend you guys to try the breakfast, it worths more than you paid!

The hostel is exactly as advertised. The linen and mattress were clean and comfortable. There was no one in the reception when I came, but it was no problem, their instructions were precise and clear. The room was clean and comfortable and so was the bathroom.  Lots of clean…

This is a hostel - with shared dormitory. But nice, clean and a great price for the location, just beside the train station in central Lund. Ordering and planning absolutely without problems. Great and prompt response to questions by email.

column6: Excellent hostel in heart of Lund
column7: Mycket välskött hostel i hjärtat av Lund nära centralstation. Riktigt trevlig och hjälpsam personal med känsla för service. Bufféfrukost med val som våfflor, nybakt bröd och smoothies. Rekommenderar varmt!!

It is very close to the central station and the city. It is newly built and clean. The breakfast is also very good, althought not quite as good as they advertise it to be on their website. A very few times (mostly on the weekends) you are allowed to eat breakfast at Café Oskar,…

The owners/staff were extremely helpful in securing me a room of my preference as openings became available the day beforehand. The common areas are clean, quiet, bright, and perfect workspaces with wifi. I loved that the bunks have individual curtains, reading lights, and…

column6: Very nice atmosphere and sufficient privacy even at full capacity
column7: Winstrup hostel is perfectly equipped and offered what I was looking for on my four day stay in Lund. It was rather full at the end of summer so one could get to know new people. On the other hand there was always enough free space for one to work or chill in peace if that was…

The hostel is in a great location: very easy to find, and a scarce 5 minute walk from Lund Central station. The inside is modern and fresh, the bathrooms spotless, and the beds sooo cozy!  I was especially surprised that, despite my very late check-in (after 1am), the staff were…

I really liked this hostel. The owner was very friendly and we had a great time staying in Lund. There's a possibility to cook your own meals in the kitchen. Good WiFi-connection. I would recommend this hostel to anyone!

It was very good and everything was cleaned and organized. Thanks a lot because I was going to the university accomodation but I couldn't stay there on the day I arrived so that I went to Winstrup and got very satisfied and happy with what I saw.

Our stay at Winstrup hotel was an unexpected one, long term accomodation in Lund being hard to find, but it was amazing. It's located in the heart of the city, the staff is very friendly, the rooms are comfortable, the other visitors automatically felt like parts of a community.…
