column7: Al centro della Scania, la regione meridionale della Svezia consente di raggiungere tutti i punti di interesse oltre che la stessa Copenaghen. Camere spaziose, complete di tutti gli accessori per sentirsi a casa (anche il ferro ed il tavolo da stiro!!!). Nel periodo di agosto…

column6: Ett hotell som har en hel del att önska!
column7: Vi bodde på Scandic Star i tre dygn då min man var där på ett möte med kollegor med respektive. Vi fick ett rum (superior) som vette mot innergården det gick inte att öppna några fönster och det fanns ingen ventilation.Rummet var mycket mörkt ,på möblerna fanns det ingrodd…
column8: Response from KarinK469, Chef at Scandic Hotel Star LundResponded Oct 1, 2013
column10: Hej, Tack för att du tagit dig tid att skriva till oss om din vistelse. Det var tråkigt att vi inte levde upp till alla era förväntningar. Vi har hade lite problem med våra hissar i somras, detta har blivit åtgärdat. Roligt att ni uppskattade vår Köksmästare och hans team! Om ni kommer till Lund igen, får ni gärna kontakta mig, tack än en gång för er feedback! Vänliga hälsningar Karin Kindberg Hotel Manager

column7: Ett idealiskt hotell för den som ska köra vidare. Ett stenkast från motorvägarna och gott om p-platser. Rummen ganska stora och bekväma. Frukosten riklig och god. Däremot usla offentliga kommunikationer och för långt att gå till centrala Lund. Så kom fram sent och använd Scandic…
column8: Response from KarinK469, Chef at Scandic Hotel Star LundResponded Oct 1, 2013
column10: Tack för din feedback från din senaste vistelse hos oss! Vi uppskattar att du har tagit dig tid att skriva om oss, synd att inte allting var till belåtenhet. Roligt att ni gillade våra rum och att frukosten smakade bra! Som du skriver passar det bra för bilburna gäster. Gällande kommunikationerna i Lund, så har vi varit i kontakt med Turistbyrån, för att se om vi kan underlätta på något vis för våra hotellgäster. Jag vill passa på att önska er välkommen tillbaka! Vänliga hälsningar Karin Kindberg Hotel Manager

column7: Bra hotell när man reser med bil, bra service. Vårt rum för två vuxna och två barn visade sig vara tvådelat med skjutdörr emellan, perfekt för oss. Något varmt på rummet (mycket varmt utomhus under vår vistelse).
column8: Response from KarinK469, Chef at Scandic Hotel Star LundResponded Oct 1, 2013
column10: Hej! Tack för fina ord! Roligt att ni hade en trevlig och bra vistelse! Visst hade vi en fantastiskt härlig och varm sommar! Kan bli lite varmt på rummen , när temperaturen är så hög utomhus! Önskar er välkomna tillbaka till Lund och Scandic Star. Vänliga hälsningar Karin Kindberg Hotel Manager

column6: Praktiskt för övernattning men inte mer
column7: Detta är ett väl använt konferenshotell i utkanten av Lund, vilket har satt sina spår. Vi fick ett familjerum med två sektioner och det fyllde sitt primära syfte – fungerade för en övernattning. Stort badrum med både dusch och badkar, men ganska slitet. Utmärkt frukost med rikt…
column8: Response from KarinK469, Chef at Scandic Hotel Star LundResponded Oct 2, 2013
column10: Hej och tack för din feedback, från din senaste vistelse! Roligt att ni gillade frukosten! Även Att ni uppskattar närheten och enkelheten att komma ut på motorvägen. Uppskattar verkligen att ni tog er tid att skriva om oss på Tripadviser. Välkommen åter! Vänliga hälsningar Karin Kindberg Hotel Manager

column7: Wir hatten ein Superior Extra Zimmer, welches sehr groß war. Neben der Möglichkeit das Schlafzimmer mittels einer Tür vom Hauptzimmer zu trennen waren 2 Fernseher, Wasserkocher und elektrisch verstellbare Betten vorhanden. Der Charme des Zimmers war allerdings bereits verflogen,…

Vi skulle være i Lund for en overnatting før fergen i Ystad. Rommene var fine. Det ene rommet noe slitt, men det andre ganske bra. Fint treningsanlegg og badebasseng. Gode parkeringsmuligheter. Nydelig frokost. Barna trivdes. Lund hadde et hyggelig sentrum. Et sted å komme…
column8: Response from KarinK469, Chef at Scandic Hotel Star LundResponded Oct 1, 2013
column10: Tack för er trevliga feedback från er sommar vistelse i Lund på Scandic Star! Jag hoppas att ni återvänder till oss! Välkommen åter! Vänliga hälsningar Karin Kindberg Hotel Manager

column7: Rooms are clean but a little worn. No minibar in the rooms, no tea/coffee making facilities in the rooms, no toilet paper in the bathroom. Pool too cold for small children. On the plus side, the breakfast is excellent.

column6: Good but not great hotel, convenient by car
column7: Scandic have reliable functional hotels, usually reasonably priced. This hotel is in the outskirts of Lund, convenient by car, 15-20 minutes by bus from the centre of town. Most guests seem to be workmen, sales and service reps and tourists by the busload.   Nothing to complain…

column6: Scandic star i Lund - inte värt pengarna!
column7: Jag tycker man ska fundera två gånger innan man bor på Scandic star i Lund. Trotts ett högt pris erbjuder man slitna rum och har ingen klimatanläggning vilket gör hotellet till en bastu den varma tiden på året. I receptionen kommenterade man även att "på vintern brukar det vara…

column6: Fine family weekend - pool too cold though.
column7: We stayed 4 persons (parents + 6yr/15yr boys) two nights as a weekend offer/break-out event, not so far from our home near Copenhagen. Scandic Lund, was like Scandic most other places: Children friendly, average quality but sufficient for a family like ours on a medium budget.…

column6: Another stay at the Scandic Star
column7: A difference in the Scandic Star.  The family room that I stayed in had been decorated in a much more modern style and had a much more pleasant feel to it.  Bathroom had a "wet room" shower and a bath.  Sounds were somewhat intrusive - the lift operates on that side of the hotel…

Das Scandid Star liegt etwa eine halbe Stunde zu Fuss ausserhalb der Stadt, dafür nahe einer Autobahnaus-auffahrt und somit gut gelegen vom Flughafen. Allerdings verdient es meiner Meinung nach knappe drei Sterne: die Zimmer sind schon ziemlich alt, auch die Möbel scheinen schon…

Also one of the hotels that I´ve visited several times during 2012 and 2013. Good service, always available rooms and big tasty breakfast.  Rooms a little old and worn.  The hotel is locaded near the highway and far away from the city centre, a little to "off" for my taste. If…

column6: Good standard hotel outside city centre.
column7: The hotel is quite a distance from the medieval city centre of Lund, but Lund being a small place this means 10 minutes by bus or taxi from the central station or the cathedral. The hotel is big and part of the Scandic group so you know pretty much what you will get. It is often…

場所はルンド郊外に位置し、駅からは歩いたらたぶん30分以上はかかると思います。駐車スペースは大きいので、車での旅行者向けですね。周りには何もありませんので、買い物する場合はルンド中心部に出る必要があります。 ホテル自体はルンドでは大きめのホテルで、そこそこ広い部屋にホテル内にひととおりのものはあるという感じです。華麗なホテルという感じではありませんが、値段が安めなので交通手段が確保できるなら悪くはない選択肢だと思います。

I have stayed in several Scandic hotels before and whilst none of them are five star, I have learnt to expect a minimum standard, with fairly modern interiors. The lobby at the Scandic Star was quite nice and airy, but once up the escalators to where the rooms are, at least mine…

Hotell sängarna var sköna men rummet i sig slitet borde renoveras mer. Snygg lobby bra avdelning för konferens, sköna stolar bra utrymme. God mat frukosten var bara suverän. Synd det låg så långt ut från centrum.

Fint hotel med med stor och vacker lobby. Personalen var mycket trevlig och servicenivå god. Om man skall klaga på något så skall det vara det ålderdomliga nyckelsystemet som fungerade mindre bra. Ligger en bit utanför centrum vilket är en liten nackdel men annars ett helt OK…

It's a Scandic so it has a minimum standard, but it's out of town and therefore rather isolated.  It was okay for business but there are so many better choices in Lund.  The breakfast did not have the choice one would normally expect and the rooms were just a little tired…

Another stay at the Scandic Star - because it is the nearest hotel to my relatives and the only one with a pool, for my granddaughter to swim in.  This time I booked a room with a queen size bed, for a change - I think I have tried all but the suites now.  This room had a…

I stayed in the Scandic Star Lund for four nights, while attending a conference - also in the hotel.  The good things about my room in the hotel were: excellent food; free, fast wifi; a pool (albeit small); the range of tv channels; the amount of space in the room (my room had a…

column6: Large rooms, excellent breakfast, efficient staff
column7: Quite a large hotel in industrial area a few km out of Lund town centre.  I was visiting Tetrapak, so this was a nearby convenient hotel.  Large room, almost a suite really, with seperate "bedroom" area and "lounge" area. Only snag was no decent lighting in the lounge, so most…

column6: Great short stay with my family
column7: Once again we stayed at Scandic Star with the family. We got a nice 2 bedroom room and the kids liked the pool area very much. Nice breakfast with a lot to choose from. The hotel is a little away from center but no problem when you have a car.

With the same price level as many of the other hotels in Lund closer to the center of town, you might think this hotel has something special to offer. Sadly, age is beginning to show in nearlt every cornr of this hotel and the mildew in the bathroom is proof enough. The rooms…

column6: Fint till utsidan, rummen känns billiga
column7: Jätte trevlig och modern lobby och restaurang men rummen känns billiga och gamla och slitna.  Personalen var jätte bra. Trevliga att både prata och titta på. Hotellet ligger lite avsides från centrum vilken ja tyckte va dumt då jag åkte kollektivt till Lund.

Jag har bott på många scandichotell och det här är absolut ett av de bättre. Rummen var bra för familjer då de gick att dela av. Lobbyn har en härlig volym och är inbjudande. Frukost var bra precis som en frukost på ett hotell ska vara.

Booked 2 months in advance, arrived at 11,30 PM and room not ready due to lack of personal. Boy in the reception went to the room for cleaning and prepare leaving me in the reception alone.!!!! Go the room at midnight. Breakfast really basic bur bathroom with 2 showers (????).…

Vi bodde i fyrbäddsrum som var väldigt liten, men bra städat. Badrummet var stor i förhållande till rummen, med både badkar och separat dusch hörna. Bra med fria p-platser utanför hotellet. Frukosten var superbra och barnen badade i inomhuspoolen på kvällen. Hotellet ligger en…

Bodde på rum 412 med separat sov och arbetsrum. Dusch och badkar. Välfylld minibar. Underbara sängar. Frukosten i vanlig ordning utmärkt på Scandic med de ekologiska alternativen. Storleken på kaffekakan (om man vill ha en dylik) var föredömligt liten; en omtanke om gästernas…

When the taxi drew up outside I thought 'oh no, what's this' but inside I was pleasantly surprised.. the usual Scandic minimalism but a unique, spacious and very quiet setting. Not usual in any way, visually appealing. Comfortable, lots of space in the room, slightly odd, but…

column6: A "four minus" hotel at the outskirt of Lund
column7: This hotel is situated at the outskirt of Lund, perfect for travelers with a car. Are you coming by train to Lund, it’s easiest to go by taxi. But when you take a taxi in Lund as well as in other places in Sweden, you have to take a car belonging to a well-established, serious…

column6: Another stay at the Scandic Star
column7: I stay at this hotel when I go to visit family.  So far my overall experience has been good - I won't bother to repeat my other reviews.  This time I joined the Scandic frequent Guest scheme, so you can tell that I am fairly satisfied with the hotel.  Booked early for an August…

Location close to highway to Malmö, easy access, free parking outside, free wi-fi. Room was big but the hotel requires renovation, like Scandic hotels in general. I stayed one night and for that purpose it was ok. Nothing special in this place. Breakfast was good like usually at…

Wie fast alle Scandic-Hotels liegt auch dieses ein wenig abseits am Rande der Stadt. Für eine Zwischenübernachtung ist es aber durchaus empfehlenswert, da die Zimmer recht ordentlich ausgestattet sind und das kostenlose WLAN einwandfrei im ganzen Haus funktioniert. Und auch das…

Scandichotell brukar vara tråkiga, men det här hade lite mer trevlig stil. Speciellt lobbyn är välkomnande och rymlig. Rummen är standardstil och trista, standarden på rummen varierar mycket även inom samma klass. Rummen är i alla fall skapligt stora och rymmer extrasäng bra.…

Das Scandic Hotel Star Lund ist ziemlich groß und liegt wie fast alle Scandic Hotels außerhalb der Stadt. Es befindet sich auch leider nichts um das Hotel rum. Die Zimmer sind auch normaler Scandic Standart, alt und etwas abgewohnt. Ein Restaurant ist im Hotel vorhanden aber ich…

column6: Dåligt bemötande av receptionisten när vi hade synpunkter
column7: Vi gifte oss Lörd.7/7 2012 alltså för bara några dagar sedan och anlände till hotellet på natten efter vår bröllopsfest. Vi togs emot på med ett trevligt bemötande av receptionisten och rummet modell större var det inget fel på. Som nygifta så önskade vi oss en mysig stund på…
Very disappointing experience. Very small room, outdated and not very clean. Too far away from the city centre located close to an industrial zone. Urgently needs a renovation!

Ett väl anpassat hotell för konferens och övernattning. Tyvärr drar restaurangen ner betyget för hotellet. Bättre service och mat behövs för att detta hotell ska komma i toppklass där det borde ligga.

Ett hotell som för varje besök bara blir sämre och sämre. Frukosten är inte den man är van vid på Scandic-anläggningar. Sängarna känns som de borde bytts för länge sedan!  Kan på inget sätt rekommendera detta hotell då det finns billigare och absolut mer centrala hotell i Lund.
Hyfsade rum och bra mat, men i ett trist industriområde långt från stan. Städningen var undermålig.

column6: Fräscht, rymligt och mycket trevlig personal!
column7: Rummet bra, rymligt och städat, bra med information om hotellet och bra med internettillgång. Frukosten suverän och personalen mycket vänlig och tillmötesgående. Läget relativt centralt, kort promenad på 15 minuter in till city.

Who says Scandinavia is so expensive? 3 nights in a double room with free uprade to 'queen'  ,plus the most extensive, delicious breakfast ,cost less than the average Travelodge in the UK.  The location is very convenient for the motorway, no driving around searching the…

A classic business hotel located too far from everything. Could be good if you are by car, is a no-choice if you arrive by taxi as you will need a taxi for everything unless you want to be stuck in the hotel. On the positive side, there are a lot of facilities like free wi-fi,…

column6: Far from town, not super clean
column7: This hotel is a conference center and we were there for business and some vacation.  Unfortunately it was about 2 miles from the town center and not easy to get to by foot.  The hotel bikes were not available.  The rooms were a bit dated and not super clean.  Breakfast and…

The breakfast is very good, I can confirm. Its a large buffet in the long dining area, and there is a dedicated children's buffet and room. There is also a playroom with curtains, which was adequate but could have done with some love and attention as it has obviously been well…

The room was comfortable but very small. I had a car so its location outside the centre of town was not an issue and my main activities were in the countryside surrounding Lund so its easy access to the highway was a help.  Breakfast was very good with a huge selection of…

column6: Ett bra hotell med mycket servicevänlig personal.
column7: Bodde en helg på Scandic I Lund. Möttes hela tiden av en personal som ordnade allt för vårt bästa. De fixade t o m lunch åt oss fast restaurangen var stängd. Service på högsta nivå.

column6: Fuori dal centro ma ottima permanenza!
column7: Ho alloggiato in questo hotel 3 notti per un corso che si teneva in una azienda nelle vicinanze. La posizione era quindi scelta per essere comoda alla sede del corso mentre per andare in centro ci è stato necessario un taxi. I servizi e la colazione sono ottimi, la struttura un…

The location is great just few minutes from the motorway. Room was large with twin beds and a separate living area (but only one chair...!) with fridge. Bathroom with separate shower and bathtub. The restaurant looked kind of cold, a bit like under renovation. Breakfast buffet…

Second time back at this hotel - last visited in February.  Had a family room both times.  Nice hotel, with central "courtyard".  A No 5 bus ride out of town, with no real facilities near.  Bikes can be loaned.  Family room - large bathroom with both bath and separate shower. …

column6: Wish it was more than one night
column7: Stayed here for one night on a trip from Scout Jamboree in Rinkaby on our way to Denmark, a really good hotel, excellent room and good facilities. It's a brisk but doable walk into the centre of Lund which is well worth the 2k walk.

We used this hotel to take a night over break on our way from Germany to Sweden. It is located convenient 3 mins off the motorway. Staff was frriendly. The rooms looked good, but the beds were horrible. Very soft with matrazes which urgently need to get replaced. The washrooms…

Consigliato da un cliente, è davvero un hotel carino dove poter soggiornare. La cena servita non è molto buona, non la consiglio, ma la colazione è decente ed il centro wellness è devvero ben tenuto e va visitato, per rilasssarsi. Le camere sono buone, pulite. Il costo è…

column6: Nice hotel, quite a (bus)ride from the city though
column7: Clean and very quiet hotel, with pool, sauna and a small but well equipped gym.

Schöne Architektur, große Hotelhalle, mehrere Restaurants,  wie bei Scandic Hotels üblich kostenloses Parken.  Nettes Personal  Ich hatte ein schönes großes Zimmer mit bequemem Vorraum, Schreibtisch, Couchecke, der Möglichkeit, Kaffee zu machen, free internet access. Etwas laut…
very good hotel, very good sleep quality, very clean.  Breakfast is also very good.  Possibly it is a bit cold and not charming, but definitely a very good hotel.
The room was clean and the beds were wonderful. The food in the restaurant was very good and the breakfast buffet, we didnt know where to start and when to stop.

column6: Make no mistake. This is a two-star hotel.
column7: The four-star rating for this hotel on here is just wrong. This is the very definition of a two-star hotel.  If you're staying at the Scandic Star, you're almost certainly attending a conference. Now I should say the meeting facilities were quite good. However, you're here to…

column6: Standard hotel far out from city center
column7: You know what to expect at Scandic. Standard rooms a bit too simple, fine breakfast and usually good service. This one is at the outskirts of Lund, by a petrol station . You need a car and there´s no restaurant nearby. Lund is a nice city to visit but the hotel is more suitable…

column6: Good for conference, Bad for relaxation
column7: Just returned from a business trip held at this hotel. It has excellent conference facilities and free WiFi which was great and I would recommend hotel for a conference (very comfortable chairs in the lecture theatre) but I would not recommend for a relaxing holiday stay mainly…
grande chambre de deux pièces bon petit déjeuner piscine petite avec eu froide personnel serviable
お手ごろの価格だったので選びました。大きな建物で、少し町から離れていましたが、われわれは車だったので特に苦にはなりませんでした。少し古臭く、部屋は暗く、カーテンが窓全体に閉まらなかったので、隣の部屋の視線が気になりました。 もすごく悪いというわけではないのですが、特にお勧めするほどではありません。
Very big and clean room, even though it was single. Bathroom was ok. Check-in/check-out straightforward. Personnel friendly and competent.  The breakfast had small variety, but was still ok.

column6: Stay here only if you must
column7: Scandic has one advantage, the accept dogs (and cats). This is of course only an advantage if you do have a pet; otherwise it is hard to understand why you should stay here. Well maybe breakfast witch was good to content but tables cleaning were a total mess. Scandic also offers…

column6: Feels like the eighties but the staff is very friendly
column7: The room was very large but in urgent need of refurbishment and it wasn't cleaned properly. I don't expect to find dirt and old garbage in the bathroom of a 4 star hotel. Although the staff is very friendly and serviceminded. It feels like children are very welcome at the hotel…

I think the correct title for this hotel should be a prison hotel. I have never been to prison in my life, yet I feel now that I have been to one. Im not exaggerating but the room really really feels like a jail cell. I have posted some pics to prove it. I cannot stress enough…

column6: Nice hotel with great conference service
column7: The hotel is situated in the outskirts of Lund. The conference service is quite good with an excellent coffee and cake buffet (if ordered I guess).  The rooms I've encountered is actually two rooms with a small work/TV-rooms and a bedroom. The bathroom has both a separate shower…

This hotel is situated rather far from the city center of Lund. The surrounding area being some kind of industrial area. There is a large atrium in the middle of the building and that is quite nice. There are several conference rooms and a nice restaurant where the breakfast…

I have stayed at this hotel several times, and it was not better during the Hilton-period, it was the same kind of problems: 1. The rooms was/is very dated but roomy. 2. The rooms was not cleaned properly 3.  Several things in the room was broken and the internet did not work…

column6: Good hotel, was better when affiliated with Hilton
column7: I stayed at this hotel for work 3 times between 2006 and 2008. In 2006 they were still affiliated with Hilton. Th elast time I visited in Mar 2008 they were no longer affiliated and things seem to have gone down hill.  In Mar 2008 I checked in to find my trash bin had not been…

column6: Nice hotel on the outskirts of Lund
column7: We stayed there a few nights in 2001. It is a very nice and clean hotel, great reception. It is ideal for families. Great breakfast, everything you could wish for in Scandinavia. It is located outside of the central part of Lund, and it takes a few minutes by car to get in to…
